1b1(mdo): rgya gdags pa// / bam po drug pa/ sngon na// 
1b2(mdo): gzhol dang gang zab dus bslabs dang / lan cha rin chen bang po gnas// rus pa'i ro nga gcig
1b3(mdo): myi gnas// chu klung rgyud dang sna chog mdog/ rgya mtsho 'i chen po ni byed kyis gzhol zhing byin gyis da' ba
1b4(mdo): la byin kyis bab ste mu khon nas gad par 'dug pa ma yin no// zhes gsung
1b5(mdo): de ci phyir rgya mtsho/ 'chen po byan kyis gzhol zhing byin kyis 'bapa la byin gyis pa/ ba ste/ 
1b6(mdo): kho na nas gde par 'dug pa ma yin zhe nasmras pa/ rgya mtsho'achen po byi
1b7(mdo): gnom zhing byin kyis 'bab la// byid kyis bab pa yang ma yin/ mu len nas gang par 'du
1b8(mdo): pa yang ma yin gyi gling de dag de ltar 'dug ste/ dper na nas kyi phung po 'am/ 'bras kyi phu
2a1(mdo): mo byin gyis gnal zhing byin kyis 'bab la byin kyis bab pa bzhin te/ myed pa na ma mtsho'i ched ma khyon kyis gnas zhing byed kyis 'bab la/ byir khyim tha ba su khon nam gang zang 'dug pa pa ni
2a2(mdo): no/ gargya mtsho la chen pa ni lab cing krung thug par dka' 'i zhes gsungs pa de ma'i phyir/ rgya mtshal chen po zab cing phur 'ug par dkar zhe na/ rnas pa/ rgyal mo'i chen po zab cing sung thug par dka' ba ma yin te/ rgya mcho
2a3(mdo): ni rab kyi mad dang rgya'i ched kyang 'a kyi dam dang 'dug pa'i tshul chu 'di pas cig yod de zhe la chu bum pacigags/ su thub pa brgya'am chu thus pa stong ngam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum shes shenapa
2a4(mdo): myi nus te/ rgyu des na rgya mche 'a chen po zab cing mur thug par dka' 'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i dus rlabs la bab na/ yos par gyi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya mtsho'i chen po dus brlabs la bab na
2a5(mdo): par myi 'gyur zhe na/ sprul pa/ dug dra ba ni gnyis te rang par dang / phye 'phred kyi dus rlabs dang / dus rlabs chen po'o// nang bAr dang phyi 'bred kyi dus rlabs gang zhen/ 'di su se rgya mtshol
2a6(mdo): 'i nang na gnas pa'i sreg chags bkreb shing nyams chung bar 'gyur te/ zas tshol pa rnams nang par sngang chu'i nang nas byung ste/ thang la 'gro ba de dag bkres bzhin/ bye 'breng phyir log ste/ de dag gyen tu 'byung
2a7(mdo): pa dang / phyir ldog pa las dus rnams kyi rlabs byung bar 'gyur pa 'di ni/ nang bar dang byi 'bred kyi dus rlab na bya'o/ dus rngubs chen po gang de/ 'dis ni/ rgyal tsho chen po 'iningan gdas pad/ 
2a8(mdo): ches bkyad dang / ches bcu bzhi dang / tshe 'phrul kyi zla ba phyed dang / de las lcags bu'i tsam grangs dag du/ chu'i rang nas thang la byung nas/ zla ba sa dang pa rnams ni zla ba lan nas nyi ma la dad pa rnas
2b1(mdo): ni nyi ma lnga 'jal pa skyes byed pa dad pa rnams ni skom byed la 'tshal/ sangs rgyas la dad pa'i dge' se nang rnams na gsol skye la gnas par byed de/ de dag rkyed tu byung ba dang phyir log pa las dus rlabs sde
2b2(mdo): bo'i dus rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rma mtshol chen po dus rlabs la bab na yol bar myi 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho 'a chen po ni 'dra bar lan cha'i ro ba gcig go/ zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya ma
2b3(mdo): chen po 'dra bar lan cha'i rang ro gcig ce na/ smras pa rgya mtsho la chen po 'i nang na srog chags skye yang skye yang dga' 'chi yang 'chi ba dag yod de/ de dag gi lus kyi gri ma dang / lus kyi stag stag gis
2b4(mdo): rgya mtsho 'a chen po lan tshwa'i re bro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rgya mtsho 'chen po'i nang na lan cha 'or dag yod de de dag zhu pa la ma rgya mtsho 'a chen po lan tsha'i ro bro bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang glu
2b5(mdo): rnams la myi mkhod pa rnams kyis Nadang shing dang yal ka dang le ma dang da/ lo ma phre'u dang / 'dab ma rnams chu klung gi ne/ ngan bor pa de dag kun tu rul pa las// rgya mtsho' chen po lnga
2b6(mdo): cha'i ri pra bar 'gyur te/ rgyungs na rgya mtsho' chen po 'dra ba lan cha'i ror ro gcig gi/ rgya mtsho'i chen po na rin po che mang po dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ngo zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya
2b7(mdo): chen po rin po che mang po dang // rin po che sna tshogs kyis kang par gyur ce na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten ten chags pa na rgyu'i mchog dang / snying mchog dang / bzang po'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang yin pa de
2b8(mdo): phyogs der bsdus te/ de las ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gser gyi ri bdun po rnams grub po// khams bzang po lhag/ ma rnaMs ni de nyid du bying pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang rgya mtsho 'a chen po'i nang na klu dbang
3a1(mdo): pa mas chenasas kyi sa / yin pa se mang ba dang / rin pa mi rna tshogs kyis gang pa sod / sa dargyal mi med po da kyi ma thor/ na kyi shing rnaM/ rgyal che che / 
3a2(mdo): lan na sems can che ba rnams gnas so// zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyis rgya mtsho la chen po yi nang na sems can chen po rnams gnas zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon myar gyur cing 'dug lug pa rnams
3a3(mdo): kyis/ chos ma yin pas longs spyod rnams skyabs nas bdag nyid kyang bde' bas tshim par byas bu dang chung ma dang / khrom gyi ru dang zas dang skem gyis rgyas par byas pa de dag nyes par byas pa dang / yang dag par
3a4(mdo): blangs pa de lta bu dang / yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus/ lus zhig na sa shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung pa/ sems na dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur de dag sems can dmyal pa/ 
3a5(mdo): rnams nas shi 'phos nas kyang las kyi lhag ma des rgya mtsho chen po 'i nang tu dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der du sa che ba 'am mang tu za bar 'gyur te/ de dag srog chags
3a6(mdo): mang po phrag mang po dag gis za bar 'gyur te/ kri gang dag du gnas nas sdig pa myi dge' ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nyams su myed par gyur pa'i ko skabs kyang myed de/ rgyu des na/ rgya mtsho la chen po la nang na
3a7(mdo): sems can chen po rnams gnas so// rgya mtsho 'a chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang / lhan cig myi gnas so zhes gsungs te/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'i chen po shi pa'i ro dang / lhan cig myi gnas zhe na/ smras pa rgya mtsho
3a8(mdo): chen po nang na klu gtsang lnga pyod pa'i gnas dag yod de/ klu'i gnas gang gi steng tu shi pa'i ro gnas par gyur pa des de'i mtshan me nyid du/ klu'i gnas gnyis par phul lo// gsum pa gnas
3b1(mdo): bzhi bar phul te// de lta bu 'i rim pas 'gram du stsal nas/ zang laskor te rgyu des na rgya mtsho'i' chen po shi ba'i ro dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// rgya mtsho' chen por ni 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi chu klung 'bab pa gang yin pa rnam
3b2(mdo): dang / bar snang nas char kyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab kyang des rgya mtsho 'a chen po de 'grib par gyur pa'ang myed gang par gyur pa 'ang myed do zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i tshal nas chung klung 'bab
3b3(mdo): pa gang yin pa rnams dang bar snang las char kyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shi tsi 'bru kyang des rgya mtsho la chen po de 'grib par 'gyur pa yang myed kang par 'gyur ba yang myed ce na/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i chen po'i nang na
3b4(mdo): gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi lang spyod du 'gro la lhag ma chung dang nyi tshan kyis zad cing gtugs par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho' chen po 'grib par 'gyur ba yang myed gang par gyur pa
3b5(mdo): yang myed do// rgya mtshol chen po'i nang na srog chags kha deg snga tshogs dang / rtag pa sna tshogs dang / dbyi'u sna tshog/ ma dang kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / dbyibs
3b6(mdo): du ma yod do// zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho'i chen po 'aning na srog chags kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sde tshigs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma dang
3b7(mdo): rtags du ma dang / dbyibs du ma yod ce na/ spras pa// sems can gang sngon myir gyur cing 'dug pa rnams kyis/ lus kyi sdig pa myi dka' ba'i las ji lta bu byas pa dang / ngag gis ji lta bu smras pa'i
3b8(mdo): nyes par spyad pa de dang / yang dag par blangs pa de lta bu dang / yang dag par bzung ba de lta 'u dang / lus zhig gi ba'i 'og sung na song ngan 'gro lon par srung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar
4a1(mdo): par 'gyur de dag sems can dmyal ba rnams nas kyang shi 'phos nas kyang las kyi lhag ma des/ rgya mtsho' chen po'i nang du dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der kha dog sna tshogs
4a2(mdo): pa dang rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang dbyibs du mar gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho 'a chen po'i nang nga srog chags kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags snga chags
4a3(mdo): dang dbyib sa sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / dbyibs du ma yod do// chos mngon pa'i bstan chos chen po rgya dgadags pa las tshigs bcul gnyis pa'o// sdom ni/ 
4a4(mdo): gcig du gyu dang gnyis ma yin/ cig pas ched drang mo la 'dzu la chu dang nam mkha' nying+ga dang / tshangs gnas chag da dang 'greng 'dug nyas/ de gcig gyur nas mang por gyur/ zhes
4a5(mdo): gsungs pa de ji ltar na gcig tu gyur nas mang por zhe na/ smras pa'adi la dge' slong 'jig rten pa'i ting 'dzin gang dang / gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang / dka' ba myed par thob
4a6(mdo): pa dang / tshogs myed par thob pa des des skyed cing skrun te/ yang dag par skyed cing yang dag pas sgrub par byed la gsal bar byed do// des de bskyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par skrun cing yang dag
4a7(mdo): par dag par bsgrubs la gsal bar byas nas/ glang po che'i lus sam rta le lus sam/ shing rta'i lus sam/ dpung bu chung ki lus su / khyu mchog gi lus sam/ bya'i lus samad
4a8(mdo): gi lus sam/ rlig pa'i lus sam/ ci dang ci 'dod pa phyi rol tu mngon par bsgrub cing / myong mngon par byed de mngon par rtsom par byed la/ mngon par sgrubs shing / mngon par spyad de
4b1(mdo): mngon par sdums pa de dag gi sgo nas / de ltar cig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro// de mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de 'i sa mang por gyungar das / gcig tu 'gyur zhe na/ smras
4b2(mdo): pa/ 'di na dge' slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis/ glang po che'i lus dang / rta 'i sum dang / shing rtal lum dang / dpung bu chung gi lus dang / khyu mchog gi sum
4b3(mdo): dang bya'i lus dang / shing gi lus dang / rtsig pa'i lus dang / phyi rol tu mngon par sgrubs shing mngon par spyad te/ mngon par 'artsams pa'i spyod pa des brtang ste/ mtshan ma rnams kyang myi snang bar bya ba
4b4(mdo): nas sbyor pa rnams btang zhing mtshan ma rnams myi snang bar byas pa de lta bu la mang por gyur nas/ gcig du 'gyur zhes bya'o// des snang bar gyur zhing myi sdang bar 'gyur ba shes pa dang / mthong
4b5(mdo): pas nyam pa su myong ngo // zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar snang ba las myi snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ de sems can de/ dag sa/ sdang bzhin du 'dug pa las 'di snyam du sems
4b6(mdo): te/ ci nas kyang bdag myi shes par bya'o// ci nas kyang bdag mye mazad par bya'o snyam ste/ de yar rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ breg gos chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod par mos par byed de/ de ltar
4b7(mdo): snang bzhin tu 'dug pa las myi snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar na myi snang dra zhing 'dug pa las snad par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ de sems can de la myi snang zhing 'dug pa las 'di snyam du sems te/ 
4b8(mdo): nas bdag shes par bya'o// ce nas bdag mthong bar bya mi/ sum ste de dag dang / nye zhing thub par mos par byed de/ de sang de snang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar 'gyur to// da de
5a1(mdo): na snang bar 'gyur to// de sar na snang bar gyurd cing / myi snang bar gyur pa rnams la/ snang zhing 'dug pa las kyi snang bar 'gyur ba dang myi sdang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar gyur la/ shes
5a2(mdo): ba kha yang de yin mthong ba yang de yin te/ dge' slong gis shes pa dang // mthong ba de myong zhing so sor myong la/ rig cing nyams su myong ngo // de la shes pa dang mthong ba ni rtogs pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa dang / 
5a3(mdo): nye bar rtogs pa dang / sten pa dang yang dag par khong du chud pa dang / mang du shes pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / zo dang mkhas pa dang / shes rab dang spyod pa dang / lhag mthong gang yin pa ste/ 
5a4(mdo): de ltar na snang bar gyur pa 'am/ myi snang bar 'gyur dashes pa dang / mthong bas nyams su myong ngo // de rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ rabs chod pa la lus myi thogs par 'gro ste/ 
5a5(mdo): dper na nam mkha' la bya bzhin no zhes/ gsungs pa de/ ji ltar/ na rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ ra ba/ sa chod pa la lus myi thogs par 'gro ste// dper na nam mkha
5a6(mdo): la bya bzhin nyen/ da ltar na rtsig pas chad pa'am/ smras pa gan Sha 'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pas na/ rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ rabs chod pa la lus myi theg
5a7(mdo): par 'gro ste/ dper na nam kha la bya bzhin te/ de ltar na rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod pa la A mya thogs par 'gro ste/ dper na nam/ kha las bya bzhin no// de sa la steng du
5a8(mdo): byung ba dang byilu bul byed te/ dper na chu la byed pa bzhin no zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na sa la steng du 'byung ba dang / bya 'u zlul byed de/ dper na chu la bya bzhin zhe na/ smras pa chu'i snyoms par 'ju// 
5b1(mdo): pa la sems par zhugs pas na sa la steng tu 'byung ba dang byi bu bus byed de/ dper na chul bya bzhid de de kar nas la seng du 'byung ba dang / byi lu bus byed de/ dper na nas khakha' la bya bzhin no// de chu'i/ 
5b2(mdo): rgyun la myi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa sa bya bzhin no zhes gsungs pa de/ ji skar chu'i rgyan sa myi nub par 'gro ste/ dper nas sa bya bzhin zhe na/ spras pa sa'i sems par 'jug pa la sems par zhugs
5b3(mdo): bas na mu'i rgyun la myi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya bzhin te/ de ltar chu'i rgyun la myi nul par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya bzhin no// de nam mkhal sa skyil mo krung bcas pa bzhin du 'gro ste/ dper na
5b4(mdo): 'dab chags bya bzhin no zhes gsungs pa de// ji ltar nam mkha' da la skyil mo krung bcas pa de zhin du 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chag su bya bzhin no zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di la dge' slong 'jig rten pa/ 
5b5(mdo): li snyoms par 'jug pa gang dang gang la ci dang ci 'dod pa bzhinathob pa dang / ka ba myed pa thob pa dang / tshegs myed pa'o/ kha ba des / de skyed cing bskrun te yang dag par skyed cing yang
5b6(mdo): dag par sgrub par byed pa la gsal bar byed do// des de skyed cing skrun te/ yang dag par skrun cing yang dag par bsgrubs pa lags la par byas nas phyogs gang na 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal
5b7(mdo): yang rung ste// des der mye 'am/ mye lce'am/ dud pa 'am/ dud pa'i rtags can nam/ rlung ngam rlung gi dkyil 'khor du mos par byed de/ de der mye 'am mye lce 'am/ dud pa 'am
5b8(mdo): dud pa'i rtags can nam rlung ngab chung shi kyi 'khor du mos nas kyang / de'i 'og tu bdag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis gyed du khyer bar gyur cig sum du zos pa 'am/ yang naglang po che'am/ rta'am shing rtan/ 
6a1(mdo): dpung bu chung ngam/ bya 'am rtsig pa 'am/ shing khyer par gyur cig snyam du mos par byed de/ ji ltar ji ltar mos pa de lta de ltar/ gzhan gyi dmyig tha mal pa mthong ngo // de 'di snyam du sems te
6a2(mdo): kye ma rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu zhig myong bar bya'o// so sor myong bar bya'o// rig par bya'o// nyams su myed par bya'o snyam du bsams na/ de bzhin du grub par gyur te/ 'di lta ste rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
6a3(mdo): rnams legs par snyoms pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na nam mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas pa bzhin du 'gro ste// dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no// des nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis lag pas 'dzin cing
6a4(mdo): kun tu myug par byed do// zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis la lag pas 'dzin cing kun du myug par byed ce na/ smras pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin no// 
6a5(mdo): zla ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te/ dge' slong des nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la nye zhing thug par mos nas/ lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu
6a6(mdo): mug par byed la nom zhing kun tu nom ste/ de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis la lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu myug go// de tshangs pa 'o 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed do// zhes gsungs pa
6a7(mdo): de ji ltar na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed ce na// smras pa/ dge 'a slong 'jig rten pa'i ting 'dzind gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang / dka' ba myed par thob pa dang / tshegs
6a8(mdo): myed par thob pa des/ de skyed cing skur te/ yang dag par skyed cing // yang dag par sgrub par byed la/ gsam par byed do// des de bskyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par sgrubs la gsal bar byas nas
6b1(mdo): lus kyab sems la 'jog sa sems kyang lus la 'jog par byed de// sum sems la bzhag pa la sem pa kyang lus la bzhag nas kyang cig tu srung zhing kun tu 'dres te/ dper da mar ram/ 'brus ra
6b2(mdo): sAng ste 'amabu ram kyi bu ba chu dang cig tu gyur zhing kun tu 'dres pa de bzhin du dge' slong gis lus sems la bzhag cing sems kyang lus la bzhag nas lus la yang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'jam
6b3(mdo): 'a'i 'du shes skyed nas 'jug par byed cing 'phag par byed la/ gyen du 'gro bar byed cing / kun tu gyed tu 'gro bar byed de/ dper na za ma tog khyer ba'i myis pa ma teg blangs te/ thang nas kyang 'bag pa
6b4(mdo): byed cing kun tu 'phag par byed la/ 'gro bar byed cing kun tu 'tsho dar byed dang / dge' slong bsod snyoms pas kha zas sung zed kyi nang du bcug nas 'phags par byed cing kun tu
6b5(mdo): 'phags par byed la 'gro bar byed cing kun du 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du dge' slong gis lus la yang pa'i la/ du shes dang / 'jam pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas 'phags par
6b6(mdo): byed cing / kun tu 'phags par byed la/ gyen tu 'gro bar byed cing / kun tu gyen tu 'gro bar byed de/ lus la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsams na/ sems skyed pa'i mod la dbang yod pa dang / 'gro
6b7(mdo): pa dang / rag las pa dang / bdag po dang / mthul yod pa dang / skal ba can dang / dbang byed pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la gnas pa zhes brjod do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
6b8(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' rtso la bka' smra sa te/ kun dga' bo yid kyi rdzu 'grus 'dis tshangs pa'i gzhal myed khang tu phyin par ngas mngon par shes so// de skad ces bka' bstsa la pa dang / 
7a1(mdo): bcom ldan blangasatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsosod to// gzugs nan rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las 'byung ba'i sku 'odas tshangs pa'i gzhas myed khang du gshegs pa/ 
7a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par mkhyen tam kun dga' bo gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las 'byung ba/ pha dang ma'i myi gcad pa mer mer po las 'byung ba/ 'bras can dang zan gron gyis bskyed
7a3(mdo): pa/ rtag tu dril pa dang / khrus bya ba dang / mnye' dgos pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'thor pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can kyi lus 'dis kyang tshangs pa'i gzhal myed khang du phyin par ngas mngon
7a4(mdo): par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe' bstan tu gsol bdel bar gshegs pa dpe la stan tu gsosad// kun dga' po dper na lcags kyi gar bu 'am/ lcags kyi snod ni/ gang gi/ 
7a5(mdo): tshe tsha ba yod cing mye yod pa de'i tshe shin tu ches yang pa dang ches rngam pa dang / ches las su rung ba dang / ches 'od gsal/ par 'gyur la/ gang gi tshe grang mer 'gyur cing mye myed
7a6(mdo): ba'i tshe/ ches sri ba dang / ches sra ba dang / ches las su myi rung ba dang / ches 'od myi gsal bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin du kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshes pas/ sus sems la
7a7(mdo): bzhag cing sems kyang yus la bzhag ste/ sus la yang ba'i 'du shes dang 'jam pa'i 'du sheb skyed na ni// kun dka' bo de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus shin tu yang pa dang / ches 'jam
7a8(mdo): pa dang / ches las su rung ba dang / ches 'od gsal bar gyur pa dang / sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba dang / sems la garten pa dang / sems la rag las par gyur te/ sems la rten nas lus// 
7b1(mdo): dbang byed dog ci'i phyir sprul pa ga nam mkha' sa chag ce da ka smras pa/ spru mal po 'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ ga sprul pa pos nam mkha' de la stegs bu 'am 'chag sa smras par byed de/ skyed pa dgus pa dag
7b2(mdo): mkha' la 'chag go/ ci'i phyir sprul pa nam mkhal la 'greng zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa po li dbang gis 'gyur te/ smras pa pos nam mkha' de la sa gzhi la 'am gnas sprul par byed de ka rgyu des na
7b3(mdo): sprul pa nam mkha' la 'greng ngo // me'i phyir sprul pa na mkha' la 'dug ce na/ smras pa/ sbrul po'i dbang gis 'gyur te// sprul pa po'i nam khe da la stan nam 'dug sa sprul par byed de rgyu des na
7b4(mdo): sprul pa nam mkhal la 'dug go// ci'i phyir sprul pa nam mkhal la nyal zhe na/ smras pa la sprul pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ smras pa pos nam mkha' de la lam lam khri sprul par byed de
7b5(mdo): rgyu deb na grub pa nam mkha' la nyal lo// rdzu 'phrul gyin rnyed pa sdug pa rnams kyang / de bzhin du rtogs par byas nas/ gzhi 'ji lta pa bzhin du 'arjod par bya'o// cho
7b6(mdo): mngon pa'i stan ches chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcul gsum pa'o// sdom ni / mthon dman brgyad dang char myi 'bab char 'bab sos ka chu thigs dang / ser pa kha pa glog dang 'brug
7b7(mdo): thu ba dang ni bzhi drug bdud/ char pa ji tsam na 'dug sted 'bab cen/ smras pa/ smon ni brgyad yod de// de la spyod dang po ni dpag chad phye dang gnyis na 'dug go// gnyis pa ni rgyang grags lnga'o// 
7b8(mdo): gsum pa ni dpag tshad gcig go// bzhi pa ni rgyang grangs gsum mo/ lnga pa ni dpag chad byed do// drug pa ni rgyang grags gcig go// bdun pa ni rgyang grags phyed do/ brgyad pa si rgyang grag
8a1(mdo): kyi ba ni gcig na 'dus sten mang yab pas phye bas par// 'phyo gas pa ma rnas kyi srid dpag pa byed pa gnyis sa te/ du ra 'jug/ 
8a2(mdo): rnams kyi ni dpa' ba nas char 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ bskal pa dang po la myi rnams ni dbang che bar grags par 'gyur te/ de dag la klu dbang che bar grags pa dag spro bar byed de/ des na sprin dpag
8a3(mdo): tshad phyed dang gnyis su gyen du 'phags nas sa thams cad du char 'dra ba la da ltar ki myi rnams ni dbang chu bar grags pa yin te/ de dag la ni klu yang dbang chud par grags pa spro bar byed de des na
8a4(mdo): da ltar dma' ba nas char 'bab ste/ rgyu des na skal pa dang po 'i myi rnams kyi smon dpag tshad phye dang gnyis su gyen du 'phags te/ sa thams cad du char 'bab la da ltar gi myi rnaMs
8a5(mdo): kyi ni dma' pa nas char 'bab po// ci'i phyir char myi 'bab ce na/ smras pa rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyi char myi 'bab/ ste/ brgyad gang zhe na// sprin yang yod la klog kyang 'byung ba
8a6(mdo): dang 'brug kyang zer la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsil ba dag ldang pa de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs yod te/ ltas pa rnams ma rtags par char 'bab po zhes sonyon mod kyi/ 'on kyang sa chen po/ 
8a7(mdo): 'di las mye 'i khams gyen du 'phags nas/ char pa de bar ma dor zad par byed de/ rgyu dang po 'dis na char myi 'bab po// gzhan yang srin yang yod la glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la
8a8(mdo): phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsil pa dag ldang pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod te ltas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab po// zhes ston mod kyi 'on kyang nam mkha' la rlung drag po
8b1(mdo): dag ldang ste/ de dag gis char pa de dag da ka'i dkon pa rnams dang / ka ling ka'i dkon pa rnams dang ma tang ka'i dgon pa rnams dang / dkon pa sor pa rnams ga la ba der dor bar byed de/ chu gnyis pa 'das na rdza
8b2(mdo): myi 'bab bo// gzhan yang sprin yang yod lag/ klog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang ler la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsil ba rnams sdang ba de'i skabs kyang yod de// lus pa rnams kyang ma gtogs par char
8b3(mdo): 'bab po zhes ston mod kyi 'on kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis/ char pa de lag pa gnyis blangs nas rgya mtsho la chen por dor bar byed de/ rgyu gsum pa 'dis na char myi 'bab po// gzhan yang sprin
8b4(mdo): yang yod la/ klog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la bya gas bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsil ba dag ldang ba de'i dus kyang yo da la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ sbas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par
8b5(mdo): char 'bab bo zhes bton mod kyi/ 'on kyang char pa 'bebs pa'i lha 'i bu rnams bag myed cing bag myed par gnas te/ de dag/ bag myed cing bag myed par gnas pas char myi 'bab ste/ rgyu bzhi
8b6(mdo): ba 'dis na char myi 'bab po// gzhan yang srin yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la phyogs bzhi 'anas rlung dang bsil ba dag ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs
8b7(mdo): kyang yod de / smras pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab bo zhes ston med kyi 'on kyang / byi rnams chos ma yin par spyod cing myi mthun par spyod pas char myi 'bab ste/ rgyu lnga pa 'das mchar myi 'bab zon
8b8(mdo): gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gis char myi 'bab pa yod te/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba 'ga'i rdzu 'phrul kyis tshar 'bab pa la gcod par byed de/ rgyu drug pa 'dis ni char 'bab po// gzhan yang chos
9a1(mdo): nyid kyis char myi 'bab pa yod de/ char myi 'bab pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid de rgyu bdun pa 'dis na char myi 'bab po// gzhan yang bden pas bskul pas cher myi 'bab pa/ 
9a2(mdo): yod de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthul che ba 'gas/ bden pas skul pas/ char 'bab pa las gcod par byed de/ rgyu brgyad pa 'dis na char myi 'bab po// ci'i phyir char 'bab chen smras pa/ 
9a3(mdo): rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis char 'bab ste/ brgyad gang zhe/ klu'i mthu' dang / gnod sbyin kyi mthu' dang / grul bum gyi mthu' dang swa'i mthul dang 9/ myi'i mthul dang / rdzu 'phrul dang chos nyid
9a4(mdo): dang dben pas skul pas char 'bab ste/ rgyu des na char 'ab ba bo// de ci'i phyir sos ka dang g.yar char 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ de'i tshe klu rnams bag ma len pa dang / bag ma gtong
9a5(mdo): ba dang dga' ston dang dub stod dag byed de// de dag dka' zhing de dang de dag du dong bar byed de/ de dag dga' zhing dong na 'char 'bab bo// gzhan yang myi rnams kyis de lta bu
9a6(mdo): ru gyur pa'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/ de dag byas shing bsags pas na sos ka dang dbyar char cher 'bab ste/ rgyu des na sos ka dang / g.yar char cher 'bab po// ci'i phyir thigs
9a7(mdo): pa 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas chu chen po dag ldang ste/ de dag gis chu de dag gcig tu bsdus pas na/ de las chu'i thigs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang myi rnams kyis de lta bu
9a8(mdo): las byas shing bsags te/ de dag byas shing bsags pas mye ma yin pa rnams 'khrugs nas chu'i thigs pa 'bebs ste/ des de dag la gnod pa chen por 'gyur te/ skyengs ra/ mu'i thigs pa
9b1(mdo): 'bab po// / ci'i phyir ser ba 'bab chen pa/ smras pa// phyogs gnyis rlung shin tu bsil pa dag ldang ste/ de dag gis chu'i kham med gcig tu bsdus sa// sa'i khams kyis kyang sra bar byas nas kha ba 'am
9b2(mdo): ser par gyur pa de rlung gis thu b+hu pab ste/ rmya ngas na/ ser ba 'bab 'o/ ci'i'abyor glog 'byung zhe na/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung shin du tsha ba dag sdang ste/ de dag thug pa las rlon
9b3(mdo): 'byung ste/ skyedes na klog 'byer // ci'i phyir 'brug zer zhe na/ spras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung chen po dag ldang ste de dag 'thabs pa las rtswa 'byung ste/ rgyu sa na/ 'brug zer ro// 
9b4(mdo): phyir phru ba sud cen/ smras pa/ 'og nas mye mdzes pa 'bar bas/ kye'i shas che bar 'gyuralargya shas che b.ragyur pas/ rlung gi shas che bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi shas
9b5(mdo): par gyur pas chu'i phyi rold du bo bar gyur te/ rgyu des na bru ba zhud to// ci'i phyir kha dog rdzo bar 'gyur ce na smras pa/ chu'i khams shas che bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir
9b6(mdo): ser ba dang dmar bar 'gyur zhe na/ spras pa/ mye'o khams shas che ba'i phyir ro kang bar 'gyur zhen khams rnamam mnyam pa'i phyir te/ skyedas na// 'dog sngo ba dang ser pa dang
9b7(mdo): dmar pa dang dkar bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir ro kha pa dang / sbyar pa dang / lan tsha'i ro dang tsha ba dang / ska bar 'gyur zhe ni/ smras pa/ khams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na/ ro/ 
9b8(mdo): pa dang / sbyar ba dang / la mtsha ba'i ro dang / ska bar 'gyur ro// sau phyi mngar par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ khams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyu sa na mngar par 'gyur ro// ci phyir lci ba dang / sgrub pa
10a1(mdo): pa dang / mkhrang pa dang / sra bar gyur cen/ smrab pa ka sa'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// ci 'byam mnyen pa dang / 'jas pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur zhen/ bAs pa/ chu'i khams shas che ba'i phyir te/ rmungs/ 
10a2(mdo): nag mnyen pa dang 'dam pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur ro// chos mngon pa'i sman ches chen po klu gdags pa las tshigs bskul bzhil 'a'o// / rba nI/ skye gnas 'gro ba yong ba dang / 
10a3(mdo): 'i phyir dmyal tshogs mthel sa dang / lha mo ma las rdzogs pa nag/ 'om khasu ng+yas dang gdos/ phreng ba'id mnyan yod na she / skye gnas banim me rten slong sa skye ba'i gnas dang gsangs das
10a4(mdo): skye ba dang sreng gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dang / 'don skye gnas yin par gsungs so// spro las skye ba'i gnas gang zhe na smras pa sems can gang dag sgo ba las skye ba rnams dang / 
10a5(mdo): smon 'dug pa rnams dang spo pa'i dbugs kyi bris g.yogs pa rnams dang / so// de'i dbugs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skye la grub cing mngon par grub pa dang / yang dag par grub cing
10a6(mdo): 'byung ba rnams te de dag kyang gdu zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ rang pa dang khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tshe dang / skyegs dang / bu bug dang / shang shang te lulas tshogs pa dang / klu kha cig dang / nas/ 
10a7(mdo): kha' lding kha cig dang / myi kha cig dang / gzhan sems can gang dag skong las skye ba rnams dang / sngo ba 'i sbubs kyis phras g.yogs pa rnams dang / spro ba yi sdus brtol te skye zhing kun tu skye la// 'grub
10a8(mdo): cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub pa ring 'byung ba byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni sgong las skye ba'i skyeg na shes bya'o// mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhen/ smras pa/ sems can gang/ 
10b1(mdo): khri ba rnamasas/ ma la 'dun pa rnamapa dang / / shes pa rnams dang / sa kyi srungs slo sa kyis 'gas ci ma da par 'grub pa nga / 
10b2(mdo): 'thung cing 'byung ba rnams te// de dag kyang gang zhed 'di sa ste/ glang ye e dpa/ rta dang rnga mo dang pa yang dang bong bu dang / mche dang / ri dgas dang phag sam thogs pa dang / klu kha tsag dang / 
10b3(mdo): mkhal lding kha cig dang yi dgas kha cig dang / myi kha cig dang / gzhan yang sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba dang / sangs na 'dug pa rnams dang / rdzangs kyi sbubs kyis g.yogs pa rnams dang / 
10b4(mdo): sangs kyi srubs tes te skye zhing kun du skye la mthub cing mngon pang 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cong 'byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni mang sangs skye ba'i sku gan sa shes bya'o// zod dashe
10b5(mdo): skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag lan tu na gyi grong dang / phan tshun kye mye dang / phan tshun gyi rdus da / pA tshun gyi gnod pa dang / phan bA tsir bas nyam nyis kyi bu
10b6(mdo): po mas rten tama?/ tor khung ngam/ phyi sa'i gnas sam// sha rus lam/ rus pa/ zan dron rul pa 'am/ su stug po 'am/ na/ sa stug po 'am/ tshwa'i rtsol po 'am/ lo ma'i sril po'i ma
10b7(mdo): tshu rus pa 'am// khyim kyi sang seng ngam// smang ma'i tshang la rten nas/ skye zhing kun tu skye la 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag kyang gang ni
10b8(mdo): na/ 'di lta ste/ srin bu dang / spur pu dang / phye ma leb dang / sbrang bu mchul rigs dang / tis dang / yul ma dang / shing spa la stsogs pa dang / kru kha cig dang // nam mkha' lding kha cig dang / mye kha cig dang / 
11a1(mdo): gzhan yang sems can gang dag/ phan tshun gyi drod dang / pham tshun gyi me dang / phan tshun gyi dus dang / phan tshun gyi gnod pa dang / phan tshun slobs skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag/ 
11a2(mdo): par 'grub pa cing mngon par 'byung ba rnams te/ de ni greng gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas zhes bya'o// rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnab gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag la yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan
11a3(mdo): zhing rdzogs pa dbang po ma tshang pa myed pa rnams cig car skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub pa zhing / 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag gang zhe na smras
11a4(mdo): ba lha thams cad dang / sems can dmyal ba ba rnams cad dang bar ma do'i srid pa pa thams cad dang / klu kha cig dang / nam mkha' lding kha cig dang / yid dgas kha cig dang / myi kha cig
11a5(mdo): dang / gzhan yang sems can gang dag yan lag dang nying lag tham ma cad dang ldan zhing rdzogs pa ma tshang pa myed pa rnams cig char skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa
11a6(mdo): dang yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni rngus te skye ba'i skye gnas shes bya'o// 'gro ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ sems cad dmyal ba'o 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / yi rags kyi 'gro ba dang
11a7(mdo): lha dang myi'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can dmal pa pa rnams dang / 'dra bar gyur pa dang / grogs su gyur pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa dang / gnas thob pa dang // gzhi
11a8(mdo): ba dang / skye sa sems cad dbyas pa pa de skyes pa rnams kyis pa mamasasung dus bdun pa'i gzugs dang // tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed dang / rnam ma nas pa
11b1(mdo): sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba sems cad dmyal pa rnams su skye ste/ sems cad dkyil pa rnams su nying 'jams byor 'di na/ mas can dkyil ba 'a 'i zhes bya'o/ na nang me byung dadu/ natsho / 
11b2(mdo): da cig gradags dang / kyang dug dgas pa dang / na tu na ze dang // gangags pa dang / pa 'a kyi se ba dul pa'i 'grel sems cad dmam pa zhes bya'o// du 'gro'i 'gro gan
11b3(mdo): dung 'gro rnams dang 'dra bar gyur ba dang / zegs sa gyur ba nas skye mad thar ba'i bar dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyung ba dang skyes rnams kyis ma spang bas sung dus bzung pa'i gzugs dpa/ 
11b4(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i bar gang sem pa rnams de yang dung 'gre'a'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhang yang bas kyi las dang / ngag ga las yang kyis su ze kun du med cing ba rnams bang du bya
11b5(mdo): bas pa dung cher 'gro zhing dung 'then sa na ste/ drung 'tshernams su zhing rnamams gyu pa de dung 'gro'i 'gro ba zhes zu'o// gzhan sang kying dang rnam pa'i ga dang / ga rlung sa ne cu
11b6(mdo): snga ma pa zhin du sbyar ro// si dgas kyi 'gro ba gang zhen/ snum pa/ mi dgas rnams dang 'dra bar gyur bstan/ skye mched zab pa'i bar gang yod pa dang / sogs der sgrub pa rabs kyi
11b7(mdo): sgribs pa lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yod pa de yang / yi dgas kyi 'gro pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang srer sna kun tu sten cing sgoms ste/ mang du byas pas
12a1(mdo): yi dgas su 'gro zhing yi dgas rnams su skye ste/ yi dgas rnams su nying mtshams spyod pa de ni/ yi dgas kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mying dang / rnam pa'i tshig dang / tshig bla dag
12a2(mdo): pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// lha'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa lha rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pas na/ skye mched thob pa'i bar dang / lha der skyes pa rnams kyi ma sgribs pa la lung ma
12a3(mdo): bstan pa'i gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yang / lha'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs
12a4(mdo): par spyod pa chen po kun tu sten cing sgom pa de yang du byas pas/ lhar 'gro zhing lha rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ lha rnams kyi nang tu nyid ma tshams sbyor ba de ni/ lha'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
12a5(mdo): kyi rnams kyi chog ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du byung rdzo/ gyi'i 'gro ba gang med/ spros pa/ myi rnams dpa'adra bar gyung ba dang/ grogs su gyur pa dang / skal pa mnyam pa
12a6(mdo): gnas thob pa dang / gzhi la ze'i pa dang / skye mched thob pa dang / myi 'dir skyes pa rnams kyi ma sgribs pa la lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
12a7(mdo): dngarnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang myo'i 'gro zhes bya'o// gzhan lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa mu ru/ 
12a8(mdo): kun du sten cing gags te/ yang dbyas pas phyir 'gro 'ong kyi rnams kyi rang tu skye ste/ phyi rnams kyi ring du nying mtshams sbyorang pa de ni pa'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yod myi dang rnam
12b1(mdo): pa'i tshig dang / tshig bla dgas dang / mying du gdag pa dang / kun tu rig pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha skad kyi rgya'i 'gro ba yad kyi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba gapal skye gnas du yod cing smras pa/ 
12b2(mdo): sems can dmyal pa rnams ni rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas gcig du yod do// dud 'gro rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na/ smras pa// bzhin po thams cad yod do// mi dgas rnams la skye gnas du yod
12b3(mdo): cen/ rdzus te skye ba gcig tu yod do// la la na yi dgas rnams la mnga' nas skye ba yang yod do zhes zer pa yang yod to// pi ltar na smras pa/ dper na mi dgas mo zhig gis// tshe dang ldan pa
12b4(mdo): mo'i gal gyi bu li mdun du tshigs su bcad pa/ smras pa'adir ni nyin mo bu lnga btsas/ mtshan mo gzhan lnga btsa 'gyur nas// gzos su zin kyang de dag gis/ bdag ni 'drangs
12b5(mdo): par ma gyu rad to// zhes smras pa ltar ro// lha rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na smras pa/ rdzus te skye ba gcig pu ma do// myi rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na smras pa/ gzhi
12b6(mdo): po thams cad yod de phyi rnams la sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gan so ji ltar yod can smras pa/ dper na/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i chod pa mang po rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas bskor ba rnams kyis/ khrung zhung
12b7(mdo): gzhon nu ma gnyis mthong ba las/ gcig ro bros gcig ni de dag gos bzung ste// de dag de dang lhan cig 'tshogs/ de dag dpa'atshom pa'i rkyen kyis snying nga gnyis byung / 
12b8(mdo): de gnyis smyon te brtol pa las/ byis pa gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug la mdzes pa gnyis byung nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ de gnyis kyis brtson pa dang / sbyor pa
13a1(mdo): ba 'bad pa byas pas mchog gi 'bras bu dag mngom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis su 'phrul che zhing mthu'i che bar gyur te/ zug dpes pa'i brag ces bya bar gyur/ 
13a2(mdo): pa lta bu dang / dper na yi dgas 'dre ma sa ga las g.yas spong sum bcu la rtsa gnyis byung ste de dag sbyin te brtol pa las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing ltan sdug la mdzes pa/ chen be ce chen po'i stobs
13a3(mdo): dang ldan pa sum bcur rtsa gnyis 'byung ste/ de dag gis nyes pa'i gzhil byas pa'i phyir/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal sreg pas bsad pa lta bu dang dper na 'das pa'i dus na/ lnga len gyi rgyal po 'i btsun
13a4(mdo): mo pad ma cad las spong lnga brgya byung ste/ de dag srir te brdol ba la sa byis pa gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug pa mdzes pa can rtse che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga rgya byung ste/ de dag dga'
13a5(mdo): las skyo ba skyes nas swA dang kha spu bregs te rab tu byung nas/ de dag brtson pa dang skyer ma dang 'bad pas/ rang sangs rgyas byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa snga bu'o// de dag la
13a6(mdo): sogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjed par bya ste/ de ltar na myi rnams la sgo nga las skye ba'i gnas yod do// myi rnams la mngal nas skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na smras pa/ da ltar gyi myi rnams ji lta bzhin te/ de ltar na myi
13a7(mdo): rnams la mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas yod do// myi rnams la drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na/ smras pa/ dper na rgyal po tshangs pa sbyin gyi brang nas zer bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dab
13a8(mdo): ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma lta bur 'jam shing shin tu 'jam la gnod pa chung zad kyang myed pa zhig byung ste/ de dag smod te brdol pa las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing ltan sdug la mdzes pa zhig skyes te/ 'jug ron
13b1(mdo): 'an pa shes bya bar gyu gdus gzha na/ na skye gang dbang bam paston par byung bas/ lda mos par tshigs su da dis su zhin du sa ton skyed
13b2(mdo): lam di keng nas ldeg par 'gyur/ bde dang sdug sngal 'jog rten du/ gang du ma yus 'gag par 'gyur/ zhes smras so// de nas bram ze'i khyi'u gtsam bu mu tshor smra ba/ spyi ngos car zhig gi sa/ bu moM de
13b3(mdo): 'di skad du bu mo de ci yang ma yin pa zhig go zhes smras te/ de skad smras pa dang / bu mu de ni ci yang myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal khro gsol spyod 'phags kyi spyi bo nas thor bung 'di
13b4(mdo): lha ste/ shing bal lam ras pas lta bu 'jam zhing / shin tu 'jam/ la gnod pa chung zad kyang myed pa zhing byung ste/ de smin te gtol rab las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sngags mdzes pa
13b5(mdo): skyes bu chen po'i chen po mtshan sum bcu la gnyis kyis rgyan pa na ga skyes te/ spyi bo nas skyes po zhes zer nas mying ngasas dru bas pa su zhes bya bar 'gyur ba tig/ byis pa
13b6(mdo): de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu 'che bar gyurd de/ ngas kyang gling bzhir rgyal khrod kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa sta bu dang / dper na rgyal po pa las mu lidra g.yas pa las thor bu 'di ska ste/ shring bal la
13b7(mdo): ram bal lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la// chung zad kyang gnod pa myed pa zhig byung ste/ de sbyin te brtos pa las// byis pa gzugs bzang zhing ldan sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po
13b8(mdo): mtshan sum bcul la gnyis kyi mi rgyan pa zhig ste/ gapapa gsas padas skyem sa// rkang pa gsas pa nas skyem sa nas sems ma pa mangs pa zhes bya bar gyur to// 
14a1(mdo): byis pade rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthul par gyur da to// des kyang gling gsub tu rgyal med kyi dbang mug la dbang pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po la marngas pa 'dzes pa'i rwa g.yon pa nas
14a2(mdo): zor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am / ras bal lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la chung zad kyang gnod pa myed pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te brdol pa las/ byis pa gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu/ 
14a3(mdo): chen po'i mtshan mtshan sum bcu la cha gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes ste// rkang pa g.yon pa nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ mying nye mdzes nye mdzes shes bya bar gyur to// byis pa de rdzu 'phrul che
14a4(mdo): mthul che bar gyur te/ des kyang gling gnyis su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa'i steng ka bol nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi
14a5(mdo): 'dab ma 'amaras bal kyi 'dab ma lta bur 'jam zhing / shing tu 'jam la gnod pa chung zad kyang myed pa zhig byung ste/ de sbyin te bcos pa las// byis pa gzugs pasang zhings
14a6(mdo): na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes ste/ rkang pa'i steng ki bol nas skyes so// rkang pa'i steng gi bol+la nas skyes so zhes zer nas// myong
14a7(mdo): mim ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// byis pa de du 'phrul la zhing mthu che bar gyur das/ res kyang slong gcig du chub srid kyi dbang thug pa dbang byas pa ste bu dang / dper na rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi napa pa'i
14a8(mdo): gi 'phel nas thor bur 'di lta ste/ shing bas kyi 'dab ma lam/ ras khas kyi 'dab ma sta bu 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la/ gnod pa chung zad kyang byed pa zhig byung ste// de sbyin te rtol ba las/ byis
14b1(mdo): pa gzugs bzang zhing stan sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la cha gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes te// rkang pa'i 'og gi 'thil nas skyes so// / rkang pa'i 'og gi 'thil nas skyes so zhes zer/ 
14b2(mdo): nas mying mdzes can mdzes can zhes bya bar gyur to// byis pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che bar gyur to// des kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas srod kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na yangs
14b3(mdo): pa can kyi mying chen gyi skyed mos tshal tu shing a mra las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bstan stug la mdzes pa zhig skyes te/ mying sa mras bskyangs sam zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bu mo de yang tshogs kyis tshogs spyad pa byas
14b4(mdo): pa lta bu'o// de la rdzogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste da/ de ltar na myi rnams la drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnadas yod de// myi rnams las rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar/ 
14b5(mdo): yod ce na/ smras pa/ dper na skal pa dang po pa thams cad rdzu sa te skyes pa lta bu dang / dper na dge slong ma dgon pa ma swA bregs shing gos dur stsogs gyon pa bzhin du dgon pa byung ba lta bu
14b6(mdo): 'o// de las zlogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya'o// da lta par myi rnams la rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas yod do// ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba rnams zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ yid du 'ong ba myed kyi
14b7(mdo): bde' ba dang / yid bde' ba dang bras pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des sems can dmyal ba rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir dud 'gro rnams shes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ dud 'gro zhig dung te 'ong pas na/ de'i phyir/ 
14b8(mdo): rud 'gro rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir yi dgas rnams shes bya zhe na/ smras pa da star yi dgas rnams kyi rgyal po gshin rje ji lta ba bzhin du/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yid dgas rnams kyi rgyal po zhes bya/ 
15a1(mdo): par gyur te/ pa'i yul tu 'gro'o// pa'i yul nas 'ong ngo zhes zer nas myi bdags yi dgas zhes bya bar gyur dergyu des na yi dgas rnam pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir myi rnams bya
15a2(mdo): pa zhe na smras pa rgyal po de las nu des bstan pa'i myi rnams ni las ched po'o cog blo ba kha skyed pa dang bsam ste 'jam zhib nye bar brtags nas byed pa dang / brtags shing gzhal te nye bar byed pa
15a3(mdo): namying myi zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na ma rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir lha rnams bya zhe na/ smras pa 'bar pa'i byor na lha rnams shes bya'o// gzhan yang 'gro ba rnams dang
15a4(mdo): skye ba rnams dang / lus thob pa rnams kyi mchog yin pas na lha rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir mthong ris shes bya zhe/ na/ smras pa/ sems can de dag bdel pa dang ldan zhing skyid
15a5(mdo): la gnod pa myed pa'i chos dang ldan te/ bde ba dang yid de'i ba mchog dang / gnod pa myed pa'i bdel pa dang / 'de pa'i tshor ba dang ldan pas na/ mthong ris zhes bya'o// 
15a6(mdo): ci'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya zhe na smras pa/ gsal zhing rtog pa myed pa'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya ba dang / bag myed cing dga' ba'i shas che ba'i phyir/ lha'i bu mo zhes bya ste/ rgyu des na lha'i
15a7(mdo): bu mo rnams shes bya'o// / rgyu gdags pa// / bam / ci phyir ma zhes bya
15a8(mdo): pa zhe na smras pa nu zho sbun par byed pa dang / gsol par byed pa'i phyir ma zhes bya ba dang / mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa'i phyir ma zhes bya ste/ rgyu des na ma zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir pa zhes
15b1(mdo): bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skye ba grub pa bu rgyud kyi las dang / 'bres pa'i rgyu dang po de yin pa dang / rkyed de yin pas ma de'i phyir pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir zhang po zhes bya zhe na smras pa/ pa dang ga
15b2(mdo): cig tu 'brel pas na de'i phyir zhang po zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir khu bo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed pa'i ba la ni pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni bdag ga pa'i thabs so zhes bya ba das pa'i phyi
15b3(mdo): khu bo zhes bya'o// sa'i phyir nu bo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ rigs las skal pa gcod pas ni/ dri'i khyi nu po zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir sring mo zhes bya zhen smras pa/ rigs pa mgu
15b4(mdo): stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mtshodad par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba'i skal pa dbang bas na de'i phyir sring mo zhes bya'o// ji'i phyir ma las 'o ma 'byung
15b5(mdo): pa las myi 'byung zhe na/ smras pa/ ma'i mngal na sa skye ba dang 'bres par gyu rang gi/ pa dang 'brel pa myed pa'i phyir ro// gnan yang ches lhag par ma bul
15b6(mdo): byams kyi pade lta ma yin gyi rgyu des na ma las 'om byung gi sa las kyi 'byung ngo // ni phyir bud byed las 'gras spu dang kha su myed cen/ smras pa/ ma ring bzhin tu de'i dbang po rnams dad pas
15b7(mdo): de'i phyir bud myed la 'gras su dang kha su myong ngo // ci'i'aphyir ma nang la 'gram bu dang kha su myed cer/ smras pa/ bud myed bzhin du de'i dbang po rnams zhad pas/ de'i phyir 'gras spu dang kha sa myed
15b8(mdo): 'i byor rgyas ze zhes bya zhed smras pa/ chas dang rang chus dang khyod rgyas sum du spyod pa'i 'khor rangs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir rgyal po zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rgyal rigs zhes byad
16a1(mdo): rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir bram ze zhes bya na/ smras paphyi rol tu sems pas na bram ze zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rje'u rig
16a2(mdo): zhes bya zhe na/ nyen mongapa pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i las byed pas na/ de'i phyir rje'u rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir dmangs rigs zhes bya zhe na/ ngan las byed pa dang / gnod pa'i las byed pa
16a3(mdo): na/ de'i phyir dmar rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rdol pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa// skam pa dang po pa'i myi rnams su yang pha re sad kyis myi len pa las phyis myi zhig gis/ pha rol kyis ma byin pa
16a4(mdo): blangs nas de rgyal po'i bsrungs ma myis bzung ste/ rgyalarigs spyi bo nas dbang skur pa'i rgyal po la phul nas lnga mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ myi 'dis ni pha rol kyi ma byin/ 
16a5(mdo): bar blangs so// rgyal pos de dag la smras pa/ khyed deng la myi 'di sod cig ces byas nas myi de dag las su yang myi de gsod par spro ba la byung bas pa de dag la spyi bo nas
16a6(mdo): dbang skur pa'i rgyal pos// 'di skad ces smras te/ su myi 'di gsed pa de la ngas nod kyi phung po sbyin no// de nas myi 'gazhan nor ngan tu gnyer zhing nor 'dod la/ nor la rkam zhing nor kyi nyes sdig
16a7(mdo): can zhig gis myi bsad do// myi de bsad nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ myi 'din num po zhig ste/ 'di ltar nor don du gnyer pa dang / nor 'dod pa dang / nor la rkam pa dang / nor kyi skyes
16a8(mdo): sdig gis myi sun ma byung ba gzhi la nyes pa myed pa bsad kyis myi 'di ni dgos pa myed do// myi 'di ni gtum po'o zhes zer nas/ mying rdol pa gdol pa zhes bya bar gyurd to// rgyu des na gdol pa/ 
16b1(mdo): nams zhes bya'o// chos mngon pa'i sman chos chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcom lnga pa'o// / sdom ni dud 'gro smras dang glang po dang // ra mo pa yang byug pa dang / 
16b2(mdo): glang / rarwa dang 'jam dang drag pa dang / chu gnas bkren pa tshogs kyi sdom// ci phyir dud 'gro zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gas
16b3(mdo): kyi lha 'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten kyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skas pa dang po'i myi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir skyes nas/ des lag pa gnyis pa
16b4(mdo): la btsugs te/ dud de 'gro ba las mying dud 'gro dung 'gro zhes dbya bar gyur te// rgyu des na dud 'gro rnams zhes ma/ ci'i phyir spru zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sos
16b5(mdo): can shin tu gnag pa dang / ldan pa zhig 'od gsas kyi lha'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skal pa dang po myi rnams kyi
16b6(mdo): nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas/ lag pa gnyis nas/ rkang gnyis myed par gyur te/ de ltos phye bar gyur nas/ de dag 'di skad du sems can 'di ltos phye'o// sems can 'di ltos bya
16b7(mdo): 'o zhes zer nas/ mying lto 'phye zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na sprul zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang po che zhes bya zhe na smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang / ldan pa zhig 'od
16b8(mdo): gsal kyi lha'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten kyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skal pa dang po'i myi rnams kyi nang du skyes te// de 'dir skyes nas lhag pa
17a1(mdo): gnyis sa la btsugs te/ de'i sna yang ring por gyur nas/ lag par 'gro zhing lag pas 'ong pas/ mying glang po che glang po che zhes par gyur to// rgyu des na glang po// 
17a2(mdo): che rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir rta zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten
17a3(mdo): kyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skal pa dang po'i mya rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ de 'dir ru skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyu bar gyur to// de nas sems can
17a4(mdo): de dag gso mthong nas 'di skad du/ kye su'i zhes bya das pa dang / smras pa/ kye 'di ni su 'im yin no// zhes zer nas/ myong rta rta zhes bya bar btags ce
17a5(mdo): rgyu des na rta zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rnga mo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang / ldan pa zhag 'od gsal kyi lha'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas/ 
17a6(mdo): 'jig rten kyi khams nas 'dir myi rnams dang / bskal pa mnyam par skul pa dang po'i myi rnams kyi nang tu skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas/ mtshung gnyis phyung la/ 'grim pa yang dbye
17a7(mdo): dgu can du gyur nas/ de 'di dag 'di skad du/ mtshul gnyis mchad do zhes zer nas/ de dag gis de'i ming rnga mo zhes brtags te/ rgyu des na rnga mo rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir ba
17a8(mdo): lang zhes bya zhe na smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal kyi lha'i rigs nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang skal pa ma
17b1(mdo): par skal pa dang po'i myi rnams kyi nang du skyes de/ de 'drir skyes nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang ste/ dgon pa'i gnas dag na rgyu zhing // sems can de tshogs kyi nang nas byung nas/ dgon pa'i gnas
17b2(mdo): dag na rgyu zhing tshogs kyi nang du phyi gnas pa'i phyir/ de'i myong ba yang zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na pa yang / zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir phyugs shes bya zhen/ sems can las shin tu ga
17b3(mdo): ba dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mya rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skas pa dang po'i mya rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes rnas
17b4(mdo): dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyud pa na// myi de dag gis glon das 'dzin cing glo nas 'dzin pas na phyugs shes btags te/ rgyu des na phyugs rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang bu zhes bya/ 
17b5(mdo): nasmras pa sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang lnga na pa zhig 'od gsal kyi lha'i ris nas gi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir myi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par
17b6(mdo): skal pa dang po'i mya rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas shin tu stobs che zhing khal khyer ba'i phyir/ mying klang bu glang pu zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyu des na glang bu rnams shes bya'o// 
17b7(mdo): ci'i phyir sems can kha cig ni rwa'i stobs dang ldan kha cig ni sder mo'i stobs dang ldan kha cig ni mche' ba'i stobs dang ldan par gyur ce na smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon myir gyur
17b8(mdo): pas na mtshon chas brgyan pa dang / mtshon cha lag cha thogs par gyurd te/ de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te// mang du byas pas na lus zhig nas shi ba
18a1(mdo): li 'og tu ngan song dang 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de dag sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos nas las kyi lhag ma lus pa des/ dud 'gro'i
18a2(mdo): pa/ nanas su skye bar gyur te/ deng kha cig ni re'i stobs dang ldan kha cig ni sder mo'i stobs dang ldan kha cig ni mche' pa'i stobs dang ldan par gyur te/ rgyu des na kha cig ni mra'i stobs dang ldan
18a3(mdo): kha cig ni sder mo 'i stobs dang ldan kha cag na mcha' ba'i dang ldan par gyur ta// kha cig ni mche' ba'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur to// ci'i phyir spu shor bar 'gyurd ce na smras pa/ sa
18a4(mdo): li khams kyi shas cha pa'i shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan ya pa sems can gang dag sngon myir gyur pas na/ lus kyi las rtsub pa dang / yid kyi las rtsub pa de dag nyes par spyod
18a5(mdo): pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de dag nas shi
18a6(mdo): 'phos nas gal te myi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'dir skyes na yang las kyi lhag ma lus pa des spu bshor par rgyu rang to// ci'i phyir spu 'jam par 'gyu rad ce na/ smras pa/ sems
18a7(mdo): can gang dag sngon myir gyur pa na/ lus kyi las rtsub pa mi byas/ ngag gi las rtsub pa ma byas yid kyi las rtsub pa ma byas te/ de dag lags pa spyod pa kun tu ston cing bsgoms te/ 
18a8(mdo): mang du byas pa des lus zhig nas/ shi pa'i 'og tu bdel 'gro mthol ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas gal te myi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par khams
18b1(mdo): khams 'dir skyes na yang las kyi lpag sa lus pa des su 'jam pa rang 'gyur te/ rgyu des na su 'jam par gyur to// ci'i phyir dug grag par 'gyur zhed/ smras pa// gnod sem
18b2(mdo): kyi khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dug grag pa de dag gi nang nas nye zhing du bas nye par shi 'phos pa yin te de dag kyang gang zhen 'di lta ste/ sgrub
18b3(mdo): sdig pa dang / sAng dgod mdung gsum gsum pa dang / sAng rgod mdung gsum pa chen po dang / srin gyi myed la gtsigs pa ste/ skye sar dug drug par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dug drug thA
18b4(mdo): myi 'gyur zhe smras pa/ gnod sems myed pa'i shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dug drag pa ma yin pa de dag gi nang nas/ nye zhing dubs nye bar zhi 'phos
18b5(mdo): pa rnams yin te/ de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang sro/ de rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang / khyim pa/ dag rnams dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa na
18b6(mdo): spyod pa'i lha rnams te// rgyu des na dug grag par gyi 'gyur ro// ci phyir chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par 'gyur zhe na/ smrab pa/ sems can gang dag
18b7(mdo): skom zhing gdungs la skams te/ chu 'dod bzhin du 'chi ba de dag lus zhig nas/ mun gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// mi'i phyir bya rnams dang
18b8(mdo): sam pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhe na smras pa sems can gang dag dog cing yongs su zin par 'gyurar te/ ko skabs yangs pa 'dod bzhin du/ 'chi ba de dag sum zhig nas bya rnams dang
19a1(mdo): banal pa mnyam par 'gyuraro// 'gro ba der sbyin par gyur pa'i las byas shing bsugs pa sas kyang 'gyur te/ rtsar gnas pa rnams dang sa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// 
19a2(mdo): ci'i phyir phyogs bkren pa zas dang skom chung pa rnams skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon myir gyur pa na/ lus kyi las sgrub pa po dang / rang gi las rtsub po dang / 
19a3(mdo): yid kyi las sgrub por gyur pa de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa de lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og du ngan meng ngam 'a/ ltung ba// sems can dmyal ba rnams/ 
19a4(mdo): su skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te de nas shi 'phos nas/ 3das 'dir myi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes nas/ las kyi lhag ma lus pa de sa 'dir sa phyogs bkren pa las dang / skom nyu
19a5(mdo): pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu de nas phyogs bkren pa zas dang nga skom myud pa dag du skye bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir sa byo// gas gshan pa zas skom mod pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhe na// 
19a6(mdo): smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon myir gyur pa na/ lus kyi las drag po dang / ngag gi las grag po dang / yid kyi las drag por gyur pa de dag legs par spyod pa kun tu sten cing bsgoms te ma/ 
19a7(mdo): du byas pa des/ lus zhig nas shi pa'i 'og tu bdel 'gro mtho ris 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te de nas shi 'phos nas/ khams 'dir myi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par
19a8(mdo): khyod ya la kyi sngags sus pa des 'ad sa phyogs gzhinapa sa dang gapa mod padag tu bri bar 'gyu // daphyogs gshin pa'as dang gas med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// 
19b1(mdo): chos mngon pa'i stan bcos dge' pa dang myi dge' ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu snyan pa rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu drug pa'o// sdos ni / sems cadan dmyal ba spus dang / 
19b2(mdo): byi ba khyi// glang chen rta dang rnga mo dang / ba lang bong bu ri dgas dang / ra lug khwa rnams tshogs kyi sdom// sems can dmyal ba dag 'i 'phos pa rnams kyi/ rnam pa ni gang dag yin rtags
19b3(mdo): ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag skem pa dang / ngan pa la dga' ba dang / mdog dran pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang / sdang skyen pa dang / 'bros pa dang / 
19b4(mdo): lug mdog chog pa ltar 'dug pa dang rmi lam na mye dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' po che dang / mtshon nas 'bras lta bu dang / me la'u thung / lugs kyi zangs
19b5(mdo): kyi/ khang zangs kyi nang du bsreg par rmi ba de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar sems can dmyal pa dag nas shi 'pho/ nyes pa rnams rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag
19b6(mdo): yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no/ sprul dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems
19b7(mdo): can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang // rang bzhin gyis gnyid che ba dang / dargod bag can dang / khas bub du nyal ba dang / nyal pa la rtag pa dang / lce 'byin pa dang
19b8(mdo): lde ldag pa/ khro sbyin pa dang / 'jebs par 'dug pa dang / shas cher 'dug pa/ 'khon du 'dzin pa de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar sbrul dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ sprul
20a1(mdo): dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ning dag yin no// byi ma rag gi rnas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam
20a2(mdo): pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / su rang ba dang / su mang pa
20a3(mdo): dang / gnod pa byed pa dang / 'tshe bar byed pa dang / khyim 'bigs pa dang / mun pa'i nang tu dgal pa dang / kha zas myur pa myur zla ba dang / kha bas myung dus kyang chog par
20a4(mdo): 'dzin pa de dag ni nye zhing dubs nye bar byi ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ byi ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa dam sa kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag ni
20a5(mdo): no// rtags ni de dag yin no// khyi dag gi nang nas/ shi 'phos pa nims kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe
20a6(mdo): smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing ma phyogs pa dang / spu rang pa dang / su mang ba dang / spu shor pa dang / snying rje pa dang / zas la gdu pa dang / ngo ma shes pa
20a7(mdo): la sdang ba de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar khyi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ khyeng dag gi nus shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no/ mtshan ma ni de dag yin no/ rtags nide
20a8(mdo): dag yin no// glang po tshe dag gi nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags na gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs
20b1(mdo): gyu zhing ma gyogs pa dang / su ring ba dang / sum pa dang / su shor pa dang / ma ring ba dang / rtse ba dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / skye che ba dang / lus kyi mdog ngad pa dang / sA ring pa dang / 
20b2(mdo): glad pa 'bur pa dang / kha dog la dga' ba dang / rkang pa zlum pa dang / so drug mthol ba de dag nye nyi mang po che dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te// glang po che dag gi nang nas kyi 'phos pa
20b3(mdo): rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtagapa ni de dag yin no// rta dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag
20b4(mdo): yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sem sa can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / su ring pa dang / su med pa dang / su shor pa dang / rta skad 'byin pa
20b5(mdo): dang / brgyan pa la dga' ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i shas che ba de dag ni nye zhing dus nye bar rta dag gi nang nas shi 'phos/ pa yin te/ rta dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi
20b6(mdo): rnam pa na de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// rnga mo dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnam sa kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag
20b7(mdo): rtagapa ni gang dag yin zhen smras pa// sems cad gang dag shugs byung zhing mgyogs pa dang / su ring ba dang / su med pa dang / sru shor ba dang / stobs che ba dang / skra ring pa
20b8(mdo): mchung mchad pa dang // 'gron pa dgye gur 'dug pa de dag ni nye zhing dub pa nye bar rnga mo dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ rnga mo de dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni
21a1(mdo): de dag yin/ mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// ba yang dag gi nas gi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yon// sams ni gang dag yin rtogs ni gang dag son
21a2(mdo): zhen smras pa ga sems can gang dag shugs gyur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / su mang pa dang / su shor ba dang / ko che ba dang / stobs che ba dang / su ba dang / zlos zhing sdang pa dang / 
21a3(mdo): du za pa dang / rba'i sa 'bur pa de dag ni/ nye zhing dub nye par ba lang gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ ba lang go nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtag
21a4(mdo): ni de dag yin no// bo bu dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag
21a5(mdo): shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / su ring pa dang / su mas pa dang / spu bshor pa dang / bum gsus por 'dug pa/ dang / sa rkos pa dang / skad myi snyan pa dang / du skad can dang
21a6(mdo): myi rtsad pa 'dam pa de dag nye zhing du bas nye bar bong bu dag gi nang nas sha 'phos pa yin te/ bong bu dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnam sa kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// 
21a7(mdo): rtags ni de dag yin no// ri dgas rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag/ zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur
21a8(mdo): zhing / mgyogs pa dang / su ring ba dang // spu mang ba dang / spu shor ba dang / 'jigs pa/ bag tsha ba dang / sdang skyen pa dang / 'bros pa dang // dgon par dga' zhing / der mngon par dag
21b1(mdo): de dag sa sa dang dubyas kyi par midags kyin na na yin/ ri dgas rnams kyin sa 'tshas parnams kyi rnam pazhi dag pa do// mtshan ma ni dag yin do// klu ni dang / 
21b2(mdo): no/ bdag gi nang nas ga 'gom pa rnams kyi rnas pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ dgas ni gang dag yod nas/ mA mu pa/ sems cad gang dag shug sa zung da mchogs byung
21b3(mdo): spu rang ba dang / spu mang pa dang / su shor pa dang / shing 'cha ba dang / yang par rgyu ba dang / nyi ma la dga' ba dang / lhags pa la sdad ba de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar bdag gi nang nas shi 'phob pa
21b4(mdo): rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// sug dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ 
21b5(mdo): rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag/ shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang / pa dang / spu 'jam pa dang / de rtul par byed/ sa rdul glong bar
21b6(mdo): byed pa dang / 'go 'phang smad te 'gro ba dang / snabs mang pa dang / myi gtsang da kun tu spyod pa de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar lug gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ lug gi nang nas shi 'phos pazhis
21b7(mdo): kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// khwa dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan sa ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang
21b8(mdo): dag yin/ zhe na smras pa/ sems can gtsam bu dag mu cod smra ba dang / spyo rtol can dang / snying ring pa dang / byas pa myi bzol pa dang / snying rje myed pa dang / dgang dka' ba dang / ma byin pa
22a1(mdo): na pa ni da / pa da/ da/ na pa'i na na la dgas pa 'du 'o// 
22a2(mdo): srung kyi ma ba drad/ klung dang stag dang ming ge nga klu dang de bzhin kri ba dang / mi dgas dpon gyi rnams dang / ldan mos tshogs kyi sdom du ka dag ni ni tsham pa dmas
22a3(mdo): pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtagasani gang dag dzin zhe na/ smras pa// sems can gang dag tu gas myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring pa dang / su ma pa
22a4(mdo): su shes pa dang / bum gsus por 'dug pa dang / gdong dzapa dang / hA 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa dang / sa gdus kyi nang na 'dre ba dang / ngan pal pa dang / myi gtsang ba kun tu spyod pa dang / 
22a5(mdo): me dang mthol ba de dag ni nye zhing dubs nye bar phrag dag gi nang nas ni 'phes pa yin te/ gi yod te/ bka ngag gi nang nas ni 'phom pa rnams kyi rnam padi de dag yin no// 
22a6(mdo): mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// spri'u dag gi rang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan man gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ 
22a7(mdo): smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing 'gyogs pa dang / sU rang pa dang / pu mad pa dang / gru 'jam pa dang / spre'u 'dra ba dang // dmar ser du 'dug pa dang / shing la dga' ba dang
22b1(mdo): shing tog la dga' ba dang / 'jig pa la dga' ba dang / shing la 'dzeg pa dang / 'dzeg pa nas kyang 'jig pa la yun ring ba dang / thams cad du yang lam cig na gyi dug myi 'dug pa de dag ri'i zhing dubs
22b2(mdo): nye bar spre'u dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ spre'u dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// dom dag ka ned nas shi gro
22b3(mdo): pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring pa dang / spu mad pa dang
22b4(mdo): spu shor pa dang / ngam skur can dang / dug rid can dang / lus 'gul pa can dang / du pa dang / shing la dga' ba dang / shing tog la dga' ba dang / 'dzeg pa la dga' ba dang / shing la 'jig
22b5(mdo): pa de dag ni nye zheng dubs nye bar dom kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ des dag gi nang nas shi 'phes pa rnams kyi che pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag
22b6(mdo): yin no// sre spyad dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyog
22b7(mdo): pa dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang ba dang / spu shor pa dang / g.yo byed pa dang / g.yon can dang / sgyu cad dang / dbyen byed pa dang / 'chang 'dru ba dang / spyod yul skyed pa de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye
22b8(mdo): par lce spyang dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ lce spyang dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// spyad kyi
23a1(mdo): ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni kapa dag yin/ mtshan ma 'i gang dag yin/ rtags mi gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / su rang
23a2(mdo): pa ba dang / su mang ba dang / sU sher ba dang / ka tsam bu dang / mu cor smra ba dang / spyi rtes che ba dang / snying rtse ba myed pa dang / snying rje myed pa dang / snying ring ba dang / byasas pa myi bzod pa dang / sha khrag pa zhing
23a3(mdo): 'thung ba de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar spyad kyi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ spyad kyi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no/ rtags ni de dag
23a4(mdo): no// spyang gi ji lta ba bzhin 'phar pa dang / gred dang gung rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar sbyar ro// stag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa/ rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ 
23a5(mdo): rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa// sems can gang dag shu/ gas myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ride pa dang / spu mang // pa dang / spu shor pa dang / dpa' ba dang / gtum pa dang / 
23a6(mdo): rtsal che ba dang / gtsam pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / spyi rtol che ba dang / snying skye ba myed pa dang / snying ring ba dang / byas pa myi bza' pa dang / sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba de dag ni nye zhing dubs
23a7(mdo): nye bar stag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te// stag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// seng ge dag gi rang
23a8(mdo): nas gi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin/ zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / su ring pa
23b1(mdo): dang su mang za dang / su shor ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gtum pa dang / stobs che ba dang / snying rtse ba myed pa dang / snying rje myed pa dang / sha khrag pa mthung ba dang / sha sar+ra pa za pa de dag ni nye
23b2(mdo): zhing dubs nye bar meng ge dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ seng ge dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// klu
23b3(mdo): dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / rang bzhin
23b4(mdo): kyis gnyid che ba dang / khas bub du nyal ba dang / nyal la rtag pa dang / tshul dga' ba dang / ser sna che ba dang / byad rnams kun tu 'dzind pa dang / myi ste pa'i rang bzhin
23b5(mdo): can de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar klu dag gi nang nas shi 'phosapa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// dri za dag ga nang nas shi 'phro
23b6(mdo): pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yon// mtshan ma ni gang dag yan/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na smras pa/ sems can gang dag gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / rol mo/ 
23b7(mdo): la sred pa dang / sil snyan dang / theg rdob pa dpyod pa dang / sbed mo la sred pa dang / dga' dgur skyed pa la sred pa de dag ni nye zhing dubs nye bar dra ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de
23b8(mdo): dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no/ rtags ni de dag yin no// yi dgas dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag
24a1(mdo): kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan mdi de dag yin no// rtagapa ni de dag yin no// mi dag gi nang nas shi 'bas pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan sa ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ 
24a2(mdo): sAlA pa/ sems can gang dag las la sred pa dang / mapongs med pa dang / yabs shes pa dang / pha ma la gus pa dang / bri dang / rtog pa'i rang bzhin dang / dge ba gang yin bu tshong bad / 
24a3(mdo): na nye zhing dubs nye mar phye dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ myi dag gi rang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag ma nin// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// 
24a4(mdo): wa dag gnang nas gi 'ams pa rnams kyi rnas pa ni gang dag mis// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen smras pa/ sems can gang dag gzugs bzang zhing snyan thugs mdzes pa dang / nam
24a5(mdo): pa skyed pa dang / bden par swA pa de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye par lha dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ lnga dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan pa ri nga yin no/ 
24a6(mdo): ni de dag yin no// de rnams dang lus thob pa lus thob pa gzhan dag kyang rtogs par byas nas/ gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du 'arjod par bya te/ yi ge mangs su dgas pa'i phyir ma sbom zo// chos
24b1(mdo): mngon pa'i bstan chos chen po chu gdams pa las tshigs bco brgyad pa'o// sem na shing ba 'i dang ni so mar bcas// ras pas rgyud dang ke ku dang / de bzhin drang po phyogs cig dang / 'brung
24b2(mdo): bcas 'di ni tshogs mtha' rdzogs/ ci phyir 'jam bya grib pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang nas/ shing 'jam bu de dag mchog cen smras pa/ 'jig rten chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i
24b3(mdo): dang / bzang ba'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang yin pa de/ phyogs der krung dag gis sdus nas/ de las de grub par gyur te/ skyengs na 'jam bya gling gi shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shib 'dzam bu dag ni
24b4(mdo): mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi shing thams dad kyi nang na shing shal ma mthon po de dag gi mchog ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang
24b5(mdo): snying po'i mchog dang / bzang po'i mchog dang / gzong gi mtsho ka gang yin pa de/ phyogs der klung gos bskus nas/ de las de grub par gyur te/ rgyu des na/ rgya mtsho la'i 'gram kyi
24b6(mdo): shing thams cad kyi nang na shing shal ma 'i mthon po de dag gis mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir lha ma yin gyi rigs kyi shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing pa ta li sna tshogs can de dag gi mchog ces
24b7(mdo): bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / bzang pa'i mchog dang / 'ong gi mchog gang yin pa de phyogs der krung dag gis bsdus nas// de
24b8(mdo): las grub par gyur te/ rgyu des na lha ma yin gyi rigs kyi shing thams cad kyi nang nas shing pa ta li sna tshogs dang / de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i shing thams cad
25a1(mdo): kyi nang nas shing ta li sna tshogs dang/ de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir sum bcul ma gsum pa'i zhing thams cad kyi nabangs/ shing yongs su sa brto mi de dag thams cad kyi mchog ces
25a2(mdo): bya zhe na smrab pa/ 'jig rten chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / bzang ba'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang yin pa de/ phyogs deng rlung gis bsdus nas/ de las de grub
25a3(mdo): par gyur te/ rgya des na sum bcu la rtsa gsum pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing yongs su sa brtol de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir sos ka dang dbyar/ shing kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yo
25a4(mdo): pa dang / 'bras bu yod par gyur la/ kha cig ni lo ma myed pa dang / mye tog myed pa dang / 'bras bu myed pa par 'gyur zhe na smras pra/ zla ba drug nyi ma byang phyogs na 'dug ste// byang phyogs
25a5(mdo): na 'dug pa na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams byu nas gling rnams su babs ste/ des na rgya mtsho chen po bri/ sil par 'gyur la/ chu bsil pa de yang gling rnams kyi nang du/ 
25a6(mdo): 'gro ste/ shing gang dag chu bsas pa deng bdel bar 'gyur ba'i sho bo de dag ni/ so ma yod pa dang mye tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod por 'gyur la/ shing gang dag chab bsil pa des/ bdel par/ 
25a7(mdo): skye bar myi 'byur ba de dag ni lo ma byed pa dang / me tog myed pa dang 'bras bu myed pa gyur tete// skyedes na mos ka dbang byar shing kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / mye tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ 
25a8(mdo): shing kha cig ni se ma byed pa dang / me tog myed pa dang / 'bras bu byed pa 'gyur zhen/ snyam pa/ zla ba drug nyim lo phyogs na 'dug ste/ lho phyogs na 'dug pa na dpag tshad bzhi khri nas zhi ba'i 'od zer
25b1(mdo): nas byung nas rgyamatsho chen par 'bab ste/ de ras rgyam med pa'i sugro par 'gyun pa/ mngon 'i lung sring rnams kyi dang tu 'greste/ kaudu kang du// sunan mi skye ma 'dzin
25b2(mdo): de dag ni/ sa ma yod pa dang / mye tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par gyur la/ shing gang dag chu drom pa des bde bar skye bar myi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ se ma myed pa dang me tog/ myed pa dang / 'bras bu/ 
25b3(mdo): skyed par 'gyur te/ rkyedes na/ mus shing kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / mye tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu med par gyur sa/ shing kha cig la ni so ma myed pa dang / mye tog myed pa dang / 'bras bu
25b4(mdo): myed par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir ras pal zhes bya/ !sa pa/ skal pa dang po'i myi rnams kyi/ dpag gsamasad kyi shing las ras byung ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung
25b5(mdo): pa ni de yin te/ rgyu des na ras bal zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir chun zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skal pa dang po'o myi rnams kyi/ nags kyi snum bur gyur pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu mthun pa las/ 
25b6(mdo): byang ba de yin te / rgyu des na rgun zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir shing kha cig dgye dgur 'dug la/ kha cig drang por 'dug ce na/ smras pa/ rlung gi bag gis 'gyur te/ shing gang dag la rlung rnams mthun
25b7(mdo): bar gyur pa/ de dag ni dang por 'dug go// shing gang dag rlung rnams kyis myi mthun par gyur pa de dag ni dgye dgur 'dug ste/ rgyu des na shi kha cing dgyeng dgur 'dug la/ kha cig dang po pa 'dug
25b8(mdo): go// ci'i phyir chu cig gis rlan pa'i sa phyogs cig tu shing kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gyur te/ kha dog cig par ma gyur/ rtags gcig par ma
26a1(mdo): gyur/ dbyibs gcig par ma gyur ce na/ smras pa/ sa bon kyi dbang gis 'gyur te/ sa bon ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin tu/ sa yang sa'i bcud len par byed/ chu yang chu'i bcud senas
26a2(mdo): par byed/ mye yang me'i bcud len par byed/ rlung yang rlung gi bcud lend par byed de/ rgyu des na chu cig gis rlar pa'i sa phyogs su cig tu/ shing kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyib sna tshogs su gyur te/ 
26a3(mdo): kha deg cig par ma gyurd/ dbyab gcig par ma gyurd to// ci'i phyir shing thams cad la 'byung po yod par 'gyur te/ 'byung po rnams kyis bden par ma gyur ce na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten chags pa
26a4(mdo): 'tshen zhing snang bar byed pa'i 'byung po'i bdag po zhig can dan gyi shing chen po bzhi la gnas par gyur to// 'bru nga po lhag ma rnams ni/ de ma yin pa'i shing dag la gnas par
26a5(mdo): gyur te/ de dag gos thog ma gnas su byas te/ cig nas cig tu rgyud te/ gzhan dag kyang gnas par gyur pa dang / 'byung po dag gis shing rnams/ sme bag byed pa dang / mchon
26a6(mdo): rten gyi gnas lta bu dang / gtsang ba dang / yid tu 'ong ba dang / sten pa'i 'os su byas te/ skye bag myed par gyu rad pa dang / mchod rten gyi gnas lta bur gyu rad pa dang / gtsang bar gyur pa dang
26a7(mdo): yid tu 'ong par gyur pa dang / sten pa'i rjes su gyu rad pa'i phyir/ 'byung po dag gis shing rnams gnas su byas te rgya dris na/ shing thams cad la 'byung ze yod par gyur te 'byung po nas
26a8(mdo): kyis bsted par ma gyur te// chos kyi rim pa'i skabs bya ba dang don dang / skud pa 'bras bu sa rmongs pa bzlog par byed pa bzang 'gro thob par byed pa drug pa'i 'bras bur gyur bar byed
26b1(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyis brtags pa'i chos mngon pa'i stan chos rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu dgu pa'o// // / chos mngon pa'i stan chos chen po rgyu gad/ 
26b2(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// @// / sangs rgyas kyi mdzod chos kyi yi ge// bam po gcig pa'o// mying cig ni chos so chog las gdams gsal pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzod bshad
26b3(mdo): pa'i yi ge'i le'u dang po ste// chos so chog gi bden pa'i mtshan ma'i le'u'o// 'di bzhin bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ sangs rgyas 'khar rgyal po'i khab kyi rI m+b+ha dge' slong chen po rnams dang
26b4(mdo): lhan cig du bzhugs te kun kyang phal kyis shes rig pa dang / mu myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha sug ste/ dpag tu myed grangs myed do// de 'itshe sha ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin
26b5(mdo): byung ste// sangs rgyas kyi thad du song nas/ 'phrag pa g.yas pa phyung ste/ 'gro dang gdong gis phyag btsal nas/ sangs rgyas la gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
26b6(mdo): gshegs pas bshad pa/ chos so chog kun skye ba yang myed 'gog pa yang myed/ mtshan ma yang myed/ byang pa ya pa myed na/ myi rnams yod ches shing shes par bgyis pa yod
26b7(mdo): dkon no// sangs rgyas kyis sha ri'i bu la bka' brtsa lang pa/ khyod kyis bsod nams ji zhig mthong na/ yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pas chos so chog kun la skye ba myed/ 'gog pa
