170b3(mdo): 'byo'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can dge ba'i che ba mdun/ dad pa rnams kyi na bar mdo' sde 'dri mos par myi 'gyur te/ kla dag rgya ngar 'jug pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' ni bskul 'byes
170b4(mdo): zag khrig brgya phrag stong du rtogs pa ma dkal lags so// de nom/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste// rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// de ltar byed rnams

170b6(mdo): ldan pa'i 'tshang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rtend de dag bcom ldan 'das kyim gsungs pa la 'di rangs te/ mdzod pa mastod do//

171a3(mdo): dge' slong gi dge' 'dun chen po dang thabs cig bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpal bdun khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dgel 'dun chen po dang / yang thabs cig go// de'i cha byang chub sems
171a4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa shes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du dus par gyur te/ 'dun go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams dpa' chen po byams pa stan las sangs nas/ thogs 'phrag pani
171a5(mdo): tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom sngam 'das/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung
171a6(mdo): bstan pa'i chu da tu bdag la/ skab dpe' bar gnang na/ bcom 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu ba 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
171a7(mdo): brtsal pa byams pa de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la rtag tu bskabs phyes/ byis pa khyod kyi dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gris shig dang // dris pa de dang de'i
171a8(mdo): lung bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' bcu sad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
171b1(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dag dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid par myi 'gyu pa dang / dud kyi mdzong thams cad kyis 'ad rabakyi pha ma rnam pa dang
171b2(mdo): bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'dal par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang / sems can rnams la snying pa che ba'i slad tu tshe ring bar bskyod bar bgyid pa dang / myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
171b3(mdo): par tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya byin te/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan
171b4(mdo): pa'i phyir zhus te/ skye bo mang po la bdel ba pa dang / 'jig rten pa bde' ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang myi rnam ras kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang 'de' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin
171b5(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la do// na 'di 'dri bar sems pa 'di ni legs so// de'i phyir bya ma/ sa pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bas
171b6(mdo): do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de sbyar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' brtsal to// 
171b7(mdo): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga dang ldan na/ bdud kyi rigs thams cad kyis/ dgegs bya bar myi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / 
171b8(mdo): sems can rnams la snying sde ba'i phyir tshe ring du spyod par byed pa dang / sems cad rnams pa snying sre ba'i phyir tshe ring bung spyod par byed pa dang / myur du blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogasa'i byang chub mngon par
172a1(mdo): rdzogs pa cang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sa lo dag gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ spyan mi 'chad par chos sbyin pa dang / rgyan gyi 'chad par sems can thams cad la kyi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / rlung
172a2(mdo): myi 'chad par byams pa chen po dang / 'di rje cher po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang stongs chen po zhem pa dang / rgyan gyi 'chad par 'ayod byed nying pa la rlom pa dang / rgyad kyi 'chad par sems can
172a3(mdo): cang byang chub kyi sems la mos par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches po rnams chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ lung kyis ya gags bya bar gyi 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis
172a4(mdo): 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems can rnams la snying skye ba'i phyir/ tshe ring tu skyod par byed pa dang / myur tu bla byed pa yang da dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par chang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ 
172a5(mdo): sa ldan 'das kyim chom lnga dang ldan pa 'di bshang pa la dge' slong lnga song na yi dad pa myed par zag pa thapa las mams par gros so// byang chub sems dpa' bdud khri nyis stong
172a6(mdo): ni myo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi'i bstod na chos rnams lachom rnam ma chos kyi myig nus myed cing / drim dang bral ba nyon mongs pa rgyang pa rnam par dag go// 
172a7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs lags so// bde' bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags
172a8(mdo): so// bcom 'das kyis bka' ba stsald pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin du bab par shes ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas/ de'i tshe snyan lan
172b1(mdo): yangs te Ta/ tha gos pra cig du gzham sa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i spangs la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de sogs su bal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce bo gsol ta/ ma
172b2(mdo): can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug thams cad kyi bro nad can dang / sa pa thams cad kyi rab rib dang / ling tog gi gi mun pas sgrib pa thams cad kyi bro nad gso pa dang / chos kyi myig bla na myed pa yongs su sbyang
172b3(mdo): pa'i slad tu bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstand 'di/ a la la rmad tu 'byung ba chen po lags so// / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsan pa 'di ni sa la la bdud sna chen po lags so// 
172b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstand pa 'di ni/ a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bu lags so// / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa yang rung ste gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
172b5(mdo): grags par gyur pa de dag ni dge' ba'i sra pa chen po'i tshogs pa dag ste/ sems can las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/ sangs/ rgyas thams cad la lta ba dang ldan pa lags/ skye bo mang po la lhag par
172b6(mdo): bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/ dga' ba'i stsa pa bskrun pa lags so// de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su dag nas/ dud 'gro li yul de las yongs su tha rad te/ myi li lus thob par 'gyur zhing / thob nas
172b7(mdo): kyang cha rabs snga ma dan te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la dad pa rnyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'chal pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur na phyir gyur nas thos pa rnams su smos kyang cing du
172b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam granga'i 'di thos pa de ni de ltar sems can rnams kyi don chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ bla na pyod
173a1(mdo): na ma par rdzogs byang chub sa nges pa'i tshogs la grangs par gyur ba lams te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag ni/ de bzhin gagags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
173a2(mdo): kyis yongs su bzung bas/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsusad// byams pa legs so legs so// 
173a3(mdo): byams pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no// / de ni bden no// de ni/ de kho na'o// de ni mnor pa'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the tshom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge' ba'i
173a4(mdo): su ba chu du dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag the tshom myed par nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / rgya che bar yang dag par lta smos kyang ci dgos
173a5(mdo): mdo' sde 'dzi nad pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar myi 'byu// ra ro// de dag la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang ser sna dang / khro ba dang / gnod semaH gnod
173a6(mdo): par myi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la rims nad dang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yul gang na mdo'i sde 'di lta bu 'dzind pa dang / chos smra ba gnas pa 'am/ chos kyi rnam grangs nyid glegs pam tu bris
173a7(mdo): te/ yod pa'i yub der nang dang / yams kyi nang dang gnod pa dang / 'go' ba'i nang dang / 'jug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a8(mdo): chen po byam sa pas 'di ga kyis nams to// bcom ldan 'das sad pa'i mi skad pa'i dus la brgyabs sa das pa'i chos 'dzig par gyur ba'i dus sa pa cing / nga rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig pas bya/ 
173b1(mdo): na mdo'i sde 'dzind pa 'di lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis dus ma lags bser ma dang / dgung tshar dang mu ge dang / bro nad kyi yang ba dang / gyi ngas dang / yams kyi rang dang / 'gro ba'i nad dang / 
173b2(mdo): gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / grags bam du bgyis pa 'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi sde mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i
173b3(mdo): yul deng bdag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis pha rol kyi dmag tshogs tham sa cad dang / chom dkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'grol ma'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// gang dag na chos smra ba
173b4(mdo): 'di lta bu dag dang / mdo'i sde 'di 'chang pa'i yul der bdag gisalo tog dang / nor dang / 'brul dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad yun gsum 'tshogs pa dang / bde' ba
173b5(mdo): thams cad 'byung bar byin kyis brlabs par bgyi' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ byams pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi don kyi phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs
173b6(mdo): su bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir go che chen po bgos te seng ge'i sgra spags pa legs so// legs sor / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la khyod yongs su gtad kyis
173b7(mdo): phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya thA ma la de pa'i sa nub pa'i dus la bab cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur la/ 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grasas 'di
174a1(mdo): 'o// bcabargas bcas/ rgyal zu sa med dgag la skyo pa rgya// dadas pa chom nyi ma ma byas pasod par brtson pas kan
174a2(mdo): bya ba rab tu bklags par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid khong las brtsams te dbang du byams 'astan par bya'o// yin pa kyang skyes zungam pa de dag gis chos kyi napa grangs 'di'is pa bzhin tu byin mi ma log par mngon par
174a3(mdo): rtogs par gyur pa de sar bstanang par bya'o// ces pakyang skyes bu das pa de dag gis ris kyidang tha ma dzings pa ba'i tu phyid kyis yo par / yod par rtog ra 'gyur ba de skar bsnyad par bya'o/ byang chub sems
174a4(mdo): dpa' byams pas gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de sngar 'chas lo// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha na sgra dang / tshangs pa pang / bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams kyis
174a5(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dug tu phyin pa'i dus sa bab par shes nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ yo byams pa mi tog dang / gdugs dang / chos dang
174a6(mdo): tog dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / byem dang gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyas macad dang/ tha da dag gis mchod das/ 'di skad ceme bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pam
174a7(mdo): khyim don babyis pa/ chos kyi nas byangs 'dini yu las bdud rtsi 'arjod pa legs so'i ma'o// de nas cocom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa kung dga' bo la bka' 'astsas ba/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam di khye
174a8(mdo): kyim chos kyi nam grangs 'di lung shig/ yi ker bris shig/ tshangs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis zhig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs mthung
174b1(mdo): lagasas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phying cis gte/ 'di ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi nam grangs 'di bdud kyi
174b2(mdo): bdod pa zhes bya bar rung shig/ byams pas zhus de zhes bya bar yang zung shig// bcom ldan 'das kyis me skad ces bka' bstsal da nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
174b3(mdo): byams pa dang / dge' slong dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor / de dang / sa dang gyi dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig ten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das
174b4(mdo): kyis gsungs pa sa mngod par bstod do// 'phags pa bdud ci rjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ thogs s+ho// byug kyi sa khan po zad nya bar pa dang / chen gyi lomabs
174b5(mdo): de migs sde bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa rgya gar skad du du ma cag gzung / bod skad tu sa kyi 'khor lo'i mdol// thams cad mkhyend pa la phyag
174b6(mdo): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus cig na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa ran se drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge' slong rnams la bas
174b7(mdo): bsum pa/ dge' slong dag sdod ma mos pa'i chos rnams la/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o// zhes tshul bzhin yin sa byed pa na myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang / blo dang rtog pa rtse
174b8(mdo): lo// dge slong dag rjod mam ma ma kyim rnams sa/ 'din drug pas bur 'byung ba'o// 'dor mug bslas gas na'o// 'di thug pas 'ashog par 'gro' ba'i lam mo'is chus pa'in yid byer
175a1(mdo): pa ra / byig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang / blo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag ljon pa bos pa'i chos rnas la/ drug sngal 'phags pa'i bdes med ras mngon par shes pas so
175a2(mdo): pa/ su shes par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ma myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang / glo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dgel slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phags
175a3(mdo): pale bden pade ngas mngon par shes pas spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ma/ myig skyes so// shes pa dang / reg pa dang / klo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos
175a4(mdo): rnams la stug sngal 'gog pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon gsum tu bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa
175a5(mdo): dang / glo dang rtogs pa skyes so// dge 'a slong dag ngas sngo/ na ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug sngal 'gog par 'gro/ pa'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de/ ngas mngon par shes pas
175a6(mdo): sgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ myig skyes so// gos pa dang rig pa dang / glo dang gartogs pa skyes so// dge' slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug sngal 'phags pa'i
175a7(mdo): pa sa nga rjed pa/ skye / shes pa dang ga nga nga pa pa/ smre/ slong pa
175a8(mdo): rnams la/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'phagasa'i bden pa de/ ngas mngon par shes pas spangs so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa la dang / glo dang rtogs pa
175b1(mdo): skyes so// dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas// mngon gsum du byas so zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na
175b2(mdo): myig skyes so// shes pa dang rig pa dang / blo dang gartogs pa skyes so// dkal slong dag pa ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhil po 'di rnams de ltar lan gsuM du bzlas te/ rnam bcu'i gnyis su
175b3(mdo): bskor pa'i myig ma skyes/ shes pa ma yin/ rig pa ma yin/ blo ma yin/ rtogs pa skyes pa de srid du/ nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge' sbyo
175b4(mdo): dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myir bcas pa de 'di rnams las grol pa dang / rab tu grol ba dang / byin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyurd cing
175b5(mdo): dge la slog/ dag ras bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dge' slo de dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnaMs
175b6(mdo): sa/ de stan lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu'i gnyis su bskor ba'i myig skyes shing shes pa dang / rig pa dang / blo dang / rtogs pa skyes pa de nas/ ba lha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten/ bdud
175b7(mdo): dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge' sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mir bcas pa ni 'di las grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / mi ldan pa dang
175b8(mdo): ma tu gros pa dang byin ci log dang bral po'i ses sa gyis yang du gnas par gyudad cing/ dge la slong dag ngas de nas blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngam
176a1(mdo): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ga su so// chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' sasu la pa la/ tshe dang ldan pa ko 'u di mya dang / lha brgyad khris chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed
176a2(mdo): cing dri ma bral ba skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ko lu stsal bka' ya stsal pa/ ko 'u di n+ta khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/ bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lags so// 
176a3(mdo): kun shes sam/ bdel par gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags so// kun 'tshal lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kro shu d+hi n+yas chos kun shes pas/ de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa ko'u b+himA kun shes
176a4(mdo): ko 'u b+hin+ta zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// tshe dang ldan/ ba ko'u din+ya chos kun shes so zhes/ sa za'i gnod sbyin rnams sA sgrogs par byed de/ grogs po dag bcom ldan
176a5(mdo): 'das kyis ba ra na ser drang srong spa ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu'i gnyis su su chos kyi khor lo chos dang ldan pa/ dga' spyod dam// bram ze 'am
176a6(mdo): lha 'am/ bdud dang / tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor pa/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde' pa dang / 'jig rten la snying skye ba dang / lha dang myi
176a7(mdo): rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde' ba'i phyir bskord pa pas/ lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing / lha ma yin kyi rigs yongs su nyams so// zhes dbyangs bsgrags so// sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams
176a8(mdo): kyi sgra thos nas/ nam mkha' la gyu pa'i gnod sbyin dang / rgyal chen bzhi la'i ris dang / sum bcu la su gsum pa'i lha dang / 'ja' bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
176b1(mdo): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas/ skad cig de dang / zang cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / skad cig dang / zad cig dang / yud tsam de la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten kyi badra sgra sgrags so// tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams
176b2(mdo): kyis sgra sgrogs par byed de/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ra na ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum tu bzlas te/ nai pa bcul gnyis bya tshab kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa/ dge'
176b3(mdo): ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par 'ga' yang ma bskor ba/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bdal pa dang / 'jig rten la snying skye ba dag
176b4(mdo): lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde' ba'i phyir bskor pa sa/ lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing / lha ma yin kyi ris yong sa su nyams so zhes bya bar bsgrags so// bcom ldan 'das
176b5(mdo): byis pa ran ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas/ de'i phyir chos kyi rnam
176b6(mdo): grangs 'di sa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes tshig bla dgas su btags so// chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdo'i/ rdzogs s+ho// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ba ra ma
176b7(mdo): d+harna ma tsa sa mam ma nyas su dza/ zod skad du 'phags pa dod dam pa'i chos kyi rnamaca par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa ched pa'i mdol/ bam byoH/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
176b8(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par ga ya'i ri la dge' slong mngon par zhugs
177a1(mdo): pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgul bcu sdu dgu dang thabs cig / bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag nyi shu sa rgyang dang / dgel slong dang / dge 'a slong ma dang / dag
177a2(mdo): sbyin pa brgyad khri drug stong dang / kyang chub khri dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcur gnyis dang / drang phreng ched po mngon par rishes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdung ba lngas yan lamachin pa lnga brgya ya lag kang bag myed cing / rus
177a3(mdo): go lags kyis mamigs pa/ sozhang zhing gA'i bus khyer ba su dgyu pa/ gsang bzhi 'dang // shing gur gyoran pa/ ga ris pa thegs pa 'argyad rdzi ba'i 'aslong dang blams rten go// zas par 'dun pa rnams dang ldan
177a4(mdo): cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na/ ri'i rgyal po'i rab ltar/ drang srong rnams kyi nang na lam me/ lten lha de ste/ lug rnams kyi nang na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche' ba drug pa 'dra la/ 
177a5(mdo): srin bu me khyer kyi drung na nyi zla dang mtshungs shing s+yA ka sha'i me tog gi nang na/ man d+har ba'i yal kang pa 'dral/ nam kha lding ki rgyal po bya rog gis skor pa dang 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das
177a6(mdo): rlung srong rnams kyi nab nyis 'byung tu mengs so// bdas bcom pa na 'das rin po che gtong ba zhes bya ba'o pang 'di nang sa soms pa rizhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrus dpag tu byed par medzad cing
177a7(mdo): rmo g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu myed pa phyung / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu myed pa phyung / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spyod pa
177a8(mdo): dpag tu myed pa phyur/ dgra bco brgyad stong dpag tu myed pa phyung / dge' slong dang / dgel slong ma dang / dge' bsnyend dang / dge' snyen ma rab rgya stong dag tu myed pa phyung / 'khor los sgyur pa dang / 
177b1(mdo): stobs kyi 'khor los spyad pa dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / rigs sngags 'chang dpag tu myed pa phyung / rgya dang ri brags pa dang / 'gro lding pa dang / so phyogs pa dang / nags khrod pa dpag tu myed pa/ 
177b2(mdo): phyung / rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gipas chen po lta bu dang / gyi gzugs dang cha byad dang / mdog dang / sba pa'i skad sna tshogs pa ci snyed pa dang / lha'i rigs pa ste
177b3(mdo): pa de dag/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo // de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom tu gyur nas/ phan tshun gdong du lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs
177b4(mdo): pa nas// rgyan thams cad kyi bar kyi char 'bebs so// de nas bya com ldan 'das rin po che gtod pa'i ting nge 'dzind las bzhengs tre/ seng ge sgyings pas phyogs bcud rnam par gzigs so// btso
177b5(mdo): ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcud rnam par gzigs ma thag tu// de na/ sa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ sangs rgyas// bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la/ snang ba de thams/ 
177b6(mdo): cad lag 'phel du bzhag pa bzhin du/ myi 'jed 'jig rten gi khams su kun tu snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas ji ltar phyung ba de 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrug
177b7(mdo): kyi cho 'phrul byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprus pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang tu 'dun
177b8(mdo): bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpal dpag tu byed pa dag kyang / dge' slong dang dge 'a slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge' snyen ma gang ka'i byem med dag dang / lhan cig du de bzhin gdos
179a1(mdo): kyis sul babyed du 'dun mi 'dir rtsam sa ma / skyes bu ngan pa dang / rnam sa 'am nusas kyis 'di 'grub pa de das bachos ldan 'ad sa/ 'dun pa'i sa kyis nang smo/ 
179a2(mdo): gi tshogs la ma kun tu gzigs nas/ drang srong chen po me ston la 'di skad ces bka' su med to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po tsa nus kyis/ dri pa dris shi ka dang / rnam par spyad par bya'o// 
179a3(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das pa drang srong chen po me sgron kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ko shuta ma sems can gyi skye gnas byung / ci'i slad tu skal pas bsreg par 'gyur/ sems can rnams
179a4(mdo): gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang na sems can za pa 'khrul gang tsam 'am/ mtho la gang tsam 'am/ 'dzub mo tsam 'am/ 'the' bo tsam 'am/ nas dang gro dang / mon sran sde'u dang
179a5(mdo): mon sran gre 'u dang / til dang / yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ sems cad ji tsam zhig rang na mchis dka' stsol da cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me smon la drang
179a6(mdo): chen po legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byi nad no// che skal pa drug bcu pa'i dri ba dri ba 'di ni mthun pa'o// de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong
179a7(mdo): chen po mi smon gyis tshe'i tshad na ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas/ rnam pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na/ 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsuld pa/ drang srong chen
179a8(mdo): po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gnas byung zhes smra ba de ni/ yi ge sa brjod pa ma yin pa'o// sems can/ 
179b1(mdo): zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i brkyen nas skye ba dang / dga' shi'i bar du 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po rgyu rkyen las sems cad skye ste rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o// drang srong chen po yang ma ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// gang gi tshe
179b2(mdo): yongs su gtogs pas kun nas bsrang pa'i las kyi drung rnams kyis bud myed kyi grod tu 'dug pa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang stug sngol 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug sngal kun 'byung ba dang
179b3(mdo): sdug sngal 'gog pa dang / sdug sngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no/ nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga dang / khams bcwa' brgyad ni sems can no// drang srong chen po sems can
179b4(mdo): gzhan la las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang rkar gzhan la sems can yang gzhan ma yin no// drang srong chen po sems can sems cad ni 'grib pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no/ drang srong chen
179b5(mdo): pos gsol pa/ kye ko 'u ta ma gal te/ sems can la 'grib pa ma mchis/ 'phel pa ma mchis na/ ci'i slad tu se mas can khyi'i skyed nas nas shi 'phos na dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ 
179b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyaka' stsald pa/ drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smra ba de bzhin du ma yin no// gal de dbang sgyurang dbang sgyurang yin tu zin na ni/ dbang myed par mchi' ba mi rigs so// drang srong chen po gang rang ka lus
179b7(mdo): kyi spo bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ srin pu me khyer 'di snyam du/ bdag gis 'dzam bu gling snang bar bya'o snyam tu sems pa'i rkyen kyis/ srin bu me khyer kyis
179b8(mdo): 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur na ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro// 
180a1(mdo): gang gi tshe dbang spyad dang // nyon mongs pa bdag khyim yang yod cing / dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i sa/ sems canas 'grib pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'phel ba yang myi dmyigs so// drang srong chen/ 
180a2(mdo): pabos gsol pa/ ko'u ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsu lad pa/ drang srong chen po ngas phyi nad ci log dag zlog pa yang myed/ 'grib par byas pa yang myed do// 
180a3(mdo): grang srong chen pos gsol pa/ gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bka' bsu sad pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin de/ ma byung ba'i phyir pa yang dbang / 
180a4(mdo): sgyur ma yin no// dang srong chen pos gsol pa/ ko zhungs ka' mchid 'di zhig so// ko'u ta ma'i sras kyis pa ma ma grogs pa las/ sems can skye'o zhes gsungs na/ sems can
180a5(mdo): mang du 'grogs pa las/ sems can skye ba nyung bar gyurd pa 'di ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ khyod la dpel bstan par bya'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ 
180a6(mdo): dper na sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu cig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de sa rjes 'ga' ni gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lhag ma sa bon gyi 'os su myi
180a7(mdo): 'gyur ba de ci sa bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ ko'u ta ma chung dang nyims shing thog rnams ma rungs par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das lakyis bka' sa/ lang pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin/ 
180a8(mdo): las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnam ma tshungs par byas so// drang srong chen po kha cig ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ srin bu rnams kyis 'os so// kha cig ni las kyi rlung nas kyis phye mar
180b1(mdo): byas so// drang srong chen po shing gi nyes pa ni nyung ngo // sems can kyi nyes pa ni mang ngo // drang srong chen po yang sems cad kyi khams ni yongs su rtogs pas kun nas bsrang ba ste/ drang srong chen po
180b2(mdo): sems can rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmyigs te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir sems can gyi khams yongs su gtogs pas/ kun nas spang ngo zhes smra'o// 
180b3(mdo): grang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye ko'u ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa mi/ 'di ni rnam par dag go// ci'i srad tu bskal pas bsreg par 'gyur bka' stso lad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
180b4(mdo): ba ka' la sa lad pa/ dang srong chen po chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas/ pa'i phyir skal pas bsreg par 'gyur ba/ grang srong chen po gal te skal pas sreg par myi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings gnyi
180b5(mdo): su 'gyurd te/ la la rtag la la mi gtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar myi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad brtag pa ma yin btan
180b6(mdo): pa ma yin/ dbugs phyi nad pa ma yin yid yi che/ de bzhin gshegs papa tham pa 'as byed de bya'i ming thob po// drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhye nad par mtshan gsol
180b7(mdo): pa ni mthun no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su lang pa/ drang srong chen po gald te bskal pas bsreg par ma gyur da na/ 'di ni dus bzang po'o// 'dini dus ngan pa'o me kya rtsa ba dad par 'gyur/ 
180b8(mdo): ro// drang srong chen po gal te yang skalang bas/ bsreg par ma gyur na/ legs par byas dang nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smind pa tha dad pa myed par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang 'di lta
181a1(mdo): ste// bskal pas las bsregs pa 'din// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ drang srong chen po sems can 'i rnyed rgas pas bsreg par 'gyur pa thos nas// dad par 'gyur ba'i
181a2(mdo): sems cand snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsku pa'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na la mu ldag pa'i sbrul ni myig gis kyang rngub rna ba dang / snga dang / kha sgo nas kyang
181a3(mdo): rngub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de ltar lta ste// sbyin pas kyang bsrung / snyan par 'asgrubs kyang sdud/ den spyod pas kyang srud/ das pa mthun pas kyang bsdud do// drang
181a4(mdo): srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/ mer 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gser 'dul ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na/ dul mar gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu gasreg
181a5(mdo): pa'i phyir rin po che'i yos su 'gyur ro// rin po ches smras/ na/ de'i rin rin thang myed par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de// 'i phyir gser brdung pa dang / bsregs pas rnam par spyong ngo // 
181a6(mdo): drang srong chen po de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang / rgyu med par bsreg pa'i skald pa myi 'byind te// 'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par myi 'gyur ro// de nas btso
181a7(mdo): 'das la drang srong chen po me smon kyis 'di skad ces gsolang to// skam pa'i me phyung ba yang sems can gang yang gnod par myi 'gyuras pa'i ngo mtsha rad to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ drang srong
181a8(mdo): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gang la yang gnod par myi sa da do// dang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bcu'i rnams su char 'phra mo'i rgyud 'bab pa de bas ni// drang srong chen po de bzhin/ 
181b1(mdo): gshegs pa rnams dadang / sa bcul la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te/ rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ches mad do// drang srong chen po de'i tshe sems can de dag gis
181b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gzugs kyang mthong / kha dog mdzes pa yang mthong / skal pas bsreg pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid spros par yang mthong nas dag pa dang / 
181b3(mdo): mchog tu dga' ba skyesate/ 'di skad ces bdag kyang 'di ltar sgrol pa par gyur sa 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig/ bdag ca kyang 'di ltar kha dog mengs par 'gyu rad cig/ ces
181b4(mdo): 'dzeran to// kha cig ni yid phyung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsum tu byed/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
181b5(mdo): 'i 'bras bu mngon gsum du byed/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kha cig ni rang byang chub kha cig ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab du thob/ kha cig cig ni phyir myi ldog pa
181b6(mdo): 'is gnon/ kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi la'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye/ kha cig ni sum bcu la su/ gsum du/ kha cig ni mtshe mar/ kha cig mi dga' ldan du kha cig ni 'phrul dga'/ 
181b7(mdo): cig ni gzham 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'dri lta bu/ 'og myin kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin tu 'khor los spyar pa rnams dang / 
181b8(mdo): stobs kyi 'a'akhor los sgyur ba rnams dang / khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dmas kyi bar du yang 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po
182a1(mdo): nam grangs 'di sa bus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las gros par mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa la batho' dang/ 
182a2(mdo): byas pa shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa las chos nyid thos nas/ slab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro// thabs 'dis na dang ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// 
182a3(mdo): rladrang srong chen po yang sa bcul la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi myig la/ sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de bas ni sems can kyi khams gang 'khor pa la skyon chag par shes nas phung po ma
182a4(mdo): lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su/ yongs su mya nga na las 'da' bar byed pa yang ste/ drang srong chen po de'i// phyir bskal pas bsreg par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong
182a5(mdo): chen po me sgron kyis rab kyi yid kyis rnam par spyad nas tshig du smras pa/ kye ma'o gang bdag la drang srong chen po zhes 'dapa/ shig kya'i sras 'di che ba nyid ni rgya che'o
182a6(mdo): bdag gis 'di sa pags pas kyang chog ste// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen du mngon kyis bdag gis kyang 'di sa yang dag pa'i mying gis bod par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong ni
182a7(mdo): po me smon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan kyi 'byung gnas su gyurd cing mkhyend pa dpag tu ma mchis pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsold pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du/ 
182a8(mdo): par 'gyur dang / bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal da pa/ grang srong chen po gnas myed pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'dul
182b1(mdo): mar 'gyur ro// rlung zong chen po theg pa cig gis 'byung ba la sems cas sgrub 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po sa sems can 'du ba 'gyur ro// drang ba snyen po zung po pa'i
182b2(mdo): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'gyur ro// dras srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mu krung ba dang pa dang / rlung phrar dang / klung chen po dag kyang rgyas tshe/ chen por bab nas ro gcig tu 'gyung / 
182b3(mdo): drang srong chen po de bzhin du seMm can gi khams ji snyed pag zad par byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du 'gyur/ pas 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'khor par 'du bas/ sems can 'du bar 'gru
182b4(mdo): pa ni 'du pa ma yin zhes pa sma'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung gis padas nas/ phye ma leb phyi phyi zhwa la 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung myed na so sor 'gyes so// drang srong chen po de bzhin du
182b5(mdo): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur par/ phan tshun lasa'o// kyis 'breld pa'i sems can gyi khams de dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur nga ro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur/ phan
182b6(mdo): dun las kyis 'brel pa dag yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur/ dud gror skye bar 'gyur te/ der de dag lci par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po lnga dang myi rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// grA / 
182b7(mdo): srong chen pos gsol pa/ thams cad gzil kyis gnon pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa myir skyes pa 'di sems can chege mo zhes bgyi ba zhig dang 'du bar gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di
182b8(mdo): zhes bgyi ba nas/ yi dgas su skye ba 'di 'dus par 'gyur to zhes bgyi ba'i bar tu ji ltar 'tshal por bgyi bka' stsol da cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sastsald pa/ drang srong chen po sems/ 
183a1(mdo): can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cig du sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par 'gyur ba des/ de mthong na yid kyi bde par 'gyur te/ zhe sdang par yang 'grur/ des de mthong na/ 
183a2(mdo): gas te de klad pa ra par yang 'gyur/ bkang ba 'am khri pa 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di mi sems can dmyal bar skye rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de skar gyur pa des
183a3(mdo): kyang / bdag 'di lhan cig du sems can dmyal ba rnams na/ gnas gnas par mngon no// zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsos pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa thams cad
183a4(mdo): mkhyen pa dud 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan dmar gyurd pa ci lta bu lags bco ldan 'das kyis bka' s+yadad pa/ myir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe phan tshun
183a5(mdo): mthong ba na/ mkhon du 'dud par 'dzind cing / 'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar rnyed snyam tu/ skyon tshold pa 'di ni dra nga srong chen po 'dude 'gro skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du
183a6(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid de/ bdag dang 'di snyan cig tu dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yi dgas su skyes pa rnams ni/ dring pa 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu
183a7(mdo): srid par 'gyur ro// pha rol sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro// gang de yi dgas su skyes nas/ lhan cig 'dus par gyu rang pa de'i dbang phyug mthong nas/ 'phra dog skye bar 'gyur
183a8(mdo): gzhan gyi nor la 'dod par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yi dgas su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di lhan cig du yi dgas kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de lta rigs par bya'o// 
183b1(mdo): drang srong chen po ma rje skyes pa gang se la zhig che rabs gzhan dag na 'dus par gyur pa ni des de ma da/ 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'don gyir skyes pa'i sems cad ngas rgya
183b2(mdo): pa'i mtshan nyid do/ ga myi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no// zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar skyes te/ 'dus par gyur pa
183b3(mdo): las/ phyir skye ba de dag gi ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'// rtsal pa/ drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skye te/ 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni/ phan tshun mthong na lnga pa la 'jug
183b4(mdo): par 'gyur/ de de nas bdag dang 'di ltar skyes te/ lhan cig 'dus par 'gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po rnam pa des bu dag du sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po ma
183b5(mdo): smon dga' dgul yid rang nas/ bcom ldang 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mahe/ me nad pa nyid du smon par myi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bsgrub pa
183b6(mdo): lo zhes bdag 'chad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po mye smon la 'di skad ces bkal bstsa lang ngo to// drang srong chen po nang na sems can zhes bya ba 'phra ba ji tsam zhig yod/ 
183b7(mdo): ces pa la de skad zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po gang sems can du dmyigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam par 'byed do// dang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ la la zhig gis dmus long zhig 'di skad du/ kye
183b8(mdo): skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra zhes smra sa na/ drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems ma mthong ba'i phyir/ kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes smra bar nus sam drang srong chen pos gsol pa
184a1(mdo): 'brel pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gsu sad pa/ drang srod chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus song skar ma mthong pa'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba ni 'phra mo 'dis bu zhig go zhes
184a2(mdo): sems can brjod par mi nus so// drang srong chen po yang dmyigs sems can zhes bya bar mi rnyed do// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yongal sems can zhes bya ba myi rnyed do// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i rdu
184a3(mdo): po lnga po dag la sems can zhes bya ba myi rnyed do// drang srong chen po khams bca' brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu'i gnyis dang / nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba myi rnyed
184a4(mdo): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya/ pa myi rnyed do// drang srong chen po mya ge ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa pa'o skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rna pa dang sA dang
184a5(mdo): dang lus dang / yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad \u0f7fga kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa 'i phung po lnga yang ngan pa'o// 'jigs pa'o// skra cig kyang myi
184a6(mdo): gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po ma byud ba'i rdzas sum bcu la su drug kyang ngan dris skad cig kyang myi gnas pamo// sems can zhes byang ba yang myed/ gzugs kyang myed de/ drang srong chen po rdzas
184a7(mdo): las 'dus pa ni sems can zhes pa'i grangs su 'gro'o// yongs su rtogs pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni srog dang // gso' ba dang skyes bu dang / gang lag dang shes las
184a8(mdo): skyes dang / ged bu myi dmyigs so// drang srong chen po gal te sems can yod tu zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par myi 'gyur
184b1(mdo): pa zhig ma/ drang srong chen mo gang gi phyir sems can myed pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid pob ste/ de'i phyir gis ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar yang dag par sgrub po// de nas bcom ldan
184b2(mdo): 'das la drang srong chen po mye sgron kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de slan chad drang srong chen po mya skon bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kal te bdag
184b3(mdo): skal pa mu mchis par sems can de myal ba'i zhugs kyi 'obs su gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ ri rab 'og min gi gnas du gyur pa mthon po'i kha de nas dag gis bdag dor par gyur pa 'am/ gdung pa lnga skal pas
184b4(mdo): bsreg par lta bur gyur pa 'am/ nyi ma skal par gnas par gyur pa 'am/ bskal pa sum bcu'i rna pa cig du spyad par klu rad pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
184b5(mdo): sngo ste mdun gyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi slad tu ni/ brgya/ na 'grus nyams par myi 'gyi'o// / drang srong mngon par/ shes pa lapa'i ji snyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gam du lhags pa de
184b6(mdo): dag kyang stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang // deng slan chad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du smon par bgyi'o// 
184b7(mdo): rdo tse thog gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// drang srong rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis smin mtshams nas/ 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'o 'od gzer byung / phyogs
184b8(mdo): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams nas/ 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa so 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab du
185a1(mdo): 'gul/ ldeg rab tu steg ste/ shar phyogs phyogs mtho' na/ lho phyogs phyogs dpa'/ nub phyogs dpa' na diH/ byang phyogs mthol/ shar phyogs dras sA na/ smyo phyogs
185a2(mdo): nul phyogs mthol na byang phyogs dmas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste tu me tog gi char phab/ rnga po che rnams brdungs mo dri ba'i bdag pa yid
185a3(mdo): du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang / yan lag lda pa'i sil snyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par spyod do// la'i gdug pa dri rab tun po dag kyang rlung kyis dang bslang te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gam du
185a4(mdo): ngad ldang par byed do// byang chub sems dpal rnams rab du dga' ste/ mchog tu bdel pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gsheg/ sra pa'i steng du/ do shal dang se mo do rnams 'thor zhing / rin
185a5(mdo): tshe'i char yang 'bebs/ me tog dang gdug pa dang / spom dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang
185a6(mdo): bar byed do// pa'i chogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' ga sa dar pa dang / samangar ba'i char 'bebs so// thacwas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khod de yang dga' mgul yid rangs te
185a7(mdo): khyod rkyen pa gos mas de bzhin gags pa'i skus gas da de/ dedas 'dul pa pas zhes bya ba'i 'a zer des gasbyin gyi gnas can med sems cad dmyal pa chen po mnar med pa mi
185a8(mdo): blang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bkor pa byas nas slar log ste// bcom ldan 'das kyis dbula'i drug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ral
185b1(mdo): 'byod kyis 'di skad ces gsos to// sgyu ma mchis par shag grub de ring 'dir / phyogs bcu dag du 'od zer gyi gtong ste// 'khor 'di thams cad be tsom kyar lags na/ nub pas rgyu dang byed de/ 
185b2(mdo): bdag lung ston da// myi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dag par gyur zhing sro ba cher 'gyur te// rab du dgal bas lag pa stod bgyis nas// kha cig 'di'i bcom ldan legs shes nachi/ rgya byin
185b3(mdo): tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam khar gnas nas 'byung ba'i tshogs dang bstod// mkha' las lha'i me tog char du 'bebs/ ma bdungs rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byind// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
185b4(mdo): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces bka' masu sa/ to// rab 'byor da khyod kyis drang srong rje po me smod mthong ngam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 
185b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bco lad pa/ rab 'byor da dang srong chen po me sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas stong/ 'das pa'i 'o// du skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ zla ba can kyi
185b6(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi mying
185b7(mdo): sems pazhid kyi nar bu rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dang mang po bamad khri ba'i grong kyis/ rol gyi ras grangs 'di tham ma thag tu phyir myi mon pa'i mkho ba ste/ 
185b8(mdo): 'byor de de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byam sa d+ma'i gsung rab las bcu la la gnas par 'gyur ro// skal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
186a1(mdo): pargyas bdag gling zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chad myed pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag du dpal par 'gro ba'i/ 
186a2(mdo): ting nge 'dzind thob ste// skad dang / skad ma yin pa shes pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rgyal bas dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind dang / khams rnam par dben pa'i ting nge 'dzin
186a3(mdo): dang / blo grogs rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzi nang dang / rgya mtsho la'i snying po'i tingange 'dzin dang / mnyan pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / bsam pa'i snying po li ting pe 'dzinang dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob po// 
186a4(mdo): rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed dag gis myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// dgel slong dang / dge sadang ma dang / dge' snyen dang / dge' snyar ma stong phrag tshad myed pa
186a5(mdo): dag gis/ dgral bcom nyid dngon gsum du byas so// rab 'byor da lha dang rU dang / gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam 'a lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / snyom
186a6(mdo): 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don kyi dbang de mthong
186a7(mdo): nas/ 'dul ba'i can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi rna kyid bos khyabs mUdzad te/ ljags kyi dbang po de las/ kha dog du ma/ kha dog pa dang / 
186a8(mdo): pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / leb dgan dang shes dang / dngul kyi kha dog sta bu dag 'byung ste/ de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthal yas mu myed pa dag du mngon
186b1(mdo): par byu nas thar log sem ldan 'das pa la gsum banor pa byas nasas na 'das kyi 'grus gnyis su nub bo// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po thog sa kyis drus
186b2(mdo): langs te/ tha gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gapar nas/ pus me gsas pa'i stang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gas pa de sogs su thal mo sbyang dra pa bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di na ces gsong
186b3(mdo): to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nas d+ha ma rkyen ma mchis par mdzub pa myi mngang na bcom ldan 'das mdzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyer gang lags de skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan
186b4(mdo): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' gro gros myi bzad pa la di skad ces bka' bka' sa su lang to// rigs kyi bu dad pa rnams kyi don du ljags 'di lta bus ni brdzun mo gsung ngo // snyam du bya ba'i phyir
186b5(mdo): sngags dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas 'di skad chad ces gsol to// rigs bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi
186b6(mdo): rnam grangs 'di las za na tshigs shu sa tsam lung 'bog na// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nis kyi phung po ji tsam zhag sked par 'gyur // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsa lang
186b7(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur pa/ ji snyed de dag la yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis/ bden par spyad pa
186b8(mdo): thams cad kyis/ snyen bkur byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdud kyis mchom rten byed pa/ de bas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las than tshigs su bcad po
187a1(mdo): gcig tsam lung 'bog ma/ 'dis bsod nasde mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad na/ gang zhig dang pa'i sems kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin pa des mangs
187a2(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyis stod par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di la rim gror byas pa des pa la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gcis
187a3(mdo): nas/ 'di skad ces bka' bsu lad to// rigs kyi bu dag nga ni bden par smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa'i sa phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs
187a4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du 'gyur par 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
187a5(mdo): lan gsum brjod dam/ brjod du bcug na/ des ston ba la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bsgom par bskul la 'gyur ro// rab 'byor du gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
187a6(mdo): yi ger 'dri 'am/ yig ger/ 'drir 'jug pa de bde' ba dang bcas shing yid bdel ba dang bcas bzhin du/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas thams cad
187a7(mdo): kyi mdzod kyang bzu par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par myi 'gyur ro// gang dag kyi skye
187a8(mdo): gnas nas shi 'phos te/ yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da kang gis sangs rgyas stong / 
187b1(mdo): dge' pa'i sra ba skyed pa de'i na lam du chos kyi nas grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ro/ ral 'byor da rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nam rang dam/ 'amang ngas / 
187b2(mdo): log gas/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya chem yang rgya cher 'as mas 'gyur ba de 'i lag du byang chub mo ngon par ba ban da/ des phyig lnga thob par 'gyur ro// 
187b3(mdo): ma tshang par yang myi 'gyur/ dran pa brjed pa myed par 'chi pa 'i dus byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub para'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad nas phrul
187b4(mdo): pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi snying po la ting nge 'dzind dang / gtsug gi nor pu'i phyag brgya'i ting nge 'dzind ding / dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzind rab tu thog+h+ra 'gyur/ yi ge myed pa'i tha ma
187b5(mdo): tog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur / chos thams cad la rnam/ par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang / the tshom rnam pa ra spyod pa'i gzungs dang / don dam pa rnam par ches pa'i
187b6(mdo): thob par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo brgyad stong mtha' yas pa thob paraSh+Ta gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsas bzhin du
187b7(mdo): 'chi 'pho pa dang / skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' ba su lad pa// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen dku rang bya
187b8(mdo): pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyis yang dang yang rgya che ra yang dag par rab tu shod cig/ 'phags pa don ris pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba ga zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'do// 
188a1(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du sa rgyam dA ya na pra sa da pra b+ha ba na na ma ma da ya na su drA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa theg pa chen po 'akrol dad pa rab du sgom
188a2(mdo): zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas
188a3(mdo): po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ril byang chub sems dpa' sem skA ra paSh+Ti chen po sangs rgyas kyi zla dad pa nas 'dus bu'i byang chub sems dpala'i dge' 'dun chen po dang / thabs cig du
188a4(mdo): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bdud dang phyir dgos pa bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi kun tu rgyu
188a5(mdo): pa las ring tu gyur pa/ bsamA pa bzhin du srid par skye/ pa kun tu ston lnga dang pa chen po sa 'a ba/ ska lad pa dngag tu myed par lus dang / gnas
188a6(mdo): gtong ba'i dbang thob pa/ bdud kyi las tshad myed pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams sa shin du rab tu rtogs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thod par bya ba
188a7(mdo): thabs kyi cho ga shes pa/ nges par 'byung po rje sus cad shes pa'i spobs chen po thob pa/ mu stegs can kyi smrab thams cad bzlog pa la mkhas pa/ rdzu 'phruld kyi rnam par 'phrul
188a8(mdo): pa chen pos skye bo 'phel po che'i nye par sdu pa la mkhas pa/ pad+mo/ da du phyin pa chen po'i goms pas/ rnal 'byor chen po rnam pa thams cad thob pa/ nam kha lta bur 'jig rten dkyi
188b1(mdo): chos kyis sems ma gos pags sngagal 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pa gsald dang / byang chub sems dpal dad pa ni myed dang / byang chub sems dpa'
188b2(mdo): dad pa myi 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rab tu 'jug dang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang ma nyams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
188b3(mdo): dang pa myi g.yo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rab cho skad dang / byang chub sems dpal dad pa mnyam dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal rtag tu
188b4(mdo): dad pa'i rjes 'brang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa/ da la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems pa la dad par 'jug byed dang / byang chub sems dpal dngal
188b5(mdo): kha yid gnyis rnam par 'dzem dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa bstond dang / byang chub sems dang pA rab tu// 'doms byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rnam par
188b6(mdo): 'phel dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa rnam par spyod dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa'i snod yongs su tsho lang dang / byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po dad pa thabs
188b7(mdo): chen dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / 'od gsungs chen po la gtsigs pa dge' slong nyis rgya lnga bcu la dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyind dang / dri za dang / 
188b8(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam kha lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yI mye da ba dag gis kun nas sko cing mdun gyis byas te/ 'khor brgya stong du ma'i nang na zhugs
189a1(mdo): par 'gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal las dang po pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa mang po 'dus te 'khod par 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
189a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po mos pa spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa/ de dag las brtsams te gtas gcom pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag gas te ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' gang theg pa chen po'i phyir
189a3(mdo): theg pa chen ma la dad na/ don che zhing 'bras bu che ste/ phan yon che'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa mos pa spyod pa la zhugs pas theg pa chen po dad pas mang du gnas/ 
189a4(mdo): par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen sang sa rgyas kyi mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi brlabs kyis bstond las longs te/ pra gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
189a5(mdo): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ga la pa de sog su thal mo sbyar pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
189a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ zag pa chen po la dad pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par brgyad pa gang lags/ byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir
189a7(mdo): theg pa chen po la dad pa skyes pa gA lags bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'iphyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu dbel pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/ byang chub
189a8(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i phan yon rnam pa du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalang su med pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems/ 
189b1(mdo): dpa' chad myed pa dag gi don gyi phyir zhus ras la?/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri par sems dpa' legs so legs so// de'i phyir rig kyi bu nyon cig dang / don de bstan par
189b2(mdo): bya'o// rigs kyi bu bcu la gcig po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa la dad pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ gsal ba'i
189b3(mdo): mtshan nyid dang / brlan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid dang // swa ba'i
189b4(mdo): mtshan nyid dang / sred pa'i mtshan nyid dang // rjes su 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rgyun kyi mtshan nyid dang / yongs su gru/ pa'i mtshan nyid dong // dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol/ 
189b5(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the// ga pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gas pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
189b6(mdo): ka 'a btsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnyog pa rnam pa bzhi dang bral ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po stsal pa'i mtshan nyid do// rtog
189b7(mdo): pa rnam pa bzhi gang zhen/ 'dis s+ho/ khong 'gro ba'i rnyog pa dang / med ches pa'i rtog pa dang / sngang pa'i rnyog pa dang / the chos kyi rnyog pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar theg pa chen
189b8(mdo): pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyis theg pa chen la khong 'khro pa'i sems skyed phyi/ srid do// zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams la snyed mi
189b9(mdo): ma pa'i sems skyed kyi srid do// zab zed rgya mo'i chos rnams la/ sdang skrag kun tuspang par 'gyur mi srid do// zab cing rgya che'i tsham rnam la myi mdzad/ 
190a1(mdo): pa dang / the tshoms par 'gyur myi bsrid to// byang chub seMs dpa' dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du las dang po ba'i byang chub sems dpa'/ 
190a2(mdo): mos pa spyod pa la zhugs pa/ chos shes pa rtogs pa ma mchis par theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba 'di lta bu dag la the tshom ma mchis shing / the tshom kyi rnyog pa dang
190a3(mdo): bral pa lags bcom ldan 'das byuka' khru mra lad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid ma gtogs pa'i shes pa nyid theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya chen po dag
190a4(mdo): the tshom myed pa dang / chom kyi rnyog pa dang bral ba nga ma yin gi// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi ri la das mos pa'i stobs kyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos zab
190a5(mdo): cing rgya che ba dag la the tshom myed cing / the tshom kyi rnye/ ga pa dang bral pa yin no// 'di ltar las dang po pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' mos pas baspyod pa la zhugs
190a6(mdo): ni theg pa chen po'i chos zab cing rgya che ba bstan pa dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dbang du byas nas/ chos 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ba'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas
190a7(mdo): thugs su chud pa la mos pa bzhag nas/ chos la mos pa ma log par mos pa 'jug go// gzhan gyi dIpa las mos pa'i stobs des de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa zab cing rgya che ba'i
190a8(mdo): mdo' sde'i chos rnams la the tshom myed cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'o phyir// theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gsal ba'i
190b1(mdo): mtshan nyid du lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pas rlan pa'i mtshan nyid
190b2(mdo): du rig par brgyad pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su khad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bde la bas
190b3(mdo): sus brlan pa dang / sems rlan pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i rlan pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir// theg pa chen po la dad pa dang ldan
190b4(mdo): pa'i bde' pa dang / yid de la ba dang / yid bdel pas lus dang sems tshim par byed pa yin kyi/ don la long spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan las byung ba'i 'del pa dang / 
190b5(mdo): sor bde ba ni ma yin no// gzugs dang gzugs myed pa ni pyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi dade' ba dang / yid bde ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'di 'dra bas de dag gi lus
190b6(mdo): dang/ sems tshim par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gi bde' ba dang / yid bdel ba ni ma zhi pa'o/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang 'dod pa'i yon tan las byung ba
190b7(mdo): dang / yang bdel ba dang / 'dod pa longs spyod pa rnams kyi bde' ba dang / yid bde' ba de ni de tsam du 'dod chags dang / khong 'khro ba dang ldan pas ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do// mthon
190b8(mdo): dman gyi rgyu'i phyir ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do// bden pa rnams la yid gnyis dang / the tsom myi za par 'i rjes su song ba'i phyir/ rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid do / ngar 'dzind pa dang / 
191a1(mdo): pa'i ma 'dzind pa dang / de'i smra ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa tshad myed pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir rab tu zhi pa'i mtshan nyid do// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci log dang / g.yeng
191a2(mdo): pa dang nga/ rgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tsha myed pa'i sa pa'i phyir rab tu ma zhi pa'o// 'gro lnga las sna tshogs mngon par mdu byed pa'i ma pa'i phyir rab tu ma zhi pa'o// 
191a3(mdo): sdug sngal kyi bden pas bsdus shing 'gro ba'i phyir rab du ma zhi pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyu la 'jug
191a4(mdo): pa dang / ldan pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las 'byung ba'i ba dade pa dang / yid bde' ba ni rab tu ma zhi pa ste/ de pas na de'i lus dang // sems tshim par byed pa ma yin no// 
191a5(mdo): ji ltar 'dod pa khongs spyod pa rje yid kyi mdod pa'i yon tan las byung ba bde' ba dang / yid bde' pa ma yin pa// de bzhin du/ gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod pa
191a6(mdo): nams kyi snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba yang rnam pa de dag gis ci rigs par rab tu ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya ro// rab tu ma zhi bas na 'phags pa'i chos 'dul pa
191a7(mdo): lus dang / sems tshim par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i bdel ba dang / yid bde ba ga
191a8(mdo): yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang / khong 'khro'i rab tu ma zhi pa dang bral ba dang / mthon man kyi rab tu ma zhi pa dang 'bral ba dang / bden pa la yid gnyis dang / the tshom za ba'i rab
191b1(mdo): tu ma zhi pa dang bral ba dang / dar 'dzind pa dang / pa'ir 'dzind pa dang / de lisu pa las byung ba'i lta bar gyur da pa tshad myed pa'i rab tu ma zhi pa dang brald pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci
191b2(mdo): log dang / g.yeng ba dang dgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tsha myed pa'i rab tu ma zhi pa dang bral ba dang / 'gro ba lnga'i las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i rab tu ma zhi ba dang tha
191b3(mdo): pa dang / sdug sngal kyi bden pas bsdus pa'i rab tu ma zhi pa dang bral ba dang / 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa di rgyu dang / 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun
191b4(mdo): la 'jug pa rab tu mazhi pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o// rab tu zhi ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ lus dang sems tshim par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
191b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pas/ rlan pa'i mtshan nyid do// byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol pa/ bcom
191b6(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ zag pa chen po la dad pas brlan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bde' ba dang yid bde' ba'i don 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang
191b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la rad pa las byung ba'i bde' ba dang / yid bda' pa'i don la rab tu mos par bgyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
191b8(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'iphyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsul pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal
192a1(mdo): rnams rnam pa gsum gis theg pa chen po 'phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa 'jug se/ 'di lta ste yid ches pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gyur ba'i rnam pa dang / mngon par dag pa'i rnam pa'o// gsol/ 
192a2(mdo): bya pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa yod ches pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ji ba lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal
192a3(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bstan pa rnams thog ma nyid du yod par mos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyid kyi yul
192a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs par 'os pa'o// de pas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rtog ge ba rnams kyi yul ma yin no// / 
192a5(mdo): 'di ltar rtog ge ba rnams kyi zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di lta bu dag zos nas sdang gyur te/ rtog par lta pa ga la 'gyur// de bas na de dag ning rtog ge ba rnams kyi yul ma yin no// 
192a6(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ril par/ de dag gis bstan pa'i chos de dag kyang de bzhin du yod do// de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos bstan pa zab cing rgya che ba/ 
192a7(mdo): 'bras bu dang bcas pa la yod pa nyid du mos nas/ byang chub sems dpal med ches pa'i rnam pas dad pa skyed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nis kyi tshig
192a8(mdo): pa chen po'i slad du/ theg pa chen po la dad par 'gyurang pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom 'di shu ba ka les \u0f7f lang pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' zab cing rgyas pa'i / 
192b1(mdo): yod pa yon tan dang ldan pa da la rna 'du bar mos shing lus kyi 'gyur pa dang / sems kyi 'gyur ba dang bcas pa theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed to// gsol pa// bcom
192b2(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la ma dad pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu sku/ 
192b3(mdo): ldang pa dang / su g.yo pa dang / mchi'am 'chor ba dang / mchi'am 'dzag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'a'i theg pa che ni'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las 'byung ba'i lus kyi 'gyur ba'o// gsol pa/ 
192b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i sems kyi 'gyur/ dpa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs
192b5(mdo): kyi sus las byung ba'i bdel pa dang / yid bde' pa rgya che ba/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i sems
192b6(mdo): kyi 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu de sar byang chub sems dpa' 'itheg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad par 'gyur ba'i rnam papa 'jug go// gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses
192b7(mdo): dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa
192b8(mdo): then/ pa chen po'i phyir/ reg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon sems can tshad myed pa'i phyir gyu ra pa rnams kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi bstobs dang shes pa'i stobs kyis la
193a1(mdo): cing rgya che ba'i chos 'dir rab tu rnyed do// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'ang rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du daskar zung ba'i dus na yang sems cad chad myed pa phyir gyur nas/ 
193a2(mdo): brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes pa'i stobs kyis zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di rab tu rnyed na/ bdag myir rgyud la rkyen de skad bzhin du zab cing rgya che ba'i chos 'di thob par byas pa la mngon 'grus/ 
193a3(mdo): nyams par ci'i phyir bya/ zhes de ltar shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de dag na rtag par rgyun tu zab cing rgya che ba dag la dad pa des mngon par dag pa skyes shing mos pa skyes pas
193a4(mdo): gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'a'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dpa mngon par dga' ba rnam pas 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu
193a5(mdo): 'di ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen po la dad pa rnam pa'i mtshan nyid do// gso pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpala'i theg pa chen
193a6(mdo): po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i yongs su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg
193a7(mdo): chen po dad pa ni bsod nas dang / ye shes tshad ma yongs su bzung nas skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bdel ba'i gnas yin pa
193a8(mdo): 'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i dge' ba'i zha ba ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/ mtho' pa'i ris su gyu dad pa'am/ gzugs bzang por gyur pa 'am/ phyug po la rigs su gyu rad pa 'am
193b1(mdo): yid gzhungs pa dang / bro dang dran par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur ba 'am/ tshe ring por 'gyur ba 'am/ dbang che bar grags par 'gyur pa 'am/ rgyal rigs
193b2(mdo): shing sa la chen po lta bu'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ bram ze la shing sa la chen po lha yu lo rigs su 'gyur da pa'am/ khyim bdag shing sa pa chen po sta bu'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ rgyal che
193b3(mdo): bzhi'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ sum bcul cha gsum dang / mtsholam dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed du skye bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor la
193b4(mdo): ba nyid dang / 'jigs sa nyid dang brgya byin dang das pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'am/ gzugs kyi thams gtanan rtse bar 'gyur pa 'du shes myed 'dun pa myed kyi
193b5(mdo): srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i dge' ba'i rtse pa da dag zag pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa5/ bsod nams dang / ye shes yongs su bzung ba
193b6(mdo): dge' pa'i Na pa de'i rgya'i char yang nye bar mo 'gro ste/ snying gi cha dang / rgya stong gi cha'am/ grangs sam/ cha 'am bgrang ba 'am// bsrid pa 'am/ zla 'am/ dper yang myi bzod do// 
193b7(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i dge' ba'i a ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang / 'od 'khro ba rab tu ma zhi pa dang 'breld pa'o// mthon dman rab tu ma zhi pa dang 'brel pa'o// bden pa rnas
193b8(mdo): la yid gnyis dang / the tsom za ba rab tu ma zhi pa dpa' brald pa'o// ngar 'dzin pa dang / pa'i ra 'dzind pa dang / de'i rtsa pa las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa tshad myed pa rab tu ma zhi pa dang / 
194a1(mdo): 'breld pa'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin ci log dang / g.yeng pa dang / dgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag myed pa dang / ngo tsha myed pa rab tu mazhi pa dang 'brel pa'o// 'gro ba
194a2(mdo): lnga'i las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'brel pa rab tu ma zhi ba dnga'abrel pa'o// sdug bsngal kyi bden pas bsdus pa rab tu ma zhi ba dang 'brel la'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar 'dzig/ 
194a3(mdo): rten pa'i dgel pa'i rtsa pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa dang / las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun la/ 'jug pa rab tu ma zhi pa dang 'breld pa dag go// 
194a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpala'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ zag pa chen po la dad pa dang / 'breld pa bsod nas dang ye shes yongs su ba zung pa'i dge' ba'i a pa rnams ni 'dod chags dang / 'od
194a5(mdo): khro rab tu ma zhi pa las rnam par grol ba'o// mthon dmanarab tu ma zhi bar rnam par grol la'o// bden pa rnam/ sa la yid gnyis dang / the tshom za pa rab tu ma zhi pa lnga
194a6(mdo): rnam pa grol ba'o// ngar 'dzind pa dang / pa'i ra 'dzind pa dang / de li a pa las byung ba'i lton par gyur pa/ tshad myed pa rab tu ma zhi las rnam par grol ba'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa phyin/ 
194a7(mdo): log dang / g.yeng ba dang / rgod pa dang / rmugs pa dang / bag byed pa dang / ro che myed po rab tu ma zhi ba las/ rnam par grol ro// 'gro ba lnga 'i las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed par
194a8(mdo): ma zhi pa las rnam par grol pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang 'brel pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes yongs su
194b1(mdo): bzung ba'i dgal pa'i sa pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs po rgya dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun la 'dug pa rab tu mazhi pa las rnam par gros pa'o// des pas de ngas na log/ 
194b2(mdo): rten pa'i dge' pa'i sa pa thams cad las khyad par tu 'phags par rig par bya'o// gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas myi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang shes rab dang / rnam pa
194b3(mdo): grol ba dang / rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong bas kun tu bzung ba'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgel ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang / las dang tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyudang
194b4(mdo): 'bras bur bcas pa'i rgyun la 'jug pa rab tu mazhi pa dang dbreld pa mi yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag la pham pab shig gi gnas yin pas don chud pa ste/ phung po
194b5(mdo): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zad par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang / 'brel pa'i bsod nams
194b6(mdo): dang / ye shes yongs su bzung ba'i dge' pa'i cha ba dag ni sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bdel ba'i gnas yin pas don che ba ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
194b7(mdo): dbyings su yongs su zad par gyur pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang 'brel pa bsod nams dpa ye shem ya
194b8(mdo): pa yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni/ 'jig rten pa yi dge' ba'i rtsa 'bal zhig las khyad par tu 'phags pa ma yin gyi 'jig tan las 'das pa'i dge' ba'i tha pa dag las kyang khyad
195a1(mdo): par du 'phags pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i yongs su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid do// byang chub sems/ 
195a2(mdo): dpal dad pa zabs chen gyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa dang 'bral pa bsod nams dang
195a3(mdo): ye shes yongs su bzung ba'i dge' ba'i Na pa ni mthu 'che ba bla na ma mchis ste ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba su lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji tsam du dge' pa'i Na pa don du
195a4(mdo): gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpal dge' ba'i cha ba rnam pa 'di lta bu dag yongs su bzung ba la bzhon par bya'o// dge' pa'i Na pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge' ba
195a5(mdo): pa zis cad zil gyis mnan nas/ 'jig rten pa'i phun gsum 'tshogs pa thams cad rjes su sbyin pa'o// 'bras bu rab tu sbyind pa dang / de'i rgyus kyang dgos pa yin te/ mthar
195a6(mdo): myi bzad pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par bsgrub bo// sems can tshad myed pa dag kyang theg pa gsum kyis/ sdug sngal thams cad spong zhing nges par 'byung bar byed lnga 'gyur na
195a7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs chen kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid gang lags/ 
195a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baNald pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
195b1(mdo): 'di ltar theg pa chen po bstan pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bdel pa'i zhabs kyis rab tu phye ba de la dmyigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dang pa
195b2(mdo): skyes so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' de bstan pa de la dad pas gang bstan pa de la dka' ba gnas pa'i rgyu des byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po 'byor/ theg pa chen po sa dad pa ni sems can
195b3(mdo): thams cad kyi phan pa dang bda' ba'i gnas su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la dad pa thob pa sems can thams cad la phan pa
195b4(mdo): dang / bdel pa byung ba de lta pha ma dang / bu dang mdza' po rAng a la ka dang / gnyen gyi tshogs ni gnyen gyi tshogs la phan pa dang / bdel pa byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe
195b5(mdo): pha ma la rdzogs pa gnyen 'dab kyi tshogs de ni ka/ nyen 'dab kyi tshogs la phan pa ma yin pa la phan par la/ du shes shing phan pa la ni phan ma yin par 'du shes pa yin// 
195b6(mdo): bdel ba ma yin pa la bde' bar 'du shes shing / bdel ba la ni bdel ba ma yin par 'du shes pa yin no// phan pa dang bde pa de gnyis ka sa yang phyin ci log tu gyur pas phan pa ma yin
195b7(mdo): la phan pa sgrub cing/ phan pa a ni phan pa ma yin par sgrub pa yin/ bde ba ma yin pa la bdel par sgrub cing / bdel pa la ni bde' ba ma yin par sgrub pa yin no// byang chub
195b8(mdo): sems dpal ni theg pa chen po la dad pa la garten nas// gnyen lta bu'i sems can la dam pa'i chos ston pa sa/ sems can de dag la phan pa la 'ang phan par 'du shes shing / phan pa ma yin
196a1(mdo): pa la 'ang phan pa ma yin par 'du shes pa yin/ bde ba la'ang bdel bar 'du shes shing / sdug sngal la'ang sdug sngal du 'du shes pa yin no// de ltar phan pa dang bde
196a2(mdo): pa la phyin ci ma log pa'i blo dang ldan pas phan pa gang yin pa de ni sgrub po// gang pham pa ma yin pa de ni myi sgrub po// bdel ba gang yin pa de ni sgrub po// sdug sAl gang yin pa de ni mi sgrub
196a3(mdo): bro// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la dad ni sems rgyud phan pa dang / bde pa gnas yin pas 'jig rten pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin no// 
196a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'jig rten pa rnams la sa khyad par du 'phags par yang ma zad te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnams las khyad par tu 'phags pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan
196a5(mdo): zos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug cing / sems can rnams la pad pa dang bde snyen sbyo gyi snying rje ba ni ma yin te/ shin tu byed pa yang ma
196a6(mdo): no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyitheg pa chen po la dad pa sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bdel ba'i gnas pa 'jig rten pa'i rnams lus kyang khyad par
196a7(mdo): tu 'phags pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir// theg pa chen po la dad pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
196a8(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i yang dag par 'dal pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' brtsa
196b1(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi theg pa rkyen po 'byor// theg pa chen po la dad pa ni ngan 'gro la sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas thams cad lam yang
196b2(mdo): dag par 'das pa yin no// byang chub sems dpo' dad pa thabs can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa las zhugs pa las ring tu gnas pa las dang po pa yo bas pas spyod pa la zhugs pa
196b3(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngan gro thams lus yang dag par 'da' bar gyur pa ci lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa la zhugs
196b4(mdo): pa rnams nyid kyi theg bya chen po'i phyir// theg pa che podad pa tho pa pas ngan gro las yang dag par 'dal bar 'gyur zhing // bde 'gro 'o rkyen cig nas gcig tu rgyud pa ma yin gyi/ ma thob
196b5(mdo): pakyi byang chub chub sems dpa' ga spya 'ugs rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa thob paskyes kyang ngan klo smra yang dag par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi
