276a3(mdo): par 'du bya babyed pa da/ sems can rnams ni mad par 'du byed pa la mngos par chags pa'i bying du/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa/ de la
276a4(mdo): chom kyi sku zhes bgyi 'am/ 'jam dpa' myi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on mi'i sku zhes bgyi// 'jam dpal rnam bar grol ba'i sku ste/ 'jam dpa' de bzhin gshegs
276a5(mdo): pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams su/ rnam ra grol pa'i skur ni mnyam zhing mtshungs te/ chos kyi sku ni khyad par du 'phags so// / chos kyi sku khyad par du
276a6(mdo): 'phags pas/ yon tan chad myed pas khyad par du 'phags pas yon tan ched byed pas/ khyad par tu 'phags pa yin to/ des dper bya ba'ang sra ba ma yin no// bcom ldan
276a7(mdo): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye bar gyud pa sos dur 'ams par gyi// 'das dpal sus pa'i na mtshan nyid ni/ 'jig cher gyi khams 'byung ba dang/ kra ba de bzhi gshegs pa
276a8(mdo): yon tan bkod pa'i rgya gis byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid du 'byung bar smras// chos kyi skas ni skye ba byed do// bcom ldan 'das smras pa'i sku brtan pa la/ thabs mkhas pa gang lags/ 
276b1(mdo): par blta/ 'jam dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ stong gsuM kyi stong chen po dag tu/ dang por kun bkur pa'i rigs sam/ sprin gnas su bkur ba'i rigs su yang rang rung ste
276b2(mdo): sums su 'jug pa dang / btsas pa dang / skye ba dang / 'dod pa spyod pa dang // mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bar spyod pa zang cig bstand pa dang / de btang ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa'i ram
276b3(mdo): pa bstan pa ni/ 'jam dpa' sprul pa'i bskul bstand pa la thabs mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan ladas de bzhin gshegs pa byin kyi rlabs kyi skus/ dbyangs su gsung ba gang / gis/ 'dul ba/ 
276b4(mdo): khams yongs su ma sbyin pa rnams yongs su spyond par gyurd pa dang // yongs su smi nad pa rnams kyang dmyigs pa de nyid kyis rnam par grol pa par gyur pa'i dbyangs su gsung ba du zhi
276b5(mdo): gsung / 'jam dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'o dbyangs su gsungapra 'di gsum ste/ mdo gsung ba dang / 'dus pa / sungs pa dang / ma mo gsung ba dang ngo // bcom ldan
276b6(mdo): 'das mdo' gang lags/ 'dul ba gang lags/ ma mo gang lags sa/ 'jam dpal gang la chos rnams kyi dngos/ bsdu pa tsam du bstan pa 'di de 'di lta ste/ dngos po bzhi la 'am/ dgu 'am
276b7(mdo): nyi shu rtsa dgu'i nga dbang du byas pa'o// dngos po bzhi la gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zos pa'i dngos po dang / skyabs su 'gro ba'i dngos po dang / bslab pa'i dngos po dang / byang chub kyi dngos po'o// 
276b8(mdo): dngos po dku gang zhe na/ sems can rab tu gdags pa'i dngos po dang / de yongs su longs spyod pa'i dngos po dang / de skye ba'i dngos po dang / de skyes nas gnas pa'i dngos po dang / de kun nas nyon
277a1(mdo): mongs pa dang / rnam par byeng pa'i dngos po dang / de sna tshogs kyi dngos po dang // ston pa'i dngos po dang / bstand par bya ba'i dngos po dang / 'o ra kyi dngos po 'o// dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu
277a2(mdo): gang zhe na// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyongs brtsams te/ 'du byed bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / de'i go rims kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i dngos po dang // de nyid la gang zag gi 'du shes su byas nas
277a3(mdo): ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po dang / chos kyi 'du shes su byas nas ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs thams te/ dmyigs pa la nyes par 'brel
277a4(mdo): pa'i dngos po dang / de nyid la yosad pa'i dngos po dang / sems gnas pa'i dngos po dang / tshe 'di la bdel bar gnas pa 'i dngos po dang / sdug sngal khams cad las yang dag
277a5(mdo): bar 'da' ba la dmyigs pa thams cad kyi dngos po dang / de yongs su shes pa'i dngos po dang / de yang rnam pa / sum ste/ byin ci log yongs su shes pa'i gnas dang / 
277a6(mdo): sems can du shes pa bsums te/ phyi rol kyi sems can la log pa'i nan tan yongs su shes pa'i gnas dang / nang gi mngon pa'i nga rgyas myed pa/ yongs su shes pa'i gnas/ 
277a7(mdo): te/ skom pa'i gnas kyi dngos po dang / mngon du bya ba'i dngos po dang / sbom po'i dngos po dang / de'i snying par bya ba'i dngos po dang / rnam pa'i dngos po dang / de'i dmyigs pa
277a8(mdo): 'i dngos po dang / spangs pa dang / spangs pa skyed pa la mkhas pa'i dngos po dang / de yi g.yeng ba'i dngos po dang / de la myi g.yed pa'i dngos po dang / g.yed pa myed pas/ 
277b1(mdo): dngos po dang / bsgom pas skyo ba'i spyod pa gsal ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom thal yon tan kyi dngos po dang / de brten pa'i dngos po dang / dbapa phyung dang / bsku pa'i dngos po nga da 'phags pa
277b2(mdo): phyogasas kyi 'khor bsdu ba la 'khor bsdu ba'i dngos po dang // de kho na rab tu rtogs pa'i dngos po dang / mya ngam las 'das pa'i yang dag par thob par bya ba'i dngos po dang / legs par bshad pa'i chos
277b3(mdo): 'dul ba la/ 'jig rten gyi yang dag par lta ba yang / 'di las phyi ro lad du gyur pa'i yang dag par lta pa thams cad las spyi bor byor pa'i dngos po dang / de ma sgoms pas pa 'bri ba'i dngos po'o zhes
277b4(mdo): bya ba dag ste/ de yang 'jam dpal 'di ltar legs par pa dang / pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni/ ma sgoms pas yongs su bri/ pa'i lta pa'i nyes pas ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gang
277b5(mdo): la ngas nyam thos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa sor thar pa 'am/ so sor thar par ldan pa yongs su ba snyan pa 'di ni/ 'dul ba'i dngos po'o// byang chub sems
277b6(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi so sor thar pa/ rnam pa dus bsdu bar 'tshal par bgyi/ 'jam dpal rnam pa bdun kyis te/ yang dag blang ba'i chos bstand pa dang / phas 'pham pa'i danas kyi dngos po
277b7(mdo): bstand pa dang / ltung ba'i gnas kyi dngos po bstand pa dang / ltung ba'i rang bzhin ldand pa dang / ltung ba myed pa'i rang bzhin bsand pa dang / ltung pa las sdud pa stand pa dang / sdom pa
277b8(mdo): btang po ste dad pa'o// 'jam dpalangs gang sa mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig du nges par bshad te/ rnam par byed cing bstan pa 'do ni ma me zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid rnam
278a1(mdo): rnam pa bcu gcig gang zhe na/ kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang // byang chub kyi phyogs chos rnams kyi dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam pa'i mtshan
278a2(mdo): nyid dang / rang bzhin kyi mtshan nyid dang / de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dang / de myong pa rnam par spyad pa'i mtshan nyid dang // de'i bar tu gcod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de dang mthun pa'i chos kyi
278a3(mdo): mtshan nyid dang / de'i nyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de'i legs pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la 'jam dpal kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste// gang zag shin tu bstand pa dang / kun
278a4(mdo): brtags pa'i rang bzhin shin tu bstadad pa dang / chos rnam/ sa kyi g.yol dang byed pa dang / las bya bar snyand par lA/ pa'o// de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid rnam pa
278a5(mdo): bdun du bstand par lta'o// dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid / shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad du su'o// rnamapa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rtags pa rnam brgyad bstand par lta
278a6(mdo): san sa rnas pa brgyad gang zhen med pa dang / rnam par bzhag pa dang / rgas pa dang / yon tan dang / rgyal dang / bsun pa dang / rigs pa dang / sus ga parnam par ma
278a7(mdo): de la bded pa ni de bzhin nyid gang yin pa // gzhag pa ni gang lag rnam par bzhag pa 'am/ kun brtags pa'i rang bzhi na rnam par bzhag pa 'is/ 'ag gcin dang / 
278a8(mdo): rnam par dbel ba dang / r-I mi lung gnang pa rnam par bzhag pa 'am/ bzhag pa rnam par bzhag pa 'am// gsang pa dang gyi gsang gsung sar pa rnam par bzhag pa dan na// shes pa
278b1(mdo): ngas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kyi spyod nam grangs du mang bstand pa dag go// yon tam nings rnam par byad pa'i chos rnams kyi legs pa nam grangs du yar bsadad pa dag go// nug
278b2(mdo): ni rnam pa drug tu shes par bya// ste/ sems can gyi tshul dang / bshad pa'i tshul dang / mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul dang / bsam kyis myi khyab pa'i tshul dang dang / dgongs pa'i tshul
278b3(mdo): 'jug pa'i dus gsum dang / 'dus byas byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum gsum dang // rkyen ni bzhi rnams so// rigs pa ni rnam pa bzhir shes par bya ste/ ltos pa/ rigs pa dang / rgyu
278b4(mdo): dang 'bras bu la rigs pa dang / 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa/ dang / chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o// de la ltos pa'i rigs pa ni/ 'du byed rnams bskyed par bya ba dang // rjes su tha
278b5(mdo): snyad gdags pa'i phyir/ gang rgyur gyur pa dang / rkye nad tu/ gyur pa de dag ni/ ltos pa'i rigs pa'o// gang chos rna mas kyi thob pa'i phyir ram/ 'grub pa'i phyir ram
278b6(mdo): skyes nas kyang lus su bya ba'i phyir/ rgyur gyurd pa dang / rkyen tu gyurd pa de dag ni/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rigs pa'o// ngas bcas shing stand te/ smras pa'i don sgrub pa dang // yang dag par shes pa
278b7(mdo): bya ba'i phyir rgyur gyur pa dang rkyen tu gyur pa dag ni/ 'thad pa'i bsgrub pa'i rigs pal/ de yang mdor rnam pa gnyis te/ yongs su ma dag pa'o// de la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni
278b8(mdo): yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni bdun no// yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid lnga rnams gang zhe na/ de mngon gsum du dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de la gnas pa'i dmyigs pa'i mtsham
279a1(mdo): nyid dang bdag dang / rigs mthun pa'i dpel nye bar sbyan pa'i batshan nyid dpas sprin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gtam la las par bstand pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la 'du byed thams cad
279a2(mdo): ga pa nyid dang / du byed thams cas sdug sprul pa nyid dang / sa thams cad bdag myed pa nyid du/ gang 'jig nyis ma mdzad gsul du dbyigs pa dang / rnam pa 'di sa bu 'di dag ni
279b1(mdo): mthun pa'i dpel nye sbyor pa'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o// gang 'di de mngon gsum du dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de la gnas pa'i mngon gsum du dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bdag gi rigs
279b2(mdo): dang mthun pa'i dpel nye bar sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid ni// de sgrub par byas la/ gcig du nyes pa'i phyir yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o// gang thams cad mkhyend pas bshad pa
279b3(mdo): 'di lta ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// zhes bya ba 'di dang / rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni/ 'jam dpal shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung rab tu bstand pa'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o// de bas
279b4(mdo): mtsham nyid lnga po 'di dag gis rigs pas rtags pa yongs su dag pa ste// yongs su dag pa'i phyir bsnyen par bya la/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa
279b5(mdo): dus 'tshal par bgyi// 'jam dpa' lnga ste/ sa gang 'jig tun du thams cad mkhyen par sgra rnam par grags shing 'byung ba/ dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu la/ gnyis dang / 
279b6(mdo): rmo zas bcus dang ldan pa/ myi 'jigs pa'i chos bstan pa bzhis/ sems can kun kyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa des bshad pa la pha rol nomed pa thams cad kyis brga sang tu myed cing brtsad
279b7(mdo): du myed pa dang / mu'i chom dang 'dus pa ya/ 'phags pa'i sa ma yan lag brgyad snang ba dang / dge' slong bzhi sdang ba dang / de ltar na 'byung ba dang / mtshar dang / the tso mo gcad pa dang / 
279b8(mdo): na tu myed cis/ bcad tu byed pa dang / den chung rgyags pas/ cad pabyin pa 'ings tshan nyid shes par phyim// yang gi rtsub pa dgas pa de nga ma na gas
280a1(mdo): kyi man chan pa dang/ rjes su dpag pa'i tshams dang / seng btan pa'i tsha sa dang / mtshan nyid ldanams kyis mas su dan pa dan// sangs sus da pamatshan nyid rnam padu
280a2(mdo): gang zhe na/ de ma yin pa gzhan dang / mthun pa'i dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / thams cad mthun pa 'i dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / thams cad myi mthun pa dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzhan
280a3(mdo): kyi rigs dang / mthun pa'i dpal nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan yongs su ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid dang / lung rnam par ma dag pa bstand pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la chos thams cad ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes
280a4(mdo): pas rnam par shes par byal nyid do// zhes pa 'di ni thams cad mthun par dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang ma tshan ma dang / rang bzhin dang // las dang / chos dang rgyu dang // 
280a5(mdo): 'bras bu mthun pa gang yang rung ba gcig gi myi mthun pas pa/ mtshun nges par mi mthun pas bya ba/ 'di ni thams ca// da myi mthun par dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid do// 'jam dang
280a6(mdo): de ma yin pa gzhan dang / mthun par dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dpal dang bcas pa la/ thams cad myi mthun pa dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa de grub par bya ba la/ tu ma nges pa/ 
280a7(mdo): na de yongs su ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya mo// de ma yin pa gzhan dang / kyi mthun par dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid dpel dang bcas pa sa thams cad mthud par dmyigs pa'i mchad nyid/ 
280a8(mdo): yod pa'i phyir/ de grub par bya la gcig tu mnges pas/ de ni yongs su ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces byas// de yongs su ma grub pa'i phyirang / rigs pas brtags pa'o/ yongs sus dang / 
280b1(mdo): pa yin te/ yongs su ma dag pas na bsten par myi bya'o// de la lung shin tu rnam par ma dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rang bzhin gyis ma dag pa yin par shes par bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa
280b2(mdo): rnams/ skyes kyang rung ma skyes kyang rung ste chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa de ni/ chos nyid kyi rig pa'o// de lar bsdus pa dang / rnam par smos pa ni mngon par bsdus te/ 
280b3(mdo): chos kyi tshig gcig ci bstand pa la/ gong nas gong ma'i tshig gis shin tu phye ste/ mthar gtug pa'o/ rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dmyigs pa la 'dzind pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dran pa nye
280b4(mdo): par bzhag pa las stsogs pa ras bshad pa 'di ni// de dag gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten dalas 'das par bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas/ 
280b5(mdo): de'i 'bras bu/ de'i'abras bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ yon tan mngon par sgrub pa 'di ni/ de'i 'bras bu 'gropa'i mtshan nyid do// de nyid rnam par grolang pa'i ye shes
280b6(mdo): kyis rab tu zhes pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher bshad zhing / bstan pa de ni myong pa rnam par spyad pa'i mtshan nyid do// byang chub kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i chos 'di dag nyid sgom pa
280b7(mdo): bgegs kyi gnas nyon mongs pa'i chos de dag ni/ de'i bar tu gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do// de dag nyid la gang bstan pa/ chos dag ni de dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do// bA ru gcos
280b8(mdo): pa rnams kyi nyes par gyur pa de dag ni/ skyon kyi mtshan nyid do// 'thum pa rnams kyi yon tamed dag ni/ 'jam dpal legs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems
281a1(mdo): dpal 'jam dpal kyis yang bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdol dang / 'dus pa dang / ma mo 'di rnams kyi bsdus pa'i
281a2(mdo): gzungs kyi don gang gis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos zab mo rnams kyi mngon par dgongs pa lang log pa dang / 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i se
281a3(mdo): 'byung ba de lta bur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems 'byung ba yang sngon thabs dang // shes rab sgoms pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa las shes par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa'i sprul da pa sprul
281a4(mdo): pa la sems mchis sams ma mchis shes bgyi// 'jam dang / la sems rang dbang myed pa dang / sems gzhan myed pa gang gi phyir/ sems yod pa yang ma yin/ sems myed pa yang ma yin
281a5(mdo): no// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ zhes bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul zhes pargya pa la bye brag ci mchis// 'jam dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
281a6(mdo): 'i spyod yul ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi bsam kyis kyi khyab pa tshad mya dpa' tshad myed pa'i yon tan kyi rgyan bkod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// de can
281a7(mdo): gshegs pa'i yul la ni khams lnga ste/ sems can gyi khams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / 'dul ba'i khams dang / de gnyis kyi bye du bya ba ni 'di'o// ba
281a8(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzem par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'di dag mtshan nyid ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal ga
281b1(mdo): su byed pa'i mtshan nyid de mngon par byang chub pa yang ma yidapa/ mngon par byangs ma gan// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor pa yang ma yin/ chos kyi 'khom po kyi rnyeng payang sa yi no/ 
281b2(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po byed pa yang ma yin te/ chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sul pa'i sku yang dag par bsand pa'i phyir mo// bcoMm
281b3(mdo): sngon 'das sprul pa'i sku la lta pa dang / nyan pa dang / bsnyen dkur pa rang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rab tu 'pheld pa// de ci'i slad tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa las 'byung bar 'tshal par 'gyi/ 
281b4(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dmyigs pa'i rgyu dang // sprul pa'i sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das mngon par 'du byed pa ma mchis su
281b5(mdo): 'dran/ ci'i slad tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi'o/ ba' shig las/ sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang pa/ chen po 'di lta bu 'byung zhing tshad ma mchis pa'i stsal pa'i gzugs
281b6(mdo): brnyan rnams 'byung gi nyon thos ngas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grold pa'i sku las myi 'byung / 'jam dpral 'a'adi lta ste/ mngon par 'du byed pa myed par 'ag yang phra pa dang / 
281b7(mdo): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / chu dang mye'i shel 'ba' shig las sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byung ngo // chu dang mye'i shel de ma yin pa gzhan las myi mabyung ste/ de ni sems can ma
281b8(mdo): chen pos byin kyis brlabs pa dang // sems can las kyi phyir ro// rigs dang las kyis yongs su spyad pa byas pa'i rdor bu rin po che las/ rgya'i gzugs rten 'byung gi/ de ma yin pa gzhin yongs
282a1(mdo): su srung ba ma byas pa las da kyi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du de bzhi gshegs pa'i sa kyi sku'i chad byed pa'i chos kyi dbyings sa dmyigs pa'i bzla dang/ shes rab rlom pamasasangs su rgyangs pa/ 
282a2(mdo): yang dag par grub pa'i phyir/ de la shes rab kyi snang ba dang / sbyar ba'i gzugs rnyan 'byung gi/ rnam par grold pa'i sku 'ba' shig las ni myi 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
282a3(mdo): byin rlabs kyi mthus 'dod pa'i khams kyi myi lus phun gsum tshogs pa dang / rgyal rigs dang / za bram ze'i rigs che zhi mthol pa dang / 'dod pa la spyod pa lha'i lus phun gsum 'tshegs pa thos
282a4(mdo): cad dang / gzugs la spyod pa lha'i lus phun gsum 'tshogs pa mas cad dang / gzugs myed pa la spyod pa lha'i lus phun gsum 'tshogs pa thams gdal 'o zhes bgyi'o// bcom
282a5(mdo): ldan 'das de ni las dgongs/ de ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i rnams 'a/ de bzhin gshes pa'i byin kyis byin du rlabs pa'i mthus/ lamA gang dang 'jug pa gang gis
282a6(mdo): thams cad tu lus phun gsum 'tshogs pa thams cad rab tu thob par gyur pa de 'i lam de dang / 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to// su lam de dang 'jug pa des 'jug pa de la/ zhugs pa de
282a7(mdo): dag thams cad du lus phun gsum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// de la su sa me dang / 'jug par spong zhing myi snyan pa brjod pa dang // nga lA yang gnod sems dang / khang la rjo pa'i sems kyis
282a8(mdo): 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur pa de dag ni/ thams cad du lus thams cad ngam pa la spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpe de ni rnam grangs 'dis kyang / ched kyis 'di ltar lus phun gsum 'tshogs
282b1(mdo): 'ab zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi rabs kyi mthu mas las byung ba yin gyi/ sum ngan par skye ba ga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyi mthu pa sa byung ba dashes par bya
282b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams sangs su ma dag par ci med pa na yongs su dag pani ma med pa lags/ mi dgan pa gas/ me pas 'jig rten kyi rnam sa mangs dus
282b3(mdo): dag pa nas/ dngos po brgyad kyi mod la gnyis po ni dkon no// de 'di lta ste mu stegs can dang / sems can sdug sngal dang rigs dang rus dang / cho rigs dang / phum gsum 'tshogs pa dang / rgud
282b4(mdo): pa'i bye brag dang / nyes par byed pa spyod pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa dang / ngam so dang / theg pa tha ma dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni med do// 
282b5(mdo): byang chub sesems dpa'/ bsam pa dang / sbyar pa'i mchog rnams rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'byung pa'i dkon no// 'jam dpal lag nyen gyi khams yos
282b6(mdo): su dag pa na ni/ 'di las phyir zlog ste/ dngos po brgyad po dkon zhing / gnyis po ni med par shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal kyis bcom ldan 'das
282b7(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsol do// bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nye bar 'grel pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las nye bar bstand pa 'di ni// mying ci lags 'di ci ltar bzung bar bgyi/ 'jam
282b8(mdo): dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba grub pa/ gdon mi za ba'i don nges pa'i don du/ bstan pa yin te/ 'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa/ gdon myi za ba nges par bstan
283a1(mdo): pa'i don du bung shig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bkal ba sa yad to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa/ nges pa'i don du snyand pa bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong lnga/ 
283a2(mdo): bdun bcul ma lus/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku rab tu shes par gyur to// son tan gyi tshogs rnam par gdon gyil pa 'i sa lce zhes bya ba// rdzogs so// 
283a3(mdo): rgya kar skad tu/ ar+ya sti pi pa ra ta khya ka ra
283a4(mdo): na ma ma ma da yan sutra/ bod skad tu// 'phags pa bud myed 'gyur/ gsung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i do// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal
283a5(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos/ pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po 'a ro la dgel slong gshel 'dun chen po dang / byang
283a6(mdo): chub sems dpal rgyad sod mngon par grags par mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa myed pa/ myi 'jigs pa thob pa/ gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan
283a7(mdo): sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa la dgel ba'i su ba skyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i rjes su song pa pa/ sngags 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mu khyud 'dzind dang / sa 'dzin dang / 2
283a8(mdo): rim 'dzin dang / mchod sbyin nus 'dzin dang / snang ba'i blo gros dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros das/ sbyangs pa'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / mthas yas blo gros dang / 
283b1(mdo): 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong dka' dang / legs mthong dang/ cher snang dang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpal do kun mthong la sogs pa dang / zag cig du bzhun pa sro/ 
283b2(mdo): byams pa las stsogs pa skal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par bye rang te/ 'a'od do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyas po'i khab kyi
283b3(mdo): grong khyer chen po na gtan cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams dang/ blon po rnams dang / 'khorard rnams dang / grong rdal pa rnams
283b4(mdo): dang / yul kyi phyi rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla marabyas ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so// de nas tshe dang/ na pa rab 'byord snga gro la dus kyi che/ sad g.yogs dang / chos
283b5(mdo): gos dang lung zed thogs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go' pos phyag 'tshal da te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod to// 
283b6(mdo): gyon ma cig tu dang 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdang gsum bdag gi rmi lam na/ de bzhin gsheg
283b7(mdo): pabyang chub kyi snying ba la bzhugs pa zhig mthong ste/ des phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brgya pa nas bdag gi spyi khor bzhag ste/ rab 'byor da ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa zos par
283b8(mdo): 'chung // nas de skad ces bkal su 'ad na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang gi snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' cha lad pa/ rab 'byor da de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
284a1(mdo): bam ldan 'das bdag rgyas po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pod bsod snyoms lamasam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsa la dpa/ rabs byad de 'i dus pa thog par shes ni ma bzhig/ donas che / 
284a2(mdo): ldam pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas// ma ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma go' bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po'i/ khab kyi grong khyer cher po bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de nas rjed pa
284a3(mdo): ldan pa rab 'byor da rgyal po'i grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod bsnyoms la rgyu zhing song ba las/ khyim bdag cig gi ga nas ga sa pa der ste phyin nas/ sgo gang gi nang logs su cang myi smra
284a4(mdo): par sdod do// de nas khyim de'i nang nas bud myed mchog gi/ gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhan sdug pa/ rgyan kyis klub/ te/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser gyi rgyan kyis
284a5(mdo): brgya nad pa// dpal shin du 'bar ba/ kha dog rgyas shing mdze sa pa dang / ldan pa zhig byung ngo // de nas bud myed des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi rkang pa la mgo'i bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
284a6(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsu pa rab 'byor khyod ci zhig bzhed pa'i slad du go/ khang 'di na zhugs/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ meme bdag ni bzod sums 'dod pa 'i
284a7(mdo): khyim/ khang 'din ldad de// bud mid des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'khyor nga / khyed pa de rung yang 'i ba rnams kyi 'du shes 'byung lags sam/ btsun pa rab byid dung yadzi ma med tshum
284b1(mdo): kyi 'du shes thugs su chud dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ che ngen bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes ni khong du chud mod kyi/ 'od kyang la ma las skyes pa'i lus 'bras can dang / zar gron kyis skyed
284b2(mdo): pa 'di zas myed kyi bar du 'chol bar myi nus so// bud byed de sa smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da kyis ma rig pa 'gags pas/ 'du byed 'gagapa/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gog
284b3(mdo): rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ mying dang gzugs 'gag/ mying dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas
284b4(mdo): tshor pa 'gag/ tshor pa 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags las srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag
284b5(mdo): pas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / sme sngags 'don pa dang / yid myi bdel pa dang / 'khrug pa 'gag mngon gsum du mdzad dam/ rab 'byedad kyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag gis
284b6(mdo): 'gog pa mdo gsum du byas so// smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ci zhig ni 'gog par 'gyur/ chos gang ni rab tu sgom par bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe 'gog pa ni/ chos gang gi rab tu sgom pa
284b7(mdo): bya ba yang ma yin no// smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor da gal te 'gog pa chos gang gi rab tu sgom pa mang pa lags na/ btsun pa rab 'byor da kyi lus bsod snyoms kyis ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur
284b8(mdo): smras pa/ che 'i 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshor ba thams cad bkag pa las langs pa'i lus 'tshol bar byed to// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga gal te gtan du mya ngan las 'das
285a1(mdo): smras pa/ des na bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor da nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tum bsu dad tam/ smras pa/ che na de yin no// sras bzhi kyi nyon mo
285a2(mdo): pamyed pa de rgyu ba 'am/ rab tu rgyab lags sam/ sbas pa/ che zhe ma yin no / smras pa/ lan mi'i slad du btsun pa rab 'byo de bsod snyoms la dru pa mdzad/ smras pa/ che
285a3(mdo): ni sum tshache pa'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma yin gyi/ ga gi phyir tshor pa 'gags pa'i don du bzod snyom sa la rgyasmras pa/ btsun pa rab bya rdza dung yang 'ardzobs

285a5(mdo): byed pa ni mtshungs pa byed pa ste/ de ci'i skad tu zhen/ nyan mongs pa myed par gnas pa ni lus dang / sems kyi tshor ba myong ba ma mchis so// nyan mongs pa myed pa
285a6(mdo): ni lus dang sems dang mtshungs papa 'an sems lags so// nyan mongs pa skyed pa dga' ba 'am/ rtsi dgal bskye bar myi bgyid do// nyon thos pa med pa'ini lum ma tshan ma
285a7(mdo): pas nye bar gnas pa ma mchis so// gzhan yang gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis/ btsun pa rab 'byor de nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa noms kyi mchog du bstan na/ 
285b1(mdo): pa ma 'byen kyi nyan mangs pa byed pa'i phyir 'du lags dang zhes par 'gyur la pa yi / pabatsun pa rab 'byos pan nyid pa su bskyed pa de nges pa
285b2(mdo): kyi dus dang bral bar 'gyurab/ bum pa nyid mongs pa myed par bstand pa 'di ni bshad pa ci du 'ad do// rnam pa btsun pa rab 'ibyu sa can mongs pa byed dus band pa
285b3(mdo): che zhe byed do// snum pa btsun pa rab na mongs pa myed pas bshad pa mchis nadaka 'chad cing zhugs/ sbas pa/ chen bcom ldan 'das
285b4(mdo): kyi nyan thos rnams ni/ bsnyad ces kyis basmad su'ong/ gas par zad do// smras pa/ btsun pa rabakhyo nga ci tsam brjod pa mchis pa de tsam du tha skad 'dogs
285b5(mdo): ci tsam du tha snyad 'dogs pa de tsam du phyin ci log go// ji tsam du phyin ci log pa de tsam du chod par 'gyur ro// ji tsam pazod pa de tsam du dge 'a sbyong gi chos ma lags so/ 
285b6(mdo): smras pa/ che zhe 'on/ dge' sbyong gi chos gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de dge sbyong gi chos ni tha snyad ma mchis pa/ byin ci mchog pa/ bcod pa ma mchis pa'o// 
285b7(mdo): dge la spyong gi chos ni chos dang chos ma lags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chags pa dang ma chags pa dang bral ba'o// dge' sbyong gi chos ni yul ma mchis pa dang / yul ma
286a1(mdo): zhes pa dang thus pa'o// dge slong gi chos mchog zhes bya'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'amadog dang / chags pa sangs pa'o// dgel sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa chung zhing tshig shes pa

286a3(mdo): las nges par thos pa'o// dge sbyong na chos ni gso ches pa dang / rtag pa pa sa la dang / nyon mongs padamyed pams yang dag par 'das pa 'o// dge ma chu na
286a4(mdo): ni ma skyes pa'o// dge slong gi chos ni 'chi bdag gi bdud/ bral ba'o// dge' sbyong gi chos ni g.yol pa ma mchi/ sa pa dang / rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma
286a5(mdo): pa dang / rnam par ma spobs pa dang / sbyar pa lags pa'o/ dge' sbyong gi chos bdud kyi yum las yang dag par 'das paso// dge' sbyong gi chos ni blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor pa ma
286a6(mdo): mchim pa'o// dge' sbyong ni chos ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral pa'o// dgel sbyong gi chos ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang / ma/ 'phags pa'o// dge 'a sbyong gi chos ni yod la byed pa
286a7(mdo): ma mchis pa dang / thams cad du gos pa ma mchis pa'o// dgel sbyong ga chos di mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba
286b1(mdo): dges sbyong ga tshas ni/ rnams dang / khams pa'i rgyas thams cad kyis bcos pas lags pa dang / bgrang pa dang / zas pa dang / gnas ma chis pa dang / nasas/ 
286b2(mdo): mnyam pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ so/ gang der lha'i bu gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa de dag las lha'i bu bzhi'i stong chos rnams la chos kyi myog nus myed cing
286b3(mdo): ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rgya chen po la mos pa lta bu lnga brgya ni bud myed de'i spros pa thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan par
286b4(mdo): 'byor da 'di snyam tu sems te/ che zhe 'di ltar smos pa phun pa/ sum 'tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ che zhe 'di da'i spobs pa 'di 'dri ba las no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
286b5(mdo): 'i sprul pa yin par the tshom myed do snyam mo/ de nas bud myed de'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi sems shes nas na/ sa rtan rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab
286b6(mdo): rab 'byor de 'di ltar 'di ni de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tshom myed do// snyam du dgongs pa de ni/ ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshes
286b7(mdo): zas de bzhin nyid bugs su chud pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin nyid khong du chud de/ des na bdag ri bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi
286b8(mdo): na nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhi gang lags pa de dag ga de 'dan nyid kyang de nyid de/ des na bdag ni bzhid gshegs pa'i
287a1(mdo): su'ad ma// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di bzhin nyid gang lags pa / rnams kyang de bzhin nyid la lags par gyi 'gyur ro// bdag ni de bzhin nyid nang marnas pa
287a2(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni/ rnams kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par myi 'gyur te/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskyal pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
287a3(mdo): de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni/ res 'ag/ de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags la/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de yang / res 'gal de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags kyi/ rtag du
287a4(mdo): de bzhin nyid de kho na lags so// des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa/ drang / sems can kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / 
287a5(mdo): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni/ yang dag pa// ji lta ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de des nam// dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de nas tshe
287a6(mdo): dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bud myed pas 'di skad ces smras me/ men ci khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'od te rang gi shes pas shes smras pa/ btsun
287a7(mdo): pa rab 'byor nga nyam thos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gang yang rung ste/ sems can gzhan
287a8(mdo): kyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gzhan gyi sems shes pa lags so// de ltar gnas nyan rab 'byor gzhan yang sems mkhyend pa gang lags pa de yang / mas
287b1(mdo): rgyas kyi mthus ma khyend pa lags so// btsun pa rab 'byorang/ dper na/ za ba dang nyi ma dang // kye dang nor bu dang / mar me dang / skar mas te nad nas skyes bu myig dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzugs
287b2(mdo): mamed pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor dam rig pa'i mun pa na 'jig rten gnas pa las gang su dag pa ro mad gi sems shes pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la nyed nam shes pa ma
287b3(mdo): so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bud myed de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa khyod su yin pa dang / ga las/ 'ongs pa bdag la stor cig/ bud byed
287b4(mdo): des smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor da gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spruld pa la 'dri ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod su yin pa dang / gang las 'os pa bdag la ston cig ces de skad smras na/ ji skad
287b5(mdo): bu lan 'debs par 'gyur smras pa/ che zhe cung zad kyang la na bdab du myed do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da de ba// zhin du/ chos thams cad spru khad pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes na
287b6(mdo): bdag gis ci zhig shes su ma mchis/ gzhan yang gang zhig btsun pa rab 'byor da 'dri ste/ ci khyed so so'i skye bo yin nam 'on te srab pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na/ 
287b7(mdo): san dzi skad gdab/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang / sems dpa' la zhugs te/ che zhe 'di yi lan ji skad gdab par bya snyam mo// de nas bar snang las btsun pa rab 'byor da/ khyod kyis chung
287b8(mdo): bad ci thob pa 'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ mngon gsum du byas pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa gang gis dag bcom pa yin par shes pa de/ che zho 'di la ston cig cig ces sgra byung ngo // 
288a1(mdo): gas 'dubyung ba / tha da 'dun su smra// na na/ 
288a2(mdo): bkra bcom pa yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bdag gis ci ltar bzung bar bgyi/ sbam pa/ che 'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sru sa'i gang gso pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dag sa zung zhin
288a3(mdo): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bces pa ga pa yang pa/ nyon mongs pa myed par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / son gnas shes bgyi ba lags so// smras pa sa ni bdag ni dgra bcom
288a4(mdo): pa 'ag pa khad pa/ nyan mongs pa myed par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / men gnas ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'ams de skar na shes bzhid kyi nun gsung bar myi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ 
288a5(mdo): ltar nags dad kyi rjud sad par/ phyiklu ram che zhe ga lad te bdag zag pa za// da pa/ nyon mongs pa myed par gnas/ rnams kyi mchog dang / yon
288a6(mdo): gnas yin par 'gyur na ni/ de ltar na bdag rdzun du smra bar 'gyur na// gang gi phyir bdag de ltar myi 'dzind pa de'i phyir/ bdag ni yang dag par sA pa yin gyi/ rdzun tu smra pa nyes myi bya'o// 
288a7(mdo): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de sgo gang 'dir lha bden pa mthong pa chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa rnams la slu bar myi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che na bded pa mthong ba gang dag yin pa de dag mi slu bar myi nus
288a8(mdo): sa// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kyis bded pa rnams gzigs sam/ smras pa/ mthong ngo // smras pa/ ga lad te bden pa rnams mthong du rung na ni/ de dag bden pa ma lags par 'gyur ro// 
288b1(mdo): ma / sa kyar mdzang 'i za rdzas/ @da kyi lus pa/ byung ba
288b2(mdo): btsun pa rab 'byer pa bden pa mtshangs sen mam pa nyid du yang dge par 'thong ba'i tshi thad pal/ de byed
288b3(mdo): yang dag par mthong ba'i chog tha dgas so/ smras pa/ me na khyod kyis gang las bsams te de skad smras pa/ snyam pa/ rab 'byor phyin ci srog gis can mongs pas kun nas bslang ba gang lags
288b4(mdo): de mi bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te// des na byin ti log yang dag par mthong pas bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi'o// de nas sgo gang der chos nyan pa'i byem lnga 'dus pa de dag gis gnas
288b5(mdo): gartan rab 'byor nga rags pa'i lus bstan nas/ 'di skad// smras so// btsun pa rab 'byorang khyod kyis bud myed 'di// 'i sob pa thos pa de ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 
288b6(mdo): sems cad gang gis bsan pa 'di thos na mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// gang dag mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
288b7(mdo): mos pa mang ba rnams ni/ gang las kyang rnam par grol ba myed do// mos pa med pa rnams la ni 'ching pa myed pas na/ de ni gang las kyang rnam par grold pa myed do// de nas bud myed
288b8(mdo): des yang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms la rgyur myi bzhud dam/ chos bshad de ci bgyi/ smras pa/ tshe zhe bdag gi zas ni
289a1(mdo): 'di nyid yin te/ chos nyan pa 'di lta bum chog go// che zhi ga chos dang ma med snyoms kyi phyir yid kyi bdel ba skye ba de mi ma mo 'dod pa yin no// gang rnyed pa dang / kur b+hi dang / 
289a2(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni/ chos 'dod pa yin no// gang sus dang / srog la bsod nams 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang ba ma legs so// zhes bya ba 'dod pa de yang
289a3(mdo): 'dod pa ma yin no// smras pa sa ge rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag chas 'dod pa 'i sa bu yin/ rnam pa btsun pa ma 'byor dkang chos 'dod pa la rgya bzod pa den cham/ dang pa
289a4(mdo): 'dusas da na gan med na narnan da na da la khams dang skye mched myi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang 'dod pa/ dang gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa myi 'dod pa de ni chos
289a5(mdo): 'dod pa'o// gang dmyigs pa'i mtshan ma la dmyigs pa mi// 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor da kyis bud myed de la 'di skad ces smras so// 
289a6(mdo): che zhe bzod par gyis shig/ bdag sgo gang 'di nas 'gro 'o// bud myed des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byord dpor na// sa 'i khams la bzod pa gsol ba de bzhin du/ 
289a7(mdo): btsun pa rab 'byor nga gang gi sems sa dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol myi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor nga tshul bzod pa gsol gyi 'tshal pa de bzhin du gang gi phyir sems
289a8(mdo): chu dang 'dra ba de ni bzod pa gsol gyi 'tshal lo// mye dang rlung dang / nam mkhal la bzod pa gsol myi 'tshal pa de bzhin du/ gang gi sems me dang rlung dang / nam mkha' dpa'adra
289b1(mdo): pa da la ni bzod pa gsol da myi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che la bzod pa gsos myi 'tshal pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang gi phyir/ 
289b2(mdo): sems gru dang steg dang / zam pa dang / lam po che dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol myi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor dbyis pa rnams la ni bzod pa gsol tshal kyis/ 'phags
289b3(mdo): pa rnams lo ni bzod pa gsol myi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor da gang dag la gnod sems dang // khro pa dang bag la nyal skye ba de dag la bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ gang dag la myi skye ba
289b4(mdo): de dag la ni bzod gsol myi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ me bar ni zhi bar brgya mtshal gyi/ myi 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi myi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab
289b5(mdo): 'byor da gang dag gi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba de dag ni bzod pa// gsol 'tshal gyi/ gang dag nyon mongs pa mi 'bar// pa de dag sa bzod pa gsol myi 'tshal lo// de nas
289b6(mdo): tshe dang sdun pa rab 'byord kyis bud myed de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod ci zhig 'dod nas 'di skar seng ge li badz+ra spogs/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byord gang 'dod pa des
289b7(mdo): ni seng ge'i sgra spogs myi nus so// gang dag ci yang myi 'dod pa de ni seng ge'i spogs par bgyid de// de ci'i slad tu zhe na/ dmyigs pa la ni 'dod pa 'chis la// gang la dmyigs pa ma
289b8(mdo): na / na ni btsun pa rab 'byor da gzhan yang ci zhig bzhed pas len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyurd/ smras pa/ che zhe
290a1(mdo): 'dod la yod pa la ni rnam pa ma grol pa ci yang myed do// sbas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga gang bad pas ses pa myed pa ma gang zag rnams las sems rnam par gros pa de ba'i
290a2(mdo): du/ bdag kyang de lta bu'i 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta bu 'i rnam par grol ba'i/ 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi 'dug pas zhugs so// de na
290a3(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bud myed de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe theg pa yi rnam pa gang yin pa rnams dang // rtags gang yin pa rnams dang / mtshan ma gang yin pa 'di lta bu
290a4(mdo): dag bdag la ston pa lags na/ khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin par the tshom myed do// bud myed des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da theg pa chen po 'i rmi
290a5(mdo): ba rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams ma/ khye nad tam/ smras pa/ che zhe nyan thos kyi sa ni mtho/ sa par theg pa chen po la rnam pa rnam dang / rtags nas
290a6(mdo): dang / mtshan ma rnams shes par myi nus kyis/ che e theg chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams grod cig/ smras pa/ btsun pa
290a7(mdo): rab 'byor de theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i theg pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcus
290a8(mdo): pa rab 'byord dper na/ mas su 'gro ba lA/ 'i bu rnams dang / zla ba nyi ma'i gnas myed pa'ang rnams ni/ sems can rnams la snang bar bgyi ba'i skad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 
290b1(mdo): sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyan gyi 'chan par nam kha la shugs kyis mchil pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor da theg pa chen po sa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu das pan man mas
290b2(mdo): can thams cad la chos kyi sngab pa bgyi pa'i skad du/ chags pa mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyan myi 'chad par yo la tu phyi nad pa drug po dag gi shugs mchi'o// btsun
290b3(mdo): pa rab 'byor nga dper na/ gleng bzhi ni 'khor los sgyurd pa'i rgyal po 'i lags te// de dag kang dang gang du bcis pa de dang der gling bzhi'i myi rnams kyis bsten pa'i 'os su gyu rad pa lags
290b4(mdo): 'khor los sgyurd pa'i rgyal po yang sems can de dag la bsama? pa myi nyams pa'i rnam pa ma mchis te/ byams par bgyid pa de bzhin du/ btsun pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po
290b5(mdo): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni// grong da / grong khyer dang / grong gardal dang // ldong sa dang // yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad
290b6(mdo): du da gsu mchis pa de dang der/ sems can thams cad kyi bsten pa'i 'os su gyurd pa lags la// sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing / tha dad pa'i dpyod pa mchis so// byang
290b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bsdu pa rnam bzhis bsdus pa ni/ sems can rnams la byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcu ma rab 'byor da theg
290b8(mdo): ba chen po zhes bgyi pa ni/ theg pa de che ba lags la/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod pa sbyind dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / snyom phye chen po
291a1(mdo): rnams dang / gyi dang phyi ma yin pa rnams dang / rgyu byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'dog rten skyong pa rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams dang/ shes pa rnams
291a2(mdo): dang / yang dag song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi ma mchod pa lags te/ de sa na theg pa chen po zhes pa kyi'o// theg pa don ma skyes pa'i phyir myi zad pa'o// theg pa do ni sad pa
291a3(mdo): rgyas kyi rigs myi 'chad pa 'o// theg pa de ni chos kyi rigs sdud pa'o// theg pa de ni dge' 'dun gi rigs yongs su 'dzind pa'o// theg pa do ni sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed
291a4(mdo): cing slob pa myed pa 'i yangs pa'o// theg pa de ni phan pa mu mchis pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o// theg pa de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug gis shin du spyad pa byas pa'o// theg pa de ni bsdu ba ni
291a5(mdo): bzhis legs par bsdus pa'o// theg pa de ni 'phags pa/ 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'i phyir/ shin tu yang dag par song ba'o// theg pa de ni zhi gnas
291a6(mdo): dang / lhag mthong bsgom pas bzhon pa bzang po dang // theg de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems myi me rjed pa'i phyir/ kha lo sgyurd pa bzang pa'i gnas so// 
291a7(mdo): theg pa de ni snying rje chen pos shin tu brtan pa moganas sa na mam ca man na gnan/ theg pa de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyis phyag bgyis pa'o// 
291a8(mdo): ba de ni las kyi dgol ba thams cad kyis kyi ji pa'o// theg pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis theg par dkal ba la// theg pa de mi ma dad pa rnams dga' par bgyid
291b1(mdo): 'o// theg pa de ni sdang ba rnams byams par bgyid pa lo// theg pa de ni ser sna can rnams kyi gtod pa bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni tshul khrimasa'achal pa rnams kyi chus khrims bgyid
291b2(mdo): pa'o// theg pa de ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams bzod pa bgyid pag ni ma zhes dad da dam ca na su ga su da gan pa de ni mun sbas pa rnams ched sa par bgyid
291b3(mdo): pa'o// theg pa de ni mkhas pa rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'o// theg pa de ni shes pa rnams dad par bgyid pa'o// des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi lam// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
291b4(mdo): 'byor kyis/ bud myed de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyodad kyis theg pa chen po rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams legs par smras so// bud myed
291b5(mdo): des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da theg pa chen po'i rnam pa/ rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams ning / bskal pa 'am/ de bas ches lhag par bdag gis bshad
291b6(mdo): du lags kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa rab 'byor de theg pa chen po ji ltar tshad ma mchis pa de bzhin du rnam pa rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams kyang chad ma mchis so// 
291b7(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis bud myed de la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smra so/ che zhe khyod kyis bdag la khyod ci zhig 'dod pa de bsod snyoms sa rgyu bar byed ces glags btsal pa de ni
291b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag nyid kyang / bsod nams la brgyu ba mdzad na/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de'i grags btsal lam// bud myed des smras pa
292a1(mdo): brgyan pa shegs pa bas gang gis pam sasu chub ma dad pa ma pa shA
292a2(mdo): bzhin bzhin gshegs pa thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bsod snyoms la rgya pa mdzad/ bud myed des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pani/ don gyi dbang nyi shu cha gcig gzigs nas
292a3(mdo): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi sku bzang po bstand pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms su rgyu ba mdzad de/ der sems can dag gis de bzhin
292a4(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshas suH gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan thob par
292a5(mdo): brgya pa'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ tu/ sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byord/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ 
292a6(mdo): bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byord ga/ zhan yang bzhon gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du bsod mas la gshegs nas/ sems can yod pa rnams
292a7(mdo): kyis ni// gzugs rnams mthong bar mthong bar 'gyurasems can 'on pa rnams kyis ni sgo thos par 'gyur/ sems can ston pa rnams kyis ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur// sems can
292a8(mdo): gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed par 'gyur/ sems can bkres pa rnams kyis zas nyed par 'gyur/ sems can sgom pa rnams kyis ni btung ba nyed par 'gyur la/ sems can su la yang
292b1(mdo): 'dod chags sam zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug dang / 'dra dog dang / ser sna dang / 'khro ba dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / yongs su gdung ba'i gnod pa mchis te/ sems can tham
292b2(mdo): cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan te/ cig la gcig pa ma la 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te// der sems can mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du gshegs pa'i yos sun gsum
292b3(mdo): 'tshogs pa de mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyed par bgyid de// btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas

292b5(mdo): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lham 'phye chen po rnaMs dang / rgya byin/ dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyod pa rnams mchod pa
292b6(mdo): pa'i mas bgyi ba'i slad du/ phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ der sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ myi rnams kyi lha dang klu dang / gnod skyon dang / gri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding nga
292b7(mdo): gyi 'am ci dang / oM 'phye chen po dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spyod pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa mthong nas/ de dag de bzhin she
292b8(mdo): pa ma 'dod pa skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar che pa nas rmad tu 'byong pa'i bar gyi chos dang ldanan/ snyam ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
293a1(mdo): bsod snyoms la rgyub mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byo gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzod snyoms sub mthong / sems cad dpag tu myed pa po sa spyod dang / dbang phyug zhes rgyud
293a2(mdo): shing / byis pa dang / gzugs dang / rigs dang / tshor ba nan myen pas rgyags shing nyos pa rnam pa 'ad snyem du sems te/ 'di 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyas srid thor nas rab tu byung zhing tha med tshum
293a3(mdo): sa rgyu ba zhes grags te/ des kyang 'di ltar nga rgyal bcom na/ kyes bdag cag gis kyang nga rgyas bcom par byas// snyam te/ de dag gis de ga chu mthong nas/ thA na myed pa yang dag par
293a4(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed par bgyid te// btsun rab 'byorang de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de ga cig/ pa nas bsol snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa ra
293a5(mdo): 'byord gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang / lha gzi byin che ba ga byin che ba rnams kyis dgongs pa la ltas nas/ 'di skad du
293a6(mdo): 'di la ni bkres pa dang / skem pa'i gnod pa yang myed la/ lus nyams chung ba yang byed kyi sems can rnams la snying rtse ba cher byas nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba byed kyis/ bdag cag kyang / 
293a7(mdo): bzhin du sems can rnams la snying che ba cher byas pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la rgyu bar bya'o zhes smra shing / de dag gis de lta bu mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
293b1(mdo): sems skyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang sems cad se so cam
293b2(mdo): snyomams can/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta pa dang / phyag 'tshal pa dang / snyen dkur bgyi ba'i slad tu/ gyi 'chis pa de dag de bzhir gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du gshegs na 'bad kyi 'tsha
293b3(mdo): par mthong bar 'gyur la/ mthong nas kyang dka' ba dang / mchog tu dag pa chen po thob par 'gyur te/ dka' ba dang / tu thob nas kyang / blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
293b4(mdo): tu sems skyed par bgyid de/ bcun rab 'byor de de bzhin gshe/ dgas pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas za / bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor da gzhan yang sangs
293b5(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba la don yod pa ste/ pa na sems can gang dag gis sems kyi skad cig cig / ma la zhi pa'i myig gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na yang
293b6(mdo): de 'ba' shig gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'dra bar gyur pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byoradade bzhin gshegs pa'i don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod
293b7(mdo): snyom la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byorade/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du gshegs na/ sems can bcing pas bcings pa rnams bcing ba las grol bar 'gyur
293b8(mdo): la/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag cag bcings pa 'di dag las grol bar 'gyurar to// zhes thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa bzo pa de byas pa tsher nas/ bla na
294a1(mdo): med pa parang dag par rigs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'khyod de ban gshegs pa pa da gyu das sa rgyabs da/ 
294a2(mdo): 'dun pa rab 'bye gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// de bzhin gegs pa 'i yon tan grags pa sams yadan cag gis de 'a gi gags pa sa bamed snyo ma 'bul par bya'o// 
294a3(mdo): chos gos lus la 'bul pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stir bya ba ci yang rung bas mchod par bya'o snyam tu sems pa de lta bu dag mchis la// de dag las kyang mas bsrungs pa 'am/ phas bsrungs
294a4(mdo): pa 'am/ mying pos bsrungs pa 'am/ phu nu mos bsrung sa pa 'am/ khyim zab kyis bsrungs pa'am/ mdza' bo/ sa bsrungs pa rnams de dang de'i rkyend gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
294a5(mdo): zad du mchi myi nus te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa// grong dang grong khyer du gshegs pa mthong na/ tshim zhing ma gu la rab tu dag la zhing / dga' ba yid bdel ba skyes nas/ de
294a6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms 'bul bar bgyid de// spel nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa
294a7(mdo): don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa sa/ rgyas chen bzhi la rigs kyi sku rnams kyis srul bzed phul nas8
294a8(mdo): gshegs pas pa zhes pa mchis te/ des sems can yod spyod chung ba dang / chung ngu ma sbyin par 'tshal pa gang dag sags pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lung grang par mthong ngo // 
294b1(mdo): sems cad mar byed kyi ning yang du phyin par 'ams pa gang dag lags pa deg gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rung byed ma gang par 'thong nas/ de dag gos tsam sa dgos pa su / spangs sa
294b2(mdo): bgyis nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid te/ a rab 'byor da de bzhing gshegs pas dod kyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rmya ba mang dos// brgyad
294b3(mdo): ba rab 'byorang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi nang du bca' ba 'am/ bza' ba 'am/ myang par bya pa ro brgyad dang ldan pa thugs na bca' ba dang / bza' pa dang / myang par bya bde
294b4(mdo): dag 'dre bar gyi 'gyur te/ ri skar snang ba dang pa'i na masadamis pa de kho na bzhin du mchis te/ deng lnga dang / klu dang / gnod skyid dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' sring dang
294b5(mdo): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po dag gis de bzhin shes pa'i tshub med kyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par
294b6(mdo): bgyid de/ btsun pa rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byord gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung le
294b7(mdo): kyi nang du dge 'a slong thams cad kyis zas thugs kyang / des spyang zed de ma gang pa/ grang bar yang ra myi 'gyur te/ deng lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
294b8(mdo): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mang yong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldum zed kyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong ste/ ngo mtshar du gyur de nas bla na myed pa yang
295a1(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sems bskyed par bgyid te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan ya de bzhin
295a2(mdo): gshegs pa'i sku ni gcig tu 'khregs shing khong song ma lags rdo rje ltar/ 'khregs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la pho ba 'am long ka myi mngal/ phyi sa yang mya mngal/ gcin yang mda' mod kyi
295a3(mdo): 'od kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang / bshos gsol pa de ltar yang gdal la/ khong du myi chud pa yang myi mnga' ste/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyidad dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
295a4(mdo): myinam ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa mang po dag gis de mthong nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid te/ btsun pa rab 'byor
295a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas don kyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod do// mas la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor de gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang grong khyer du gshegs na
295a6(mdo): sems can mang po dag gis bsod snyoms mang po 'am nyu du 'am/ bzang po 'am// ngan pa'ang rung ste/ 'bul bar bgyid la// sems can de dag kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la skyed pa'i yon
295a7(mdo): rnams mthar thug par bgyid myi nus te/ lha dang myi rnams kyis pun gsum tshogs pa mang po dag kyang nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/ yon de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i bar tu
295a8(mdo): bar myi 'gyur da te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms ma rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byord gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa niH/ 
295b1(mdo): tu mnyas par bzhag pa ste/ ti pe 'dzin pas rnams pa gyim dang tshangs pa sa me ma yin pa'i gzugs na bskyod pa'i sa gnyi byin che ba gzis byi che ba rnams kyi me bzhidu gshenasas / 
295b2(mdo): snyoms la rgyu zhing / ting nge 'dind las kyang myi g.yol pa mthong na/ de dag 'di snyam tu sem te/ 'di ni sems can gyi don la bachen pa yin gyi/ zas 'dod pa ma yin par the tshom myed do// snyam na
295b3(mdo): de dag dga' ba thob nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid te/ btsun pa rab 'byorade de bzhin gshegs pas don dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms rgyu ba
295b4(mdo): pa mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor da gal te de bzhin gshegs dpa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba myi mdzad de/ zhal zas kyang myi gsol bar 'gyur na ni/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
295b5(mdo): me legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba khyim nas khyim rgya/ da par rab tu byung ba de dag kyang zas myi za pa la zhug/ sa te/ bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu bar myi bya
295b6(mdo): zas kyang bza' bar myi bya'o snyam nas// de dag bkres shing nyams chud par gyur pas/ khyad par thob pa rtogs par myi nus / de dag gi ma 'ongs pa na khyad par thob pa'i bsam pa rdzogs
295b7(mdo): par mdzad pa'i phyir yang / de bzhin gshegs pas bsod snyoms rgyu zhing gsos par mdzad de/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhi gshegs pas ngos kyi dab gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la gyu
295b8(mdo): mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor de gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'phags pa'i rigs rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms rgyu ba mdzad de/ btsun pa rab 'byor
296a1(mdo): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni skye ba phyi ma rnams la thugs bste ba'i phyir/ bzod snyoms la chu ste/ phyi ma'i dus da gram me dang khyim bdags dang pa rnams 'di skad du/ ga
296a2(mdo): 'di dag gi ston pa nyid kyis kyang bsod snyoms la rgya ba ma byas na/ 'di dag cil phyir bsod snyoms la rmya bar byed/ de dag dge slong dang / dgel slong ma rnams la cha shas cher myi dgal bar
296a3(mdo): 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir ro// de bas med dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag gi ston pas kyang thesad snyoms la rgyu ba byas na/ 'di dag ci'i phyir bsod snyoms rgyu bar myi byed snyam ste/ de dag/ 
296a4(mdo): gi sngags pa brjod par bgyid la bsod snyoms dang ster bar 'gyur la te/ 'di skad du bsod snyoms pa rgyu ba 'don/ gtsugasag las byung ba'i bsod snyoms yin no// spyod pa 'di ni de bzhin
296a5(mdo): shed sa sngags pa yin no// da de bzhin// gshegs pas bsngags pa yin no// zhes kyang smra bar/ 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pas
296a6(mdo): don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor de gzhan yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po'i bu rjes
296a7(mdo): las legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu byung ba de dag pa// ka ni ltar rigs chen por skye ba yin na/ zas kyi phyir khyim nas khyim du sa med
296a8(mdo): snyoms la 'i phyir rgyu bar bya snyam ste/ ngo tsha nas bsod snyoms mas rgyu bar myi brgyad pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nas dang / gzil byin dang ldan pa'i sku'i
296b1(mdo): pa sa 'angasmrab 'gyu te/ na pa sa kyi pa [] pa mas na ba / 
296b2(mdo): te/ 'chur par kyi mazhis gshegs pa kyi ba gzigs ma sa bas da // 'atsun pa rab 'byos/ na 'a
296b3(mdo): ni rdzib pa'am skyems pa myi mnga'/ 1ma chung ma yang rtsidangal/ chags pa yang gyi ya la/ chags par d+har padang gyi yangal/ sdig pa bzhed pa sang mu
296b4(mdo): pa yang myi mnga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi / garten dang mthun par mdzad pa dang / sems can yongs
296b5(mdo): su smyin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do// btsun pa rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don kyi dbang de
296b6(mdo): gzigs nas/ bsod snyoms la rgya ba mdzad na/ btsun pa rab 'byord de lta bu'i thabs dang / de lta bu'i snying rje chen po dang / de lta bu'i yon yongs su dgas chos snyoms la rgyu
296b7(mdo): spyod dam/ smras pa/ che zhe bdag gis de 'di myi nus te/ che zhe dper na gyi dang / gyis thams cad kyis ri'i rgyal po ro rab zhig par myi nus pa dang / 2thams cad kyis ra
297a1(mdo): kyi rgyal po se ge sa gas pa'i bar du yang 'phrul chas la/ sgra bsgrags par bsan las gyi num pa de bzhin du me me nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis de man/ 
297a2(mdo): gshegs pa la spyod pa 'am/ thabs sam/ snying rje chen po bstan par myi nus ze/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs ma mkhas pa dang / bsod snyoms sa rgyu ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di bshad pas
297a3(mdo): khyim bdag de ni nang myi de dag dang / khyim gzhan dag nas chos nyan tu 'ongs pa rnams kyi nang nas/ myi nyes stong brgyad brgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// 
297a4(mdo): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo rang bkyis bud myed de la 'di skad ces rnam so// na khyod kyi khyim zab da dag la 'dug/ bud myed des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 
297a5(mdo): bdag gi khyim za ba ni gcig phur ma bas so// de rtsi skad tu zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byorade sems can ji / da dka' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'dul bar
297a6(mdo): 'gyur pa de dag thams cad ni bdag gi khyim thab lags so// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni su la yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba gnang ba byed do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'phyo/ 
297a7(mdo): de bzhin ka shes pas ni dgel la srod kang rkyen tu 'tshal ba'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal ma dang / stan dang / na pa'i bsos sman dang / sman bong dang / mdza' shes kyi
297a8(mdo): dang / bsod snyoms ster ba'i khyim bsten cing bsnyen pa dang / grogs po dga' par bya ba dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon bsnyen pa dang / bsnyen pa dang / snyen dkur bya ba kun tu sten par
297b1(mdo): byed pa de la yang dge' ba'i chos 'phel par 'gyur pa dang / myi dge pa'i chos 'grib par 'gyur par ma gsungs so// smras pa che na de ni khyod mi skad zer ba bzhin no// rnam pa/ bcung / 
297b2(mdo): pa rab 'byor dade pas na de bzhin gshegs pas ni thabs de lta bus sems can rnams la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gnang ngo // smras pa/ che zhe khyed kyis dka' ba kod pa'i thabs la mkhas
297b3(mdo): pas sems can ji snyed btul// spras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da stong gsum gi steng chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul kyis mthal rtogs par nus kyi/ bdag
297b4(mdo): gis dgal ba/ bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can btul tre/ btul nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa gang dag lags pa de dag la ni de ltar myi nus so// 
297b5(mdo): smras pa/ che zhe khyod sems can de dag la dag pa ji lta bu dag/ stobs par byed/ bud myed des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'a khyor de sems can tshangs pa'i dga' ba mos pa dag kyang mchis te/ 
297b6(mdo): btsun pa rab 'byor da de dag la ni bdag tshangs par gyur pa zab par bgyid pa'i slad du/ tshad myed pa'i bsam gtan kyi dga' ba spobaso 'ar bgyid de/ stobs nas kyang de 'og tu bla na myed pa yang dag
297b7(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jud par bgyid do/ btsun pa rab 'byorang sems can rgya byin gyi dgal ba la mes pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag la ni bdag rgya byin kyi dga' ba stobs pa ma bgyid de/ 
297b8(mdo): slobs nas kyang bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do// btsun pa rab 'byor de sems can lha dang klu dang / gnod spyad dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yim dang / nam
298a1(mdo): mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / sgom 'phye chen po'i dga' pa la mos pa dag kyang mchi mchis te/ de dag la ni bdag lto 'phye chen po la bar kyi dga' bas grom par bgyid te/ stong
298a2(mdo): nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jud par bgyid do// btsun pa rab 'byorade sems can 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis so// slob dpon
298a3(mdo): dang yul kyi gyi dang / bram ze dang / rgyas rigs dang / rje 'u mi rigs dang / dmangs kyi rigs kyi rigs kyi dgal pa la mos pa dan kyang mchis kyi// sems can gzugs dang // sgra dang dri dang ro dang /

298a6(mdo): shes dang / mu tig dmar po dang // byi mu 'i snyid po dang / sug dang rin po chernam pa sna tshogs kyi dag pal chom pa dag kyang me tsho pom// sems padang po che dang / dzarda dang dung dang /

298a8(mdo): pa thams cad dang / dga' ba dang / rtse mo thams cad bstobs par bgyid de/ bstobs nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do// rab 'byor
298b1(mdo): kyis snus pa/ me 'dod pa'i men tan lnga ni 'phags pa 'isas kyi bar du gcod pa yin na/ jig gu srer pa 'dus bar 'gyur te// gnas 'drin chu sa ldan pa yod /

299b8(mdo): 'gra ba lta bar bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byorard gzhan yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang / 6pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa lags la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
300a1(mdo): pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas mamachis pa lags te/ deH/ lum bzod pa gang lags pa des ni/ bdag gi ma ni gang yin/ kyi bya ba ni gang yin snyam du rang gis 'tshas to// 'dod pa'i tshan

300a3(mdo): gang gis de lta bur bzod pa de ni// 'dod pa rnams las bzlog myi 'tshal te/ de ni rang nyid kyis 'dod pa rnams la spyod par bgyid de// spen por myi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis

300a8(mdo): bzung ba ltar// 'di sa ni thabs kyis bdag cag gnyis// bsod nams brgyas ni bcus par 'gyur// gdug pa 'i thus kyis zin pa'i// dug ni dug gis 'i bgyid yur/ de
300b1(mdo): bzhin 'dis ni bdag cag gi// 'dod chags drug ni dug gis bcom/ ji skar meni mes chog pa me'is bsgos na zhi ba ltam// de bzhin rang gi nyor mongs gdung na mongasanapas 'o/ 
300b2(mdo): su bkrol// bdag cag gnyis kyis dam chos rtogs// 'dod pa bdag cag gnyis mi 'tshal// byis pa gang dag 'dod pa 'tshal// de dag byang chub 'dod ma lags// 'jig rten 'dod pas
